CVE-2008-0003.title: OpenPegasus PAMBasicAuthenticator::PAMCallback() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0003.body: OpenPegasus is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the PAMBasicAuthenticator::PAMCallback() function. By sending an overly long password, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenPegasus, available from the CVS Repository. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0005.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_ftp.c UTF-7 cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0005.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user supplied input by mod_proxy_ftp.c. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the UTF-7 charset option to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.2.7-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For Apache 1.3.x:Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.0.62-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For Apache Apache 2.0.x:Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (1.3.40-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0006.title: X.Org X11 PCF font buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0006.body: X.Org X11 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the X server when handling PCF fonts. By sending a specially-crafted PCF font with a PCF_BDF_ENCODINGS table containing a difference between the "last col" and "first col" that is more than 255, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with X server privileges or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of X.Org X11 (1.4 or later), available from the X.Org Foundation Web site. See References.For Sun Solaris:Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103192 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0008.title: PulseAudio pa_drop_root function privilege escalation
CVE-2008-0008.body: PulseAudio could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a failure to drop privileges in the pa_drop_root() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to gain root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of PulseAudio (0.9.9 or later), available from the PulseAudio Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0012.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect heap buffer overflow 5
CVE-2008-0012.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0013.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect heap buffer overflow 6
CVE-2008-0013.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0014.title: Trend Micro ServerProtect heap buffer overflow 7
CVE-2008-0014.body: Trend Micro ServerProtect is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0027.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CTLProvider.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0027.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager deployed in secure mode is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by CTLProvider.exe. By sending an overly long request to TCP port 2444, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the service to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20080116-cucmctl for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0031.title: Apple QuickTime Sorenson 3 video file code execution
CVE-2008-0031.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Sorenson 3 video file, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or by hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0032.title: Apple QuickTime Macintosh Resources code execution
CVE-2008-0032.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted movie file containing an embedded Macintosh Resource record with an overly large length value in the resource header, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or by hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0033.title: Apple QuickTime IDSC atoms code execution
CVE-2008-0033.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper parsing of Image Descriptor (IDSC) atoms. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted movie file containing a malformed IDSC atom, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and cause the victim's QuickTime application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or by hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0035.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone Foundation code execution
CVE-2008-0035.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability in Foundation. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted URL, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and cause the victim's application to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code on the victim's system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone (1.1.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2008-001 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0044.title: Apple Mac OS X Apple File Protocol (AFP) Client buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0044.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the Apple File Protocol (AFP) Client. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted afp:// URL, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0045.title: Apple Mac OS X AFP Server security bypass
CVE-2008-0045.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of Kerberos principal realm names by the AFP Server. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified Kerberos principal realm manipulations to bypass cross-realm authentication and make an unauthorized connection to the server.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0046.title: Apple Mac OS X Application Firewall weak security
CVE-2008-0046.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security. The German translation for the "Set access for specific services and applications" Application Firewall radio button is incorrect which could allow the user to permit unintended access to arbitrary applications and services.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0048.title: Apple Mac OS X AppKit NSDocument API buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0048.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by AppKit. By ending an overly long filename to the NSDocument API, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0052.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreServices weak security
CVE-2008-0052.body: The Apple Mac OS X CoreServices component could provide weaker than expected security for Safari users, caused by an error when the "Open Safe files" preference is enabled. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using AppleWorks to open files with names ending in ".ief".Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0053.title: Apple Mac OS X CUPS input validation unspecified
CVE-2008-0053.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Apple Mac OS X related to CUPS input validation has an unknown impact and attack vector.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0054.title: Apple Mac OS X Foundation NSSelectorFromString API code execution
CVE-2008-0054.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation in the NSSelectorFromString API by the Foundation component. By sending a specially-crafted selector name to the NSSelectorFromString API, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the affected application or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0056.title: Apple Mac OS X Foundation NSFileManager buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0056.body: Apple Mac OS X Foundation is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by NSFileManager. By sending an overly long pathname to an application using the NSFileManager API, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0060.title: Apple Mac OS X Help Viewer Applescript execution
CVE-2008-0060.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the Help Viewer. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted help:topic_list URL, an attacker could inject HTML or JavaScript into a topic list page causing a redirect to a help:runscript link, which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary Applescript on the system.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0062.title: MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) KDC (krb5kdc) code execution
CVE-2008-0062.body: MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a NULL pointer dereference or a double-free error in KDC (krb5kdc) when global variables are not set for certain krb4 message types. By sending a specially-crafted krb4 message, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges, obtain sensitive information, or cause the service to crash.Refer to MIT krb5 Security Advisory 2008-001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0065.title: Winamp in_mp3.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0065.body: Winamp is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by in_mp3.dll during the parsing of metadata. By sending an overly long artist or name tag, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Winamp (5.52 or later), available from the Winamp Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0068.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) OpenView5.exe directory traversal
CVE-2008-0068.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager (OV NNM) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to the OpenView5.exe CGI application containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the Action parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (NNM_01168 or NNM_01159), available from the HP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0070.title: Orb dimensions buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0070.body: Orb is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error when parsing variant dimensions received within RPC requests. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request containing an overly large number of array dimensions, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Orb (2.00.1084 or later), available from the Orb Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0073.title: xine-lib sdpplin_parse() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0073.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sdpplin_parse() function. By persuading a victim to connect to a specially-crafted RTSP stream using an overly large "streamid" SDP parameter, a remote attacker could overwrite arbitrary memory regions and execute malformed code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of xine-lib (1.1.11 or later), available from the xine Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0089.title: ClipShare uprofile.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0089.body: ClipShare is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the uprofile.php script using the UID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0090.title: DivX Web Player npUpload.dll ActiveX control denial of service
CVE-2008-0090.body: The DivX Web Player ActiveX control (Upload.dll) is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the SetPassword method, a remote attacker could cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0091.title: AGENCY4NET WEBFTP download2.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-0091.body: AGENCY4NET WEBFTP could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the download2.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0092.title: phpWebSite search module cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0092.body: phpWebSite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the search parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0093.title: eTicket name and subject cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0093.body: eTicket is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when opening a ticket. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the name and subject parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once a ticket is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of eTicket (v1.5.6 RC4 or later), available from the Sourceforge Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0094.title: MODx AjaxSearch.php file include
CVE-2008-0094.body: MODx could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the AjaxSearch.php script using the value parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available for registered users from the MODx Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0095.title: Asterisk BYE/Also transfer method denial of service
CVE-2008-0095.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the handling of the BYE with Also transfer method. If a dialog has already been established, a remote attacker could attempt to make a transfer using the BYE message and crash the vulnerable application.Refer to AST-2008-001 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0100.title: White_dune Scene::errorf() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0100.body: White_dune is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Scene::errorf() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .WRL file containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of White_dune (0.29beta795 or later), available from the White_dune Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0101.title: White_dune swDebugf() format string
CVE-2008-0101.body: White_dune could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a format string error in the swDebugf() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .WRL file containing malicious format specifiers, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of White_dune (0.29beta795 or later), available from the White_dune Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0122.title: ISC BIND inet_network buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0122.body: ISC BIND is vulnerable to an off-by-one buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the inet_network() function. By sending a specially-crafted argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code or cause the system to crash.Refer to IBM Subscription service Bulletin 4140 for patch or upgrade information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0123.title: Moodle install.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0123.body: Moodle is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the install.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the dbname parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Moodle (1.8.4 or later), available from the Moodle Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0124.title: Serendipity Real name and Username fields cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0124.body: Serendipity is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Real name or Username field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Serendipity (1.3-beta1 or later), available from the Serendipity Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0125.title: phpstats phpstats.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0125.body: phpstats is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the phpstats.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the baseDir parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0127.title: McAfee E-Business Server authentication packet code execution
CVE-2008-0127.body: McAfee E-Business Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the administration interface. By sending a malformed authentication packet to TCP port 1718, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of McAfee E-Business Serve (8.5.3 or later), as listed in McAfee Security Alert Document ID: 614472. See References.

CVE-2008-0129.title: Site@School slideshow_full.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0129.body: Site@School is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the slideshow_full.php script using the album_name parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0130.title: Dating Site login_form.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0130.body: Instant Softwares Dating Site is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login_form.asp script using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0132.title: FortressSSH sshd.exe denial of service
CVE-2008-0132.body: FortressSSH is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a string handling exception error in sshd.exe. By establishing multiple concurrent terminated SSH sessions, a remote attacker could prevent additional users from logging on until the system generated error messages are cleared.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0137.title: SNETWORKS PHP CLASSIFIEDS config.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-0137.body: SNETWORKS PHP CLASSIFIEDS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the config.inc.php script using the path_escape parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0139.title: LoudBlog parse_old.php template code execution
CVE-2008-0139.body: LoudBlog could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the parse_old.php script. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted template parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0140.title: Uebimiau Web-Mail error.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-0140.body: Uebimiau Web-Mail could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. If register_globals is enabled, an attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the error.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the f_pass parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0143.title: samPHPweb db.php file include
CVE-2008-0143.body: samPHPweb could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the db.php script using the commonpath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0144.title: NetRisk index.php file include
CVE-2008-0144.body: NetRisk could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0148.title: TUTOS cmd.php command execution
CVE-2008-0148.body: TUTOS (The Ultimate Team Organization Software) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper restriction of access by the cmd.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the system with the privileges of the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0151.title: WAC Server telnet option request buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0151.body: Foxit Remote Access Server (WAC Server) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending an overly long telnet option request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0153.title: Pragma Telnet Server telnetd TELOPT PRAGMA LOGON option denial of service
CVE-2008-0153.body: Pragma Telnet Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer error in the telnetd.exe TELOPT PRAGMA LOGON option. By establishing multiple concurrent terminated telnet sessions, a remote attacker could prevent additional users from logging on until the system generated error messages are cleared.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0154.title: EvilBoard index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0154.body: EvilBoard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0155.title: EvilBoard index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0155.body: EvilBoard is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "c" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0157.title: FlexBB flexBB_temp_id SQL injection
CVE-2008-0157.body: FlexBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements when logging in using the flexbb_temp_id password cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0158.title: Shop-Script index.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-0158.body: Shop-Script could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the aux_page parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0159.title: Eggblog eggblogpassword parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-0159.body: Eggblog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements when logging in using the eggblogpassword cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0164.title: Plone join_form and prefs_groups_overview forms cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0164.body: Plone is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed POST request to the join_form or prefs_groups_overview form to cause the victim to create new accounts, change account privileges, and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Hotfix 20080314), available from the Plone Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0165.title: ikiwiki change password cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0165.body: ikiwiki is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the preferences and edit forms. By persuading a victim logged into ikiwiki to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to change passwords or perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of ikiwiki (2.42 or later), available from the ikiwiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0166.title: OpenSSL random number generator weak security
CVE-2008-0166.body: OpenSSL, when running on certain Linux distributions, could provide weaker than expected security. The random number generator creates predictable values. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute-force methods to obtain cryptographic key values.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0169.title: ikiwiki openid and passwordauth plugins authentication bypass
CVE-2008-0169.body: ikiwiki could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication restrictions, caused by an error in the openid and passwordauth plugins. By logging into the application using a known openid that has previously been logged into without the password being set, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an empty password to gain unauthorized access to the application.Upgrade to the latest version of ikiwiki (2.48 or later), available from the ikiwiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0173.title: GForge multiple scripts SQL injection
CVE-2008-0173.body: GForge is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to multiple scripts in the "www/export" directory using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0187.title: SAM Broadcaster samPHPweb songinfo.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0187.body: SAM Broadcaster samPHPweb is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the songinfo.php script using the songid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0190.title: AwesomeTemplateEngine multiple parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0190.body: AwesomeTemplateEngine is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the example_template.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the data[title], data[message], data[table][1][item], data[table][1][url] or data[poweredby] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0191.title: WordPress p parameter path disclosure
CVE-2008-0191.body: WordPress could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using an invalid "p" parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path and the database structures. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0192.title: WordPress popuptitle cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0192.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the post.php and page-new.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the popuptitle parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.WordPress customers should contact WordPress support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2008-0216.title: FreeBSD kernel ptsname() information disclosure
CVE-2008-0216.body: The FreeBSD kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper verification of a valid pty before the extraction of characters by the ptsname() function. By executing pt_chown, a local attacker with read access could exploit this vulnerability to obtain and modify ownership of a restricted pty.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-08:01.pty for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2008-0217.title: FreeBSD kernel openpty() information disclosure
CVE-2008-0217.body: The FreeBSD kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an implementation error in the openpty() function when the permissions are set for opened pseudo terminals. By executing a program that calls the openpty() function internally, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read the text from the pseudo terminal opened by a non-root user and obtain sensitive information.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-08:01.pty for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2008-0218.title: Merak IceWarp Mail Server index.html cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0218.body: Merak IceWarp Mail Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.html script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the message parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Merak IceWarp Mail Server (9.2.1 or later), available from the IceWarp Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0219.title: PHP Webquest soporte_horizontal_w.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0219.body: PHP Webquest is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the soporte_horizontal_w.php script using the id_actividad parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0222.title: Wp-FileManager plugin for WordPress file upload
CVE-2008-0222.body: The Wp-FileManager plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the ajaxfilemanager.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0223.title: JustSystems JSFC.DLL buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0223.body: Multiple JustSystems products are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the JSFC.DLL library. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JTD file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the JUSTSYSTEMS Web site for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0224.title: Newbb_plus module for RunCMS Client IP SQL injection
CVE-2008-0224.body: The Newbb_plus module for RunCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements when logging in using the Client IP parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0226.title: yaSSL input_buffer& operator function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0226.body: yaSSL is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the yaSSL input_buffer& operator function. By sending an overly long Hello packet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of yaSSL (1.8.6 or later), available from the yaSSL Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0226.title: yaSSL ProcessOldClientHello function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0226.body: yaSSL is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ProcessOldClientHello function. By sending an overly long Hello packet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of yaSSL (1.8.6 or later), available from the yaSSL Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0228.title: Linksys WRT54GL apply.cgi cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0228.body: Linksys WRT54GL router is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the apply.cgi script. By persuading a victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass authentication using various parameters and cause the victim to change the configuration settings and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0231.title: Tuned Studios Templates index.php file include
CVE-2008-0231.body: Tuned Studios Templates could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0232.title: Zero CMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0232.body: Zero CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0234.title: Apple QuickTime RTSP responses buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0234.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling RTSP responses. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site or open a specially-crafted QTL file and attempt to display a malformed "Reason-Phrase", a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending the malicious file as an email attachment or by hosting it on a Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0239.title: Sun Java System Identity Manager main.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0239.body: Sun Java System Identity Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the main.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the activeControl parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103180 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0239.title: Sun Java System Identity Manager resultsForm cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0239.body: Sun Java System Identity Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the findForSelect.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the resultsForm parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103180 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0239.title: Sun Java System Identity Manager login.jsp lang cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0239.body: Sun Java System Identity Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the lang parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103180 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0239.title: Sun Java System Identity Manager login.jsp cntry cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0239.body: Sun Java System Identity Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cntry parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103180 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0240.title: Sun Java System Identity Manager index.jsp frame injection
CVE-2008-0240.body: Sun Java System Identity Manager is vulnerable to frame injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the helpUrl parameter to inject a malicious frame into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials, spoof Web content, or perform phishing attacks.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103180 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0241.title: Sun Java System Identity Manager login.jsp security bypass
CVE-2008-0241.body: Sun Java System Identity Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the login.jsp script. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and open a malicious link using the nextPage parameter, a remote attacker could bypass cross-domain security restrictions and redirect the victim to a malicious site and possibly conduct phishing attacks on the system.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 103180 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0244.title: SAP MaxDB system function cons.exe command execution
CVE-2008-0244.body: SAP MaxDB could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper invocation of the cons.exe DATABASE COMMAND by the system function. By executing certain database commands followed by double ampersands (&&), an attacker could execute arbitrary shell commands on the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0245.title: UploadImage admin.php command execution
CVE-2008-0245.body: UploadImage could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could send a HTTP POST request containing a specially-crafted Content-Length header to the admin.php script to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0246.title: UploadScript admin.php command execution
CVE-2008-0246.body: UploadScript could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could send a HTTP POST request containing a specially-crafted Content-Length header to the admin.php script to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0247.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) Express server buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0247.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TSM Express Backup Server service (dsmsvc.exe). By sending specially-crafted packets to TCP port 1500, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM Flash Alert 1291536 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0249.title: PHP Webquest backup_phpwebquest.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-0249.body: PHP Webquest could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when the system function is enabled. The backup_phpwebquest.php script reveals database login credentials when the page is viewed. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0250.title: Microsoft Visual InterDev .SLN file Project line buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0250.body: Microsoft Visual InterDev is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling .SLN files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .SLN file containing an overly long Project line prepended with a 'Project("{}") =' sequence, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0253.title: Binn SBuilder full_text.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0253.body: Binn SBuilder is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the full_text.php script using the nid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0254.title: TutorialCMS activate.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0254.body: TutorialCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the activate.php script using the userName parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0255.title: iGaming CMS archive.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0255.body: iGaming CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the archive.php script using the section parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0256.title: ASP Photo Gallery multiple SQL injection
CVE-2008-0256.body: ASP Photo Gallery is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Imgbig.asp, thumb.asp, or the thumbricerca.asp script using the id or the ricerca parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0258.title: PHP Running Management index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0258.body: PHP Running Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the message parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP Running Management (1.0.3 or later), available from the PHP Running Management Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0261.title: Mambo search component denial of service
CVE-2008-0261.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Mambo related to the search component and module could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Mambo (4.6.x or 4.5.5 or later), available from Mambo CSM Forum Mambo Announcements/Mambo Security, 01-10-2008, 05:29 AM. See References.

CVE-2008-0262.title: Agares PhpAutoVideo articleblock.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0262.body: Agares PhpAutoVideo is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the articleblock.php script using the articlecat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0264.title: Meta Tags module for Drupal code execution
CVE-2008-0264.body: The Meta Tags module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of nodes. If the site is configured for the inclusion of images in a created node, a remote attacker could create a specially-crafted node containing an image file and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-008 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0265.title: F5 BIG-IP SearchString cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0265.body: F5 BIG-IP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SearchString parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 13, 2008.

CVE-2008-0267.title: eTicket admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0267.body: eTicket is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with administrative access could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using the msg or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0268.title: eTicket view.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0268.body: eTicket is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the view.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "s" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0270.title: TaskFreak! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0270.body: TaskFreak! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the sContext parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of TaskFreak! (0.6.2 o later), available from the TaskFreak! Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0271.title: BUEditor module for Drupal cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0271.body: The BUEditor module for Drupal is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to delete custom editor interfaces and possibly perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-003 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0272.title: aggregator module for Drupal cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0272.body: The aggregator module for Drupal is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP GET request to cause the victim to remove items from a specific feed and possibly perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-005 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0273.title: Drupal UTF-8 cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0273.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by an error in the text filtering functionality. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and bypass the text filter using invalid UTF-8 sequences to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the data is viewed using Internet Explorer 6. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-006 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0274.title: Drupal theme .tpl.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0274.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input to theme .tpl.php files. If register_globals is enabled and .htaccess fails to run, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-2008-007 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0277.title: The Fileshare module for Drupal code execution
CVE-2008-0277.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the Fileshare module for Drupal could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0278.title: X7 Chat day SQL injection
CVE-2008-0278.body: X7 Chat is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the day parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of X7 Chat (2.0.5.1 or later), available from the X7 Chat Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0279.title: Xforum liretopic.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0279.body: Xforum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the liretopic.php script using the topic parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0280.title: MTCMS a parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-0280.body: MTCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script using the "a" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0282.title: DomPHP inscription.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0282.body: DomPHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the inscription.php script using the mail parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0284.title: Simple Machines Forum itemid cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0284.body: Simple Machines Forum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by unspecified scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the itemid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Simple Machines Forum (version 2.0 1.x or later) when it is available from the Simple Machines Forum Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0289.title: Member Area System view_func.php file include
CVE-2008-0289.body: Member Area System could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If Register_Globals and Allow URL Fopen are enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the view_func.php script using the "i" parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Member Area System (2.0 or later), available from the Mansion Productions Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0290.title: Digital Hive base.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0290.body: Digital Hive is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the base.php script using the user_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0291.title: RichStrong CMS showproduct.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0291.body: RichStrong CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showproduct.asp script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0292.title: Dansie Photo Album photo_album.pl cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0292.body: Dansie Photo Album is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the photo_album.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the search parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0293.title: FreeSeat cron.php security bypass
CVE-2008-0293.body: FreeSeat could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the cron.php script. If the format.php script has been modified, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and bypass security restrictions to login into the application as an administrator.Upgrade to the latest version of FreeSeat (1.1.5d or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-0297.title: photokorn media gallery update3.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-0297.body: photokorn media gallery could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the update3.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP GET request, an attacker could obtain the database name, host, username, and password.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0300.title: Mapbender mapFiler.php code execution
CVE-2008-0300.body: Mapbender could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mapFiler.php script. By passing a specially-crafted value using the factor parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Mapbender (2.4.5 rc1 or later), available from the Mapbender Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0301.title: Mapbender gaz parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-0301.body: Mapbender is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the mod_gazetteer_edit.php script using the gaz parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Mapbender (2.4.5 rc1 or later), available from the Mapbender Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-0307.title: SAP MaxDB vserver code execution
CVE-2008-0307.body: SAP MaxDB could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a signedness error in the vserver component. By sending a specially-crafted request to TCP port 7210, a remote attacker with knowledge of the local active database name, could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (SAP note 1140135), available from the SAP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0310.title: SCO UnixWare pkgadd directory traversal
CVE-2008-0310.body: SCO UnixWare could allow a local attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error in pkgadd. An attacker could send a specially-crafted request to the PKGINST environment variable containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to access arbitrary data on the system.Refer to the The SCO Group Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0311.title: Borland CaliberRM StarTeam PGMWebHandler::parse_request() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0311.body: Borland CaliberRM StarTeam is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the PGMWebHandler::parse_request() function in STMulticastService. If MPX Events and the StarTeam Message Broker option is enabled during installation, a remote attacker from within the local network could send an overly long HTTP request to TCP port 3057 to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0314.title: Clam AntiVirus (ClavAV) libclamav/spin.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0314.body: Clam AntiVirus (ClavAV) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by libclamav/spin.c. By persuading a victim to scan a specially-crafted PeSpin packed binary, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to ClamAV Bugzilla Bug 876 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0324.title: Cisco VPN Client CVPNDRVA.sys IPSec driver denial of service
CVE-2008-0324.body: The CISCO VPN Client is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the IPSec driver. By sending a specially-crafted request containing less than 8+31 bytes to CVPNDRVA.sys, a local attacker could crash the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0325.title: FaScript FaPersian Petition show.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0325.body: FaScript FaPersian Petition is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the show.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0326.title: FaScript FaPersianHack show.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0326.body: FaScript FaPersianHack is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the show.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0327.title: FaScript FaMp3 show.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0327.body: FaScript FaMp3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0328.title: FaScript FaName page.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0328.body: FaScript FaName is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0329.title: LulieBlog Admin directory multiple .php scripts security bypass
CVE-2008-0329.body: LulieBlog could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Admin directory. By sending a specially-crafted request to the comment_accepter.php, comment_refuser.php or the article_suppr.php script using the id parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to accept or delete comments and articles from the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0330.title: OSC Radiator unspecified denial of service
CVE-2008-0330.body: An unspecified error in OSC Radiator could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted request using nmap, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the vulnerable server.Upgrade to the latest version of OSC Radiator (4.0 or later), available from the OSC Radiator Downloads Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-0330.title: Radiator RADIUS denial of service
CVE-2008-0330.body: Radiator is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when processing RADIUS packets. By sending a malformed RADIUS packet, a remote attacker could crash the service.Upgrade to the latest version of Radiator (4.0 or later), available from the Open System Consultants Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0331.title: funkwerk X2300 DNS request denial of service
CVE-2008-0331.body: funkwerk X2300 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when processing DNS requests. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to crash the system.Apply Patch 9 for version 7.4.1, available from the Funkwerk Enterprise Communications Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0332.title: Aria effect.php file include
CVE-2008-0332.body: Aria could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the effect.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0335.title: BugTracker.NET new bug cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0335.body: BugTracker.NET is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when filing a new bug. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various form fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the malicious bug is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of BugTracker.NET (2.7.2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-0336.title: BugTracker.NET HTTP request cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0336.body: BugTracker.NET is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to cause the victim to delete bugs and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of BugTracker.NET (2.7.2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-0337.title: MiniWeb HTTP Server _mwProcessReadSocket() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0337.body: MiniWeb HTTP Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the _mwProcessReadSocket() function. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0338.title: MiniWeb HTTP Server mwGetLocalFileName() directory traversal
CVE-2008-0338.body: MiniWeb HTTP Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mwGetLocalFileName() function containing encoded "dot dot" sequences (.%2e) to traverse directories and view arbitrary files outside of the Web root directory.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0353.title: PHP-Residence visualizza_tabelle.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0353.body: PHP-Residence is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the visualizza_tabelle.php script using the id_sessione parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP-Residence (1.0.1 or later), available from the PHP-RESIDENCE Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0354.title: IBM Lotus Sametime client mouse-over action cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0354.body: IBM Lotus Sametime client is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to inject malicious script into an instant message, which would be executed in a victim's Sametime client once the message is viewed and a mouse-over action is performed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1292938 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0355.title: PHPEcho CMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0355.body: PHPEcho CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0357.title: Mini File Host upload.php file include
CVE-2008-0357.body: Mini File Host could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted POST request to the upload.php script using the language parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of January 2008.

CVE-2008-0358.body: Pixelpost is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the album parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0363.title: Clever Copy postcomment.php and gallery.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0363.body: Clever Copy is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0365.body: CORE FORCE is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Firewall and Registry modules. CVE-2008-0371.body: aliTalk is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0375.body: The OKI C5510MFP printer could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. Administrator password resets do not require authentication. CVE-2008-0399.title: Toshiba Surveillix RecordSend Class ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0399.body: The Toshiba Surveillix RecordSend Class ActiveX control (MeIpCamX.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SetPort() or SetIpAddress() method. CVE-2008-0401.title: IBM Tivoli Provisioning Manager for OS Deployment logging function buffer overflow

CVE-2008-0403.body: Belkin Wireless G Plus MIMO Router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the authentication process of the SaveCfgFile.cgi. CVE-2008-0405.title: HFS (HTTP File Server) unspecified command execution
CVE-2008-0405.body: HFS (HTTP File Server) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-0416.title: Multiple Mozilla products character encoding cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0416.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MFSA 2008-13 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information.
