CVE-2008-0447.title: Foojan WMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0447.body: Foojan WMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the story parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0448.title: phpSearch class_HTTPRetriever.php file include
CVE-2008-0448.body: phpSearch could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the class_HTTPRetriever.php script using the libcurlemuinc parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0449.title: VP-ASP Shopping Cart paypalresult.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0449.body: VP-ASP Shopping Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the paypalresult.asp script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (paypalresult.asp) from the VP-ASP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0453.title: EasySiteNetwork Recipe list.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0453.body: EasySiteNetwork Recipe is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the list.php script using the categoryid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0454.title: Skype for Windows cross-zone code execution
CVE-2008-0454.body: Skype could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-zone restrictions and execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system, caused by the insecure usage of Internet Explorer when loading content from certain Web sites. Script loaded from the Dailymotion or Metacafe Web site will execute in Internet Explorer's Local Zone instead of the Internet Zone. By persuading a victim to perform a search for a video on the Skype video gallery section of one of the affected Web sites, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into the "Add video to chat" or "Add video to mood" dialog using the "Title" or "Description" video metadata field. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the victim's system.Upgrade to the latest version of Skype (3.8 or later), available from the Skype Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0455.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_negotiation cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0455.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of HTML code embedded within uploaded files by the mod_negotiation module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the HTTP 406 Not Acceptable message and HTTP 300 Multiple Choices message body to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to GLSA-200803-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0456.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_negotiation HTTP response splitting
CVE-2008-0456.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting attacks, caused by improper validation of filenames by the mod_negotiation module that contain a Line Feed and are returned in the HTTP response header. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and modify HTTP headers using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to cause the server to return a split response, once the URL is clicked. This would allow the attacker to perform further attacks, such as Web cache poisoning, cross-site scripting, and possibly obtain sensitive information.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Refer to GLSA-200803-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0458.title: SLAED CMS sources.php file include
CVE-2008-0458.body: SLAED CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the sources.php script using the newlang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0459.title: Liquid-Silver CMS index.php file include
CVE-2008-0459.body: Liquid-Silver CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the update parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0461.title: PHP-Nuke index.php script Search module SQL injection
CVE-2008-0461.body: PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker with knowledge of the database table prefix could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script in the Search module using the sid parameter, which would allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information, such as the administrator's MD5 hash password, and add, modify or delete data in the backend database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0462.title: Archive module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0462.body: The Archive module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. If the victim has certain permissions, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-010 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0465.title: Seagull STABLE optimizer.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-0465.body: Seagull STABLE could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the optimizer.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the files parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Seagull STABLE (0.6.4 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0467.title: Firebird username buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0467.body: Firebird is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking while processing usernames. By sending an overly long username, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Firebird (2.1 RC1 or later), available from SourceForge.net:Files. See References.

CVE-2008-0469.title: Tiger PHP News System index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0469.body: Tiger PHP News System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which would allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information, including the administrator's hashed password, and add, modify or delete data in the backend database.Upgrade to the latest version of Tiger PHP News System (1.0 beta build 63 or later), available from the Tiger PHP News System Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0474.title: ManageEngine Applications Manager multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0474.body: ManageEngine Applications Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the /jsp/DiscoveryProfiles.jsp, /jsp/ThresholdActionConfiguration.jsp and the jsp/UpdateGlobalSettings.jsp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0475.title: ManageEngine Applications Manager Home->Summary information disclosure
CVE-2008-0475.body: ManageEngine Applications Manager could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted URL request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the Home->Summary and other sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0476.body: ManageEngine Applications Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a failure to check authentication in certain pages. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and modify application settings or obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0477.body: The Move Networks Upgrade Manager ActiveX control (QMPUpgrade.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments to the Upgrade() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0523.title: SoftCart SoftCart.exe cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0523.body: SoftCart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the SoftCart.exe application. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the License_Plate, License_State, Ticket_Date, or Ticket_Number parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0524.title: Yamaha RT Series Routers HTTP cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-0524.body: Yamaha RT Series Routers are vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to modify the password and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Refer to the YAMAHA Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0527.title: Cisco Unified IP Phone HTTP server denial of service
CVE-2008-0527.body: Cisco Unified IP Phones running SCCP firmware are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the HTTP server. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request to TCP port 80, a remote attacker could reboot the phone.Refer to cisco-sa-20080213-phone for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0528.title: Cisco Unified IP Phone SIP MIME buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0528.body: Cisco Unified IP Phones running SIP firmware are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling MIME encoded data. By sending a specially-crafted SIP message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the phone.Refer to cisco-sa-20080213-phone for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0531.title: Cisco Unified IP Phone SIP proxy buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0531.body: Cisco Unified IP Phones running SIP firmware are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted challenge/response message, a remote attacker controlling the SIP proxy could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the phone.Refer to cisco-sa-20080213-phone for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0532.title: Cisco Secure Access Control Server (ACS) for Windows User-Changeable Password (UCP) utility CSuserCGI.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0532.body: The Cisco Secure Access Control Server (ACS) for Windows User-Changeable Password (UCP) utility is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by CSuserCGI.exe. By sending an overly long request to the Logout, Main, and ChangePass parameters, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20080312-ucp for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0583.title: Skype for Windows cross-zone code execution
CVE-2008-0583.body: Skype could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-zone restrictions and execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system, caused by the insecure usage of Internet Explorer when loading content from certain Web sites. Script loaded from the Dailymotion or Metacafe Web site will execute in Internet Explorer's Local Zone instead of the Internet Zone. By persuading a victim to perform a search for a video on the Skype video gallery section of one of the affected Web sites, a remote attacker could inject malicious script into the "Add video to chat" or "Add video to mood" dialog using the "Title" or "Description" video metadata field. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the victim's system.Upgrade to the latest version of Skype (3.8 or later), available from the Skype Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0586.title: IBM AIX Logical Volume Manager multiple commands buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0586.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted request to the lchangevg, ldeletepv, putlvodm, lvaryoffvg, or lvgenminor command, a local attacker with system group membership could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for your system, as listed in the IBM Subscription service Bulletin. See References.

CVE-2008-0587.title: IBM AIX uspchrp buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0587.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted request to the uspchrp command, a local attacker with system group membership could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for your system, as listed in the IBM Subscription service Bulletin. See References.

CVE-2008-0588.title: IBM AIX utape buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0588.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted request to the utape command, a local attacker with system group membership could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for your system, as listed in the IBM Subscription service Bulletin. See References.

CVE-2008-0596.title: CUPS IPP browse memory leak denial of service
CVE-2008-0596.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak error during IPP browse requests. By sending a specially-crafted IPP packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of all available memory resources or crash the service.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0597.title: CUPS IPP browse use-after-free denial of service
CVE-2008-0597.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by use-after-free error during IPP browse requests. By sending a specially-crafted IPP packet, a remote attacker could crash the service.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0598.title: Linux kernel 32-bit and 64-bit emulation memory disclosure
CVE-2008-0598.body: An unspecified vulnerability related to 32-bit and 64-bit emulation in the Linux kernel could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious binary to read portions of uninitialized memory.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux kernel (2.6.25.10 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0606.title: Shambo2 component for Joomla! and Mambo index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0606.body: The Shambo2 component for Joomla! and Mambo is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the Itemid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0616.title: DMSGuestbook plugin for WordPress unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-0616.body: The DMSGuestbook plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to multiple SQL injections. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script using unknown parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0631.title: MailBee Objects ActiveX control MailBee.dll file overwrite
CVE-2008-0631.body: The MailBee Objects ActiveX control (MailBee.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple insecure methods to create and overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0634.title: Sejoong Namo ActiveSquare ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0634.body: The Sejoong (SJ) Namo Web Editor ActiveSquare ActiveX Control (NamoInstaller.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the Install() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0658.title: OpenLDAP modrdn operation denial of service
CVE-2008-0658.body: OpenLDAP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the modrdn operation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a NOOP control to crash the slapd daemon.Refer to the OpenLDAP Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0659.title: MySpace MySpaceUploader.ocx ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0659.body: MySpace MySpaceUploader.ocx ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments to the Action parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the MySpace MySpaceUploader.ocx ActiveX control (1.0.0.6 or later), available from the MySpace Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0674.title: PCRE character class buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0674.body: The PCRE (Perl Compatible Regular Expressions) library is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing character classes. By sending an overly long character class containing codepoints larger than 255, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application using the affected library to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PCRE (7.6 or later), available from the PCRE Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate upgrade for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0686.title: NeoReferences component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0686.body: NeoReferences component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0691.title: WP-Footnotes plugin for WordPress admin_panel.php security bypass
CVE-2008-0691.body: The WP-Footnotes plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an authentication failure when accessing the admin panel. By sending a URL request containing the full path to the admin_panel.php, an attacker could access the admin panel.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0703.title: sflog! blog and index.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-0703.body: sflog! could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the blog or the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the permalink or section parameters to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0704.title: HP OpenVMS SSH server unauthorized access
CVE-2008-0704.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the HP OpenVMS TCP/IP Services SSH server running on HP Integrity and HP Alpha could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access using unknown attack vectors.Refer to HPSBOV02278 SSRT071479 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0707.title: HP StorageWorks Library and Tape Tools unspecified privilege escalation
CVE-2008-0707.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP StorageWorks Library and Tape Tools could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of StorageWorks Library and Tape Tools (4.5 SR1 or later), available from the HP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0709.title: HP Select Identity user account unspecified unauthorized access
CVE-2008-0709.body: An unspecified error in HP Select Identity could allow an authenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to user accounts using unknown attack vectors.Refer to HPSBMA02317 SSRT080026 rev1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0714.title: Mihalism Multi Host users.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0714.body: Mihalism Multi Host is vulnerable to SQL injection. If lost_password_go is selected as the act setting, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the users.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0727.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) oninit.exe password buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0727.body: IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by oninit.exe. By sending an overly long password, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM APARs IC55209, IC55210 and IC55982 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0727.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) oninit.exe DBPATH buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0727.body: IBM Informix Dynamic Server (IDS) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by oninit.exe. By sending an overly long DBPATH variable, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM APARs IC55207, IC55208 and IC55982 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0729.title: Apple iPhone MobileSafari denial of service
CVE-2008-0729.body: The Apple iPhone MobileSafari built-in Web browser is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using JavaScript code containing an overly long string to consume all available memory resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0733.title: Counter Strike Portals index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0733.body: Counter Strike Portals is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0734.title: Limbo CMS admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0734.body: Limbo CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using the cuid cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0736.title: CandyPress eCommerce suite SA_shipFedExMeter.asp path disclosure
CVE-2008-0736.body: CandyPress eCommerce suite could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the SA_shipFedExMeter.asp script using an invalid FedExAccount parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of CandyPress eCommerce suite (4.1.1.27 or later), available from the CandyPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0744.title: Pre Hotel and Resorts reservation user_login.asp page SQL injection
CVE-2008-0744.body: Pre Hotel and Resorts reservation is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the user_login.asp script, which could allow the attacker to bypass login and view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0750.title: Blackboard philboard_forum.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0750.body: Blackboard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the philboard_forum.asp script using the forumid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0752.title: Neogallery component for Joomla! and index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0752.body: The Neogallery component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2008-0761.title: The Prince Clan Chess Club (pcchess) component for Joomla! and Mambo index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0761.body: The Prince Clan Chess Club (pcchess) component for Joomla! and Mambo is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the user_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0762.title: Iomezun component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0762.body: The Iomezun component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0763.title: Larson Network Print Server NPSpcSVR.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0763.body: Larson Network Print Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by NPSpcSVR.exe. By sending an overly long string to the LICENSE command, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0769.title: Livelink UTF-7 security bypass
CVE-2008-0769.body: Livelink could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The character set is not set to UTF-8 by default. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via UTF-7 encoded Web pages to bypass browser security restrictions and conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Upgrade to the latest version of Livelink (version 10 or later), available from the Open Text Corporation Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0771.title: Real Estate Web Site default.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0771.body: Real Estate Web Site is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the default.asp script using the txtusername or txtpassword parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Real Estate Web Site, available from the Real Estate Web Site Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0778.title: Apple QuickTime QTPlugin.ocx ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0778.body: The Apple QuickTime ActiveX control (QTPlugin.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments to the SetBgColor(), SetHREF(), SetMovieName(), SetTarget(), or SetMatrix() function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0779.title: FortiClient fortimon.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2008-0779.body: Fortinet FortiClient could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the fortimon.sys filter driver. By sending a specially-crafted request to the device driver, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of FortiClient (3.0 MR5 Patch 4 or 3.0 MR6 or later), available from the Fortinet Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0782.title: MoinMoin cookie directory traversal
CVE-2008-0782.body: MoinMoin could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted userform action cookie containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the MOIN_ID user ID to overwrite arbitrary files on the system and create unauthorized user accounts.Upgrade to the latest version of MoinMoin (1.6.1 or later), available from the MoinMoin Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0783.title: Cacti data_input.php cross site scripting
CVE-2008-0783.body: Cacti is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the data_input.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the action parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Cacti (0.8.7b or later), available from the Cacti Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0792.title: F-Secure multiple antivirus products CAB and RAR archive security bypass
CVE-2008-0792.body: Multiple F-Secure antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when scanning CAB and RAR archives. By creating a specially-crafted CAB or RAR archive file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass antivirus scans.Refer to F-Secure Security Bulletin FSC-2008-1/FSC-2007-7 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0793.title: Tendenci CMS search.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0793.body: Tendenci CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the category, searchtext, jobcategoryid, or contactcompany parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.The Tendenci Blog reports that the vendor has updated the current Web version of this product to cover this vulnerability. See References.

CVE-2008-0794.title: Affiliate Market header.php file include
CVE-2008-0794.body: Affiliate Market could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the header.php script using the language parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0795.title: XfaQ component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0795.body: The XfaQ component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the aid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0797.title: ITheora download.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-0797.body: ITheora could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the download.php script containing directory traversal sequences (/../) in the url parameter to download and view arbitrary local files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of ITheora (1.0rc2 or later), available from the ITheora Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0798.title: artmedic weblog artmedic_print.php file include
CVE-2008-0798.body: artmedic weblog could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the artmedic_print.php script using the date parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0801.title: Paxxgallery component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0801.body: The Paxxgallery component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the iid or gid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0803.title: Lookstrike Lan Manager sys_conf[path][real] parameter file include
CVE-2008-0803.body: Lookstrike Lan Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the sys_conf[path][real] parameter to specify a malicious file from a local or remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability locally to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0815.title: Mezun component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0815.body: The Mezun component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0817.title: Filebase component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0817.body: The Filebase component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the filecatid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0820.title: Etomite CMS index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0820.body: Etomite CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the $_SERVER['PHP_INFO'] variable a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0823.title: Header image module for Drupal security bypass
CVE-2008-0823.body: An unspecified error in the Header image module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the module's administration pages.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-017 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0827.title: Books module for PHP-Nuke cid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-0827.body: Books module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0832.title: Qur'an component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0832.body: The Qur'an component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0837.body: The Search Unleashed plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the log display. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Search Unleashed plugin for WordPress (0.2.11 or later), available from the Urban Giraffe Web site. CVE-2008-0839.title: astatsPRO component for Joomla! refer.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0839.body: The astatsPRO component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the refer.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0842.title: Clasifier component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0842.body: Clasifier component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0844.body: The PcCookBook component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0847.title: myTopics module for XOOPS print.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0847.body: myTopics module for XOOPS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-0848.title: Crafty Syntax Live Help multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0848.body: Crafty Syntax Live Help (CSLH) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the lostsheep.php, livehelp.php, user_questions.php, and leavemessage.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked.
