CVE-2008-0878.title: MyAnnonces module for RunCMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0878.body: The MyAnnonces module for RunCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cid parameter in a view action, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0879.title: Web_Links module for PHP-Nuke cid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-0879.body: Web_Links module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the cid parameter in a viewlink action, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0884.title: Red Hat lspp-eal4-config-ibm and capp-lspp-eal4-config-hp packages insecure permissions
CVE-2008-0884.body: Red Hat could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by insecure permissions assigned to the lspp-eal4-config-ibm and capp-lspp-eal4-config-hp packages. The "/etc/pam.d/system-auth" file is configured with world-writable permissions. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2008-0888.title: UnZip inflate_dynamic() code execution
CVE-2008-0888.body: UnZip could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the passing of uninitialized pointers in the inflate_dynamic() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted ZIP file to release a restricted memory region and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to RPL-2317 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0890.title: Red Hat Directory Server jars directory insecure permissions
CVE-2008-0890.body: Red Hat Directory Server uses insecure permissions on the jars directory. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify Java Archive (JAR) files or execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to RHSA-2008:0173-3 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0892.title: Red Hat Directory Server repl-monitor-cgi.pl CGI script command execution
CVE-2008-0892.body: Red Hat Directory Server could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the repl-monitor-cgi.pl CGI script prior to a system() call. A remote attacker with access to the "replication monitor" page could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with the privileges of the Administration Server.Refer to RHSA-2008:0201-4 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0893.title: Red Hat Directory Server CGI scripts security bypass
CVE-2008-0893.body: Red Hat Directory Server could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper restricting of CGI scripts. An attacker with access to TCP port 9830 could exploit this vulnerability and bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information and perform other arbitrary tasks on the vulnerable system.Refer to RHSA-2008:0201-4 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0906.title: Docum module for PHP-Nuke modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0906.body: The Docum module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the artid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0908.title: Schoolwires Academic Portal browse.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0908.body: Schoolwires Academic Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the browse.asp script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0916.title: hwdVideoShare component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0916.body: The hwdVideoShare component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0926.title: Novell eDirectory eMBox utility unspecified
CVE-2008-0926.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Novell eDirectory related to the eMBox utility could allow an attacker to gain access to local files or crash the application.Refer to Novell Security Alert Document ID: 3866911 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0927.title: Novell eDirectory dhost.exe denial of service
CVE-2008-0927.body: Novell eDirectory is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the dhost.exe service when processing Connection headers. By sending multiple HTTP requests containing specially-crafted "Connection" headers, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available CPU resources, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to Novell Security Alert Document ID: 3829452 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0941.title: Aeries Browser Interface (ABI) new event cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0941.body: Aeries Browser Interface (ABI) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the title form field when adding a new event to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the homepage is loaded. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0942.title: Aeries Browser Interface GradebookStuScores.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-0942.body: Aeries Browser Interface is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the GradebookStuScores.asp script using the GrdBk parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0948.title: MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) RPC library FD_SETSIZE buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0948.body: The MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) RPC library as used by libgssrpc and kadmind is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by a memory corruption error during file descriptor handling. If a large number of open file descriptors in a process is permitted and the FD_SETSIZE macro is not defined in unistd.h, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via RPC connections to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the kadmind service to crash.Refer to MIT krb5 Security Advisory 2008-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-0955.title: Creative Software AutoUpdate Engine ActiveX control cachefolder buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0955.body: The Creative Software AutoUpdate Engine ActiveX control (CTSUEng.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the cachefolder method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0957.title: PhotoStockPlus Uploader Tool ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0957.body: The PhotoStockPlus Uploader Tool ActiveX control (PSPUploader.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow when handling specific initialization parameters. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to Microsoft Security Advisory (956391) for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0958.title: NCTAudioEditor NCTAudioGrabber2 ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0958.body: Multiple vendor products using the NCTAudioEditor NCTAudioGrabber2 ActiveX control (NCTAudioGrabber2.dll) are vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows when handling specific methods. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0959.title: Multiple vendors NCTAudioInformation2 ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0959.body: Multiple vendor products that use the NCTAudioInformation2 ActiveX control (NCTAudioInformation2.dll) are vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows when handling specific methods. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the NCTAudioInformation2 ActiveX control (2.5.9.252 or later), available from the Online Media Technologies Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0961.title: EMC DiskXtender authentication bypass
CVE-2008-0961.body: EMC DiskXtender could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. The File System Manager, MediaStor, and License Server components contain a hard-coded login and password. By creating a connection to an affected RPC interface using the hard-coded credentials, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication restrictions and possibly execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available for registered users from the EMC Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0962.title: EMC DiskXtender File System Manager buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0962.body: The EMC DiskXtender is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the File System Manager. By sending an overly long string to the RPC interface, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available for registered users from the EMC Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0964.title: Sun Solaris snoop(1M) buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0964.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by snoop(1M) when the -o option is not enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted SMB packets to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the user or cause the application to crash. Note: When snoop(1M) is invoked by root, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with nobody privileges.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 240101 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0985.title: Android SDK GIFImageDecoder::onDecode() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0985.body: Android SDK is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GIFImageDecoder::onDecode() function. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted GIF image file via an Android enabled device, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the device with elevated privileges or cause the device to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Android SDK (m5-rc15 or later), available from the Android Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0986.title: Android SDK BMP::readFromStream method integer overflow
CVE-2008-0986.body: Android SDK is vulnerable to an integer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the BMP::readFromStream method. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted BMP image file via an Android enabled device, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the device with elevated privileges or cause the device to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Android SDK (m5-rc15 or later), available from the Android Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0987.title: Apple Mac OS X Image Raw DNG image buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0987.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by Image Raw. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Adobe Digital Negative (DNG) image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects Apple Aperture and iPhoto.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.or Apple Aperture and iPhoto:Apply the Digital Camera RAW Compatibility Update (2.0), available from the Apple Software Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0990.title: Apple Mac OS X notifyd denial of service
CVE-2008-0990.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service. Mach port death notifications are accepted by notifyd without proper validation of kernel origination. By sending a Mach port death notification to notifyd, a local attacker could prevent applications that use the notify(3) API from receiving notifications.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0994.title: Apple Mac OS X Preview weak encryption
CVE-2008-0994.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in Preview. The PDF file is saved using a 40-bit RC4 weak encryption scheme. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to decrypt the file and possibly obtain other sensitive information.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0995.title: Apple Mac OS X Printing component weak encryption
CVE-2008-0995.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in the Printing component. The encrypted PDF file is printed using a 40-bit RC4 encryption scheme. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to decrypt the file and possibly obtain other sensitive information.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0996.title: Apple Mac OS X print queue information disclosure
CVE-2008-0996.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. Print queue authentication credentials are saved to the disk. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain print queue authentication credentials.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0997.title: Apple Mac OS X AppKit PPD file buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0997.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by AppKit when querying network printers. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PostScript Printer Description (PPD) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0998.title: Apple Mac OS X NetCfgTool code execution
CVE-2008-0998.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified vulnerability in NetCfgTool in the System Configuration component. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted message to bypass the authorization process and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM level privileges.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0999.title: Apple Mac OS X Universal Disc Format (UDF) file system denial of service
CVE-2008-0999.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the Universal Disc Format (UDF) file system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted UDF disk image, a remote attacker could crash the system.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1000.title: Apple Mac OS X Wiki Server ContentServer.py directory traversal
CVE-2008-1000.body: A vulnerability in the Apple Mac OS X Wiki Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to create arbitrary files on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to the ContentServer.py script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in an uploaded file attachment which could allow the attacker to traverse directories and overwrite or create arbitrary files outside the Web root directory.Apply Security Update 2008-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1001.title: Apple Safari error page cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1001.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the error page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1002.title: Apple Safari javascript: URLs security bypass
CVE-2008-1002.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by improper validation of javascript: URLs. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute JavaScript in the context of another site. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1003.title: Apple Safari WebCore document.domain property security bypass
CVE-2008-1003.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability within the WebCore component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass policy restrictions and conduct cross-site scripting attacks in sites that have the document.domain property set, or between HTTP and HTTPS sites with the same document.domain.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1005.title: Apple Safari WebCore weak security
CVE-2008-1005.body: Apple Safari could provide weaker than expected security. The WebCore component fails to properly mask the password field when reverse conversion is used with the Kotoeri input method. This would allow physically proximate attackers to view passwords being entered by other users.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1007.title: Apple Safari frame navigation policy security bypass
CVE-2008-1007.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by the failure to enforce the frame navigation policy for Java applets by the WebCore component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could use Java to bypass policy restrictions and possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1008.title: Apple Safari document.domain cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1008.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the WebCore component. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the document.domain property to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1009.title: Apple Safari history object security bypass
CVE-2008-1009.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the WebCore component when handling history objects. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass policy restrictions and inject JavaScript which will run in the context of other frames. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1010.title: Apple Safari WebKit JavaScript regular expressions buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1010.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the WebKit component when handling JavaScript regular expressions. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1014.title: Apple QuickTime movie files information disclosure
CVE-2008-1014.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of URLs embedded within movie files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QuickTime movie file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1015.title: Apple QuickTime data reference atoms buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1015.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling malformed data reference atoms. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted movie file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1016.title: Apple QuickTime movie media tracks code execution
CVE-2008-1016.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper processing of movie media tracks. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted movie file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1019.title: Apple QuickTime PICT image file buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1019.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in quicktime.qts, caused by improper bounds checking when handling malformed PICTfiles. By persuading a victim to open a malicious PICT image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1020.title: Apple QuickTime PICT Kodak image file buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1020.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of PICT image files using KODAK encoding. By persuading a victim to open a malicious PICT image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1021.title: Apple QuickTime Animation codec content buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1021.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in the Animation codec content handling. By persuading a victim to open a malicious move file using run length encoding, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1022.title: Apple QuickTime VR movie obji atoms buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1022.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of VR movies. By persuading a victim to view a malicious VR movie file containing am obji atom of zero size, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1023.title: Apple QuickTime Clip opcodes buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1023.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing Clip opcodes. By persuading a victim to open a malicious PICT image file containing malformed Clip opcodes, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1025.title: Apple Safari Webkit host name cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1025.body: Apple Safari Webkit is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a colon character in the host name in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to APPLE-SA-2008-04-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1026.title: Apple Safari WebKit pcre_compile.cpp buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1026.body: Apple Safari WebKit is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by pcre_compile.cpp. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing JavaScript regular expressions with large, nested repetition counts, an attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to APPLE-SA-2008-04-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1027.title: Apple Mac OS X Apple File Protocol (AFP) server security bypass
CVE-2008-1027.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The Apple File Protocol (AFP) server does not properly check if served files or folders are designated for sharing. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to remotely access permitted resources that are not designated for sharing.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1028.title: Apple Mac OS X AppKit code execution
CVE-2008-1028.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in AppKit. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document file in an application that uses AppKit, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1031.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreGraphics unspecified code execution
CVE-2008-1031.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error in CoreGraphics. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1033.title: Apple Mac OS X CUPS information disclosure
CVE-2008-1033.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in CUPS. Authentication environment variables are exposed when printing to password-protected printers with debug logging enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to obtain the victim's username, password, and domain information.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1036.title: Apple Mac OS X International Components for Unicode (ICU) security bypass
CVE-2008-1036.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in International Components for Unicode (ICU) conversions. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing specially-crafted character sequences, an attacker could bypass content filters to obtain sensitive information and perform cross-site scripting attacks.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For International Components for Unicode (ICU):Upgrade to the latest version of International Components for Unicode (ICU) (4.0 or later), available from the ICU Web Site. See References.

CVE-2008-1039.title: Porar Webboard question.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-1039.body: Porar Webboard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the question.asp script using the QID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1042.title: PHP Download Manager body.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-1042.body: PHP Download Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the body.inc.php script using the content parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1043.title: php User Base header.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-1043.body: php User Base could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the header.inc.php script using the menu=[SHELL] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1048.title: Plume CMS xmedia.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1048.body: Plume CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the xmedia.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the dir parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1052.title: SurgeFTP Content-Length denial of service
CVE-2008-1052.body: SurgeFTP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error during the parsing of HTTP headers. By sending an overly large Content-Length HTTP header to TCP port 7021, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1053.title: Kose_Yazilari module for PHP-Nuke artid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1053.body: The Kose_Yazilari module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the artid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1054.title: SurgeMail webmail.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1054.body: SurgeMail is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of environment strings by the webmail.exe command. By sending an HTTP GET request containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1056.title: PowerBroker argv[0] buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1056.body: PowerBroker is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the pbrun, pbsh, and pbksh SUID binaries. By sending an overly long argv[0] argument, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to the PowerBroker Security Upgrade for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1059.title: Sniplets plugin for WordPress syntax_highlight.php file include
CVE-2008-1059.body: Sniplets plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the syntax_highlight.php script using the libpath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1060.title: Sniplets plugin for WordPress execute.php code execution
CVE-2008-1060.body: Sniplets plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the execute.php script. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the text parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1063.title: XM-Memberstats module for XOOPS sortby parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1063.body: XM-Memberstats module for XOOPS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sortby parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1064.title: RMSOFT Gallery System images.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1064.body: RMSOFT Gallery System is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the images.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "q" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1076.title: Interspire Shopping Cart search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1076.body: Interspire Shopping Cart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the search_query parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1083.title: Microsoft Windows GDI EMF and WMF header buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1083.body: Microsoft Windows graphic device interface (GDI) is vulnerable to an heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of EMF and WMF image file headers. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted EMF or WMF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. OR Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1086.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer hxvz.dll object code execution
CVE-2008-1086.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability that occurs when Internet Explorer attempts to instantiate the hxvz.dll object as an ActiveX control. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page containing an invalid object, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. OR Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-1088.title: Microsoft Project file memory allocation code execution
CVE-2008-1088.body: Microsoft Project could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of memory resource allocation when opening Project files. By persuading a victim to open a malicious Project file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. OR Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-1095.title: Sun Solaris Internet Protocol denial of service
CVE-2008-1095.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Internet Protocol implementation. By sending specially-crafted packets, a remote authenticated attacker could bypass the firewall security policies and cause the system to panic.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 200183 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1096.title: ImageMagick and GraphicsMagick load_tile code execution
CVE-2008-1096.body: ImageMagick and GraphicsMagick could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the load_tile function in the XCF coder. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .xcf file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1097.title: ImageMagick and GraphicsMagick ReadPCXImage buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1097.body: ImageMagick and GraphicsMagick are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ReadPCXImage function in the PCX coder. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .pcx file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.For GraphicsMagick:Upgrade to the latest version of GraphicsMagick(1.1.7-13 or later), available from the GraphicsMagick Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2008-1098.title: MoinMoin multiple actions cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1098.body: MoinMoin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the gui editor formatter or when executing the RenamePage or DeletePage action. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page name or the destination page name to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MoinMoin (1.5.8 or later), available from the MoinMoin SecurityFixes Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1099.title: MoinMoin _macro_Getval information disclosure
CVE-2008-1099.body: MoinMoin could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper enforcing of ACLs by _macro_Getval in wikimacro.py. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read restricted pages and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of MoinMoin (1.5.8 or later), available from the MoinMoin SecurityFixes Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1102.title: Blender imb_loadhdr() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1102.body: Blender is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by imb_loadhdr() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Blender (.blend) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to the Blender SVN Respository for patch, upgrade, suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1104.title: Foxit Reader util.printf() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1104.body: Foxit Reader is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing format strings containing malicious format specifiers in the util.printf() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Foxit Reader (2.3 build 2912 or later), available from the Foxit Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1105.title: Xerox ESS/Network Controller Samba code execution
CVE-2008-1105.body: The Xerox ESS/Network Controller could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of SMB responses within the Samba code. By sending a specially-crafted Remote Service Message Block (SMB) message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to Xerox Security Bulletin XRX08-009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1106.title: Akamai Red Swoosh client HTTP referer cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-1106.body: Akamai Red Swoosh client is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by an error when handling HTTP Referers. By modifying the HTTP referer header, a remote attacker could cause the victim to download and execute arbitrary files and URLs. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Akamai Red Swoosh client (3333 or later), available from the Akamai Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1107.title: Danske Bank Danske e-Sec Control Module ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1107.body: The Danske Bank Danske e-Sec Control Module ActiveX control (DanskeSikker.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by an error logging function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments to insecure methods when the ActiveX control has been enabled in a certain way, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS10-034. See References.

CVE-2008-1109.title: Evolution iCalendar DESCRIPTION buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1109.body: Evolution is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by iCalendar. By persuading a victim in calendar view to reply to an iCalendar request containing an attachment with an overly long DESCRIPTION value, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1110.title: xine-lib demuxers/demux_asf.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1110.body: The xineplug_dmx_asf.so plugin in xine-lib is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the demuxers/demux_asf.c (the ASF demuxer). By parsing specially-crafted ASF headers, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See Refereneces.

CVE-2008-1118.title: Timbuktu Pro log security bypass
CVE-2008-1118.body: Timbuktu Pro could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. Packets generated from a remote peer that contain logging information fields are not properly validated before being entered into the log. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof log entries via the computer name, user name, or IP address field.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1134.title: Omegasoft Insel OMEGALogon and OMEGA[MANDATOR] cookie weak security
CVE-2008-1134.body: Omegasoft Insel could provide weaker than expected security. The OMEGALogon and OMEGA[MANDATOR] cookies permit logon without a password. By creating a specially-crafted cookie containing a valid username, a remote attacker could launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1137.title: Gary's Cookbook component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1137.body: The Gary's Cookbook component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1145.title: Ruby WEBrick directory traversal
CVE-2008-1145.body: Ruby could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error in the WEBrick library. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing an encoded backslash (..%5c) or files that match patterns specified in the :NondisclosureName option to view arbitrary files on the system.Refer to the Ruby Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1151.title: Cisco IOS VPDN PPTP session termination denial of service
CVE-2008-1151.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak error when PPTP is used as the tunneling protocol on a virtual private dial-up network (VPDN). After a PPTP session is terminated, memory is allocated to a *Dead* process and not subsequently released. By terminating multiple PPTP sessions, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of all available memory resources.Refer to cisco-sa-20080326-pptp for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1152.title: Cisco IOS Data-link Switching (DLSw) denial of service
CVE-2008-1152.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when Data-link Switching (DLSw) is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted UDP or IP Protocol 91 packet, a remote attacker could cause a memory leak or cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20080326-dlsw for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1154.title: Multiple Cisco Devices Disaster Recovery Framework (DRF) command execution
CVE-2008-1154.body: Multiple Cisco devices could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. The Disaster Recovery Framework (DRF) fails to perform authentication checks on requests received over the network. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and connect to the DRF Master server to perform DRF related tasks and execute arbitrary commands on the system with administrative privileges.Refer to cisco-sa-20080403-drf for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1156.title: Cisco IOS Multicast Virtual Private Network (MVPN) information disclosure
CVE-2008-1156.body: Cisco IOS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when Multicast Virtual Private Network (MVPN) is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted Multicast Distribution Tree (MDT) Data Join message, a remote attacker could cause VPNs that are not connected to the same edge router as the attacker to leak multicast traffic when the BGP peer IP address and the multicast group address of other MPLS VPNs are known.Refer to cisco-sa-20080326-mvpn for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1161.title: xine-lib Matroska demuxer buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1161.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Matroska demuxer (demuxers/demux_matroska.c). By sending a specially-crafted Matroska file with invalid frame sizes, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the apprpriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1165.title: Flyspray item_summary cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1165.body: Flyspray is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php when performing a details action. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the item_summary parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Flyspray (0.9.9.5 or later), available from the Flyspray Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1168.title: sarg User-Agent header cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1168.body: sarg is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. If process support for viewing Squid User-Agent logs is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the User-Agent header to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the log is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of sarg (2.2.4 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. CVE-2008-1169.title: SCI Photo Chat Server GET request directory traversal
CVE-2008-1169.body: SCI Photo Chat Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted GET request containing "dot dot" sequences using either forward slash or back slash characters (in the form of /../ or \..\) to traverse directories and download arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1170.title: KCWiki wiki.php file include
CVE-2008-1170.body: KCWiki could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the minimal/wiki.php and simplest/wiki.php scripts using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TorrentTrader (FINAL v1.08 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. CVE-2008-1176.title: Affiliate Market sideblock.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1176.body: Affiliate Market is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the sideblock.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the siteblock4 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2008-1177.title: Affiliate Market detail.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1177.body: Affiliate Market is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1178.body: Centreon could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-1179.title: Centreon color_picker.php cross-site scripting

CVE-2008-1189.body: Sun Java Web Start in Sun JDK and JRE is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the useEncodingDecl() function. CVE-2008-1196.body: Sun Java Web Start is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Java Web Start component (javaws.exe). CVE-2008-1197.title: NETGEAR WN802T SSID denial of service
CVE-2008-1197.body: NETGEAR WN802T is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling certain association requests. By sending an association request containing a NULL SSID, a remote attacker could cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1201.title: Adobe Flash multiple products FLA file code execution
CVE-2008-1201.body: Adobe Flash CS3 Professional, Flash Professional, and Flash Basic could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error when parsing FLA files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FLA file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1202.title: Adobe LiveCycle Workflow login page cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1202.body: Adobe LiveCycle Workflow is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web management login page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to APSB08-10 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1204.title: Sun Java System Access Manager Administration Console cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1204.body: Sun Java System Access Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Administration Console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter when parsing the "Help" or "Version" window in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 201251 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1207.title: Fujitsu Interstage Smart Repository update function denial of service
CVE-2008-1207.body: Multiple Fujitsu Interstage products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Smart Repository update function. By sending a specially-crafted request containing overly large data to an attribute value, a remote attacker could crash the application.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available from the Fujitsu Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1207.title: Fujitsu Interstage Application Server Smart Repository denial of service
CVE-2008-1207.body: Fujitsu Interstage Application Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the Smart Repository component. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to stop responding.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (interstage-sr-200801e.html), available from the FUJITSU Web site. CVE-2008-1208.title: Check Point VPN-1 UTM Edge login page cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1208.body: Check Point VPN-1 UTM Edge is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login page. CVE-2008-1213.title: Numara FootPrints Title cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1213.body: Numara FootPrints is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Title form field when setting an appointment to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the data is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (patch_2008-03-28_81_92594_security_fixes.zip), available from the Numara Software Web site. CVE-2008-1214.title: Numara FootPrints PROJECTNUM command execution
CVE-2008-1214.body: Numara FootPrints could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the MRcgi/MRProcessIncomingForms.pl script prior to a system() call. CVE-2008-1215.title: user-ppp command_Expand_Interpret() buffer overflow

CVE-2008-1220.title: 4nChat module for PHP-Nuke roomid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1220.body: 4nChat module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the roomid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1222.title: Dokeos unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1222.body: Dokeos is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (1.8.4 SP3), available from the Dokeos Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1226.title: Zimbra Collaboration Suite email cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1226.body: Zimbra Collaboration Suite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted email containing script code embedded within an attachment file, which would be executed in the victim's Web browser, once the message is opened. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Zimbra Collaboration Suite (4.5.10 or later), available from the Zimbra Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1227.title: SILC Toolkit silc_fingerprint() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1227.body: SILC Toolkit is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the silc_fingerprint() function. By sending a specially-crafted request containing overly long data, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SILC Toolkit (1.1.6 or later), available from the SILC Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1229.title: JSPWiki Edit.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1229.body: JSPWiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Edit.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the editor parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of JSPWiki (2.6.1 or later), available from the JSPWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1230.title: JSPWiki Install.jsp file upload
CVE-2008-1230.body: JSPWiki could allow a remote attacker to upload .jsp files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted Install.jsp file as an attachment, which could allow the attacker to upload malicious .jsp files to the entry pages and execute arbitrary script code on the system, once the attachment is opened by the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of JSPWiki (2.6.1 or later), available from the JSPWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1232.title: Apache Tomcat HttpServletResponse.sendError() cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1232.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the HttpServletResponse.sendError() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "Reason-Phrase" of an HTTP response to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For Apache 4.1.x and 5.5.x:Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (4.1.SVN or 5.5.SVN or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Security Web site. See References.For Apache 6.0.x:Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (6.0.18 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1236.title: Multiple Mozilla products layout engine code execution
CVE-2008-1236.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability related to the layout engine. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the affected system or cause a denial of service, if the attacker could persuade a victim to visit a malicious Web page or open a malicious HTML email message.Refer to MFSA 2008-15 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1238.title: Multiple Mozilla products HTTP Referrer spoofing
CVE-2008-1238.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper handling of HTTP "Referer:" headers. By sending a specially-crafted request with Basic Authentication credentials containing an empty username value which causes the browser to remove leading characters from the referrer hostname, a remote attacker could bypass cross-site request forgery filters and spoof the HTTP Referer (sic) value.Refer to MFSA 2008-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1242.title: Belkin F5D7230-4 router security bypass
CVE-2008-1242.body: The Belkin F5D7230-4 router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The authentication state is maintained by the user's source IP address. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to establish a session to the device using previously authenticated credentials via the source IP of the victim.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1243.title: Linksys WRT300N router dyndns_domain parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1243.body: The Linksys WRT300N router is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when using the Firefox or Safari Web browser. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the dyndns_domain parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1244.title: Belkin F5D7230-4 router setup_dns.exe security bypass
CVE-2008-1244.body: Belkin F5D7230-4 router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in setup_dns.exe. By sending a specially-crafted request using the dns1_1, dns1_2, dns1_3, and dns1_4 parameters, a remote attacker could modify the DNS server settings on the device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1245.title: Belkin F5D7230-4 router setup_virtualserver.exe denial of service
CVE-2008-1245.body: Belkin F5D7230-4 router is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in setup_virtualserver.exe. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request containing invalid POST data and a "Connection: Keep-Alive" header, a remote attacker could cause all connections to the control center to be dropped.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1248.title: Snom-320 SIP Phone Web interface unauthorized access
CVE-2008-1248.body: The Snom-320 SIP Phone could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the device, caused by an error in the Web interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "Call a number" field to gain unauthorized access to the device and dial arbitrary numbers.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1251.title: snom SIP phone address book cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1251.body: The snom SIP phone is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the address book. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the phone book to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1252.title: Deutsche Telekom Speedport W500 DSL router b_banner.stm information disclosure
CVE-2008-1252.body: The Deutsche Telekom Speedport W500 DSL router could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The logon password is stored in the pwd field of the b_banner.stm login page. By viewing the source code, a remote attacker could obtain the password and possibly launch further attacks against the affected device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1253.title: D-Link DSL-G604T cgi-bin/webcm cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1253.body: D-Link DSL-G604T is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by cgi-bin/webcm. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the var:category parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1254.title: ZyXEL P-660HW series router multiple unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-1254.body: The ZyXEL P-660HW series router is vulnerable to multiple cross-site request forgeries, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by unspecified scripts. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP or POST request using unspecified vectors to cause the victim to modify DNS servers, add keywords to the "bannedlist" and possibly perform other arbitrary actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1255.title: ZyXEL P-660HW IP authentication bypass
CVE-2008-1255.body: The ZyXEL P-660HW series router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The authentication state is maintained by the user's source IP address. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to establish a session to the device using previously authenticated credentials via the source IP of the victim.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1258.title: D-Link DI-604 prim.htm cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1258.body: The D-Link DI-604 router is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the prim.htm script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "rf" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1259.title: Zyxel P-2602HW-D1A IP address authentication bypass
CVE-2008-1259.body: The Zyxel P-2602HW-D1A router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The authentication state is maintained by the user's source IP address. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to establish a session to the device using previously authenticated credentials via the source IP of the victim.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1260.title: Zyxel P-2602HW-D1A multiple cross-site request forgeries
CVE-2008-1260.body: The Zyxel P-2602HW-D1A router is vulnerable to multiple cross-site request forgeries, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Forms/RemMagWWW_1 or Forms/rpSysAdmin_1. By persuading a victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request using the WWWAccessInterface or the StdioTimout parameter to cause the victim to make the admin Web server available on the Internet (WAN) interface, modify the IP whitelisting timeout and possibly perform other arbitrary actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1263.title: Linksys WRT54GL router Config.bin information disclosure
CVE-2008-1263.body: The Linksys WRT54GL router could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of keys and passwords in cleartext in the Config.bin file. By sending an HTTP request for the Config.bin URI, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1264.title: Linksys WRT54G router FTP default password
CVE-2008-1264.body: The Linksys WRT54G router uses a default password for the FTP service. A remote attacker with knowledge of this password could gain access to sensitive files on a vulnerable device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1265.title: Linksys WRT54G FTP interface denial of service
CVE-2008-1265.body: The Linksys WRT54G router is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending an overly long username and password to the FTP interface, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reboot.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1270.title: lighttpd mod_userdir information disclosure
CVE-2008-1270.body: lighttpd could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in mod_userdir. A default of $HOME is used when userdir.path is not set. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the ~nobody directory to read arbitrary files on the system.Refer to LIGHTTPD Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1272.title: BM Classifieds showad.php and pfriendly.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1272.body: BM Classifieds is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showad.php or the pfriendly.php script using the cat or the ad parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to the BM Scripts Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1276.title: MailEnable Professional and MailEnable Enterprise IMAP service buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1276.body: MailEnable Professional and MailEnable Enterprise are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the IMAP service (MEIMAPS.exe). By sending overly long parameters to the FETCH, EXAMINE and UNSUBSCRIBE commands, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to MailEnable Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1277.title: MailEnable Professional and MailEnable Enterprise IMAP service denial of service
CVE-2008-1277.body: MailEnable Professional and MailEnable Enterprise are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by NULL pointer errors in the IMAP service (MEIMAPS.exe). By sending specially-crafted arguments to the SEARCH and APPEND commands, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Apply the hotfix for this vulnerability (ME-10040.EXE), available from the MailEnable Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1278.title: RemotelyAnywhere HTTP denial of service
CVE-2008-1278.body: RemotelyAnywhere is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the RemotelyAnywhere.exe service. By sending a continuous specially-crafted HTTP request containing an Accept-Charset header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to terminate.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1280.title: Acronis True Image Echo Group Server Acronis True Image Windows Agent component denial of service
CVE-2008-1280.body: Acronis True Image Echo Group Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the Acronis True Image Windows Agent component. By sending a specially-crafted packet to port 9876, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to terminate.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1281.title: Argon Client Management Services (CMS) TFTPsrvs.exe directory traversal
CVE-2008-1281.body: Argon Client Management Services (CMS) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error in the TFTP server (TFTPsrvs.exe). An attacker could send a specially-crafted TFTP request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) (..\) to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1283.title: Neptune Web Server 404 error page cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1283.body: Neptune Web Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the 404 error page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1284.title: Horde theme parameter file include
CVE-2008-1284.body: Horde could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the theme parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Refer to the Horde Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1285.title: Sun Java Server Faces (JSF) routines cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1285.body: Sun Java Server Faces (JSF) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper processing of data by the input handling routines. A remote or local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the victim using the JSF application.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 233561 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1289.title: Asterisk RTP codec payload buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1289.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the RTP codec payloads.
