By sending more than 32 RTP payloads, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to AST-2008-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1294.title: Linux kernel RLIMIT_CPU security bypass
CVE-2008-1294.body: The Linux kernel could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper checking on resource limit settings. By setting RLIMIT_CPU to 0, an attacker could bypass CPU usage restrictions.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux kernel (2.6.22 or later), available from the Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1296.title: EncapsGallery file parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1296.body: EncapsGallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the watermark.php and catalog_watermark.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the file parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1297.title: eWriting module for Mambo and Joomla! cat parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1297.body: eWriting module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1298.title: Hadith module for PHP-Nuke cat parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1298.body: Hadith module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1300.title: OpenCMS logfileViewSettings.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1300.body: OpenCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the logfileViewSettings.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the filePath.0 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenCMS (7.0.4 or later), available from the Alkacon Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1302.title: Perforce Server server-DiffFile and server-ReleaseFile commands invalid memory access error denial of service
CVE-2008-1302.body: Perforce Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory access error in the server-DiffFile and server-ReleaseFile commands. By sending a specially-crafted packet containing a malformed 32 bit number value, a remote attacker could crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1303.title: Perforce Server multiple commands denial of service
CVE-2008-1303.body: Perforce Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer error in the p4s.exe dm-FaultFile, dm-LazyCheck, dm-ResolvedFile, dm-OpenFile, and crypto commands. By sending a specially-crafted packet containing an empty parameter value, a remote attacker could crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1304.title: WordPress invites.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1304.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the invites.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the to parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1304.title: WordPress users.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1304.body: WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the users.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the inviteemail parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1305.title: phpBB filebase.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1305.body: phpBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the filebase.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1306.title: Savvy Content Manager searchterms parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1306.body: Savvy Content Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the searchresults.cfm, search_results.cfm, and index.cfm scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the searchterms parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (savvysecurityfix.zip), available from the Savvy Content Manager Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1309.title: RealNetworks Realplayer RealAudioObjects.RealAudio ActiveX code execution
CVE-2008-1309.body: The Realplayer RealAudioObjects.RealAudio ActiveX control (rmoc3260.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of the Console property. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the Controls or Console properties, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of RealNetworks Realplayer (11.0.2 or later), available from the RealPlayer Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1310.title: PacketTrap PT360 Tool Suite PRO TFTP Server directory traversal
CVE-2008-1310.body: PacketTrap PT360 Tool Suite PRO TFTP Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted TFTP request to view arbitrary files on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (#3302), available from the PacketTrap Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1311.title: PacketTrap PT360 Tool Suite PRO TFTP Server filename denial of service
CVE-2008-1311.body: The PacketTrap PT360 Tool Suite PRO TFTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing files with invalid filenames. By sending a specially-crafted request containing an invalid file name, a remote attacker could crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1314.title: gaestebuch module for PHP-Nuke id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1314.body: The gaestebuch module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1318.title: MediaWiki JSON callbacks information disclosure
CVE-2008-1318.body: MediaWiki could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the JSON-formatted callback parameter. By sending a specially-crafted request to the API, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaWiki (1.11.2 or later), available from the MediaWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1320.title: ASG-Sentry FxAgent buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1320.body: ASG-Sentry is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the FxAgent process. By sending a specially-crafted request containing an overly long SMTP community string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1321.title: ASG-Sentry FxIAList weak security
CVE-2008-1321.body: ASG-Sentry could provide weaker than expected security. The FxIAList service does not require authentication to execute certain FxIAList commands. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to stop the FxIAList service or possibly launch further attacks against the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1324.title: Travelsized CMS index.php file include
CVE-2008-1324.body: Travelsized CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page_id or language parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1326.title: Gallarific search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1326.body: Gallarific is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the query parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Gallarific (2.0 paid or 2.1 free or later), available from the Gallarific Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1327.title: Gallarific index.php and users.php authentication bypass
CVE-2008-1327.body: Gallarific could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication, caused by improper validation by the index.php and users.php scripts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and perform multiple unauthorized actions on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Gallarific (2.0 paid or 2.1 free or later), available from the Gallarific Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1328.title: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops Server LGServer service buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1328.body: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the LGServer service. By sending an unspecified command argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID:173105 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1330.title: Novell GroupWise Windows client API security bypass
CVE-2008-1330.body: Novell GroupWise could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an implementation error in the shared folders in the Windows client API. An authenticated attacker who is receiving a shared folder from another user, could exploit this vulnerability using the folder to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the victim's private email messages.Refer to Novell Security Alert Document ID: 3263374 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1331.title: OmniPCX Office CGI script command execution
CVE-2008-1331.body: OmniPCX Office could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the /cgi-data/FastJSData.cgi script. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary shell commands using the id2 parameter containing a semi-colon character (;), which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system with the privileges of the Web server and obtain sensitive information.Refer to the Alcatel-Lucent Security Advisory for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1332.title: Asterisk SIP channel driver security bypass
CVE-2008-1332.body: Asterisk could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the SIP channel driver when verifiying authentication requirements. By sending a specially-crafted "From" header to the driver, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthenticated phone calls.Refer to AST-2008-003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1334.title: BT Home Hub cgi/b authentication bypass
CVE-2008-1334.body: BT Home Hub router could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication, caused by an error in cgi/b. By appending an encoded backslash, percent, or tilde character to PATH_INFO, an attacker could read or change arbitrary administrative settings and make unauthorized VoIP telephone calls.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1336.title: Koobi CMS categ parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1336.body: Koobi CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the categ parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1338.title: Perforce Server server-DiffFile command denial of service
CVE-2008-1338.body: Perforce Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an endless loop error. By sending a specially-crafted packet containing a malformed server-DiffFile command, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of all memory resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1340.title: VMware multiple products Virtual Machine Communication Interface (VMCI) denial of service
CVE-2008-1340.body: Multiple VMware products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory corruption error in the Virtual Machine Communication Interface (VMCI). By sending a specially-crafted call to the VMCI interface, a local authenticated attacker could crash the host system.Refer to VMSA-2008-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1344.title: EasyCalendar year and page parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1344.body: EasyCalendar is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to calendar_backend.php or ajaxp_backend.php script using the year or page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1345.title: EasyCalendar calendar_backend.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1345.body: EasyCalendar is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the calendar_backend.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the day parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1346.title: EasyGallery index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1346.body: EasyGallery is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1348.title: eWeather module for PHP-Nuke modules.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1348.body: The eWeather module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the modules.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the chart parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1350.title: Fully Modded phpBB kb.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1350.body: Fully Modded phpBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. If mode is set to article and page_num is enabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the kb.php script using the "k" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1352.title: EdiorCMS search.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-1352.body: EdiorCMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the search.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the _SearchTemplate parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1354.title: Virtual Support Office-XP (VSO-XP) MyIssuesView.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-1354.body: Virtual Support Office-XP (VSO-XP) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the MyIssuesView.asp script using the Issue_ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1356.title: Sun Solaris XscreenSaver authentication bypass
CVE-2008-1356.body: Sun Solaris could allow a local attacker to bypass authentication, caused by an error in the Screensaver application in the Solaris 10 Java Desktop System (JDS) when the GNOME On-Screen Keyboard (GOK) is being used. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to bypass XscreenSaver authentication.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 234661 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1358.title: MDaemon Email Server HashCash.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1358.body: MDaemon Email Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted FETCH command, an authenticated remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of MDaemon (9.6.5 or later), available from the Alt-N Technologies Web site . See References.

CVE-2008-1359.title: Invision Power Board (IP.Board) nested BBCodes cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1359.body: Invision Power Board (IP.Board) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using nested BBCodes to inject JavaScript event handlers with malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Invision Power Board (2.3.4 after 2008-03-12 or later), available from the Invision Power Services Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1360.title: Nagios unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1360.body: Nagios is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Nagios (2.11 or later), available from the Nagios Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1363.title: Vmware multiple products config.ini privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1363.body: Multiple VMware products could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by insecure permissions set on the config.ini file. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by manipulating VMX path parameters to gain access to the VMX process.Refer to VMSA-2008-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1364.title: VMware multiple products DHCP unspecified denial of service
CVE-2008-1364.body: Multiple VMware products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the DHCP service. A local authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to crash the service.Refer to VMSA-2008-0005 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1369.title: Sun SPARC Enterprise insecure configuration privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1369.body: Sun SPARC Enterprise could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. The T5120 and T5220 servers are shipped with insecure configuration files within the pre-installed Solaris 10 OS image. A remote or local attacker with valid credentials could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system with root privileges.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 231244 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1370.title: wildmary Yap Blog index.php file include
CVE-2008-1370.body: wildmary Yap Blog could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Yap Blog (1.1.1 or later), available from the Yap Blog Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1372.title: bzip2 archives code execution
CVE-2008-1372.body: bzip2 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of archives. By sending a specially-crafted archive, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory, execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of bzip2 (1.0.5 or later), available from the bzip Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1373.title: CUPS gif_read_lzw() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1373.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the code_size read parameter by the gif_read_lzw() function. By persuading a victim to print a specially-crafted GIF image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1376.title: Red Hat nfs-utils weak security
CVE-2008-1376.body: The Red Hat nfs-utils package build script could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the omission of TCP wrappers support. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the system.Refer to RHSA-2008-0486 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1379.title: X.Org X11 fbShmPutImage() information disclosure
CVE-2008-1379.body: X.Org X11 could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an integer overflow error in the fbShmPutImage() MIT-SHM extension function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted Pixmap to read arbitrary memory and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Refer to X.Org security advisory june 2008 - Multiple vulnerabilities in X server extensions for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1381.title: ZoneMinder unspecified code execution
CVE-2008-1381.body: An unspecified vulnerability in ZoneMinder could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with "web user" privileges using unknown attack vectors.Upgrade to the latest version of ZoneMinder (1.23.3 or later), available from the ZoneMinder Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1383.title: Gentoo Linux docert() SSL key weak security
CVE-2008-1383.body: Gentoo Linux could provide weaker than expected security during the source building stages of an ebuild. SSL keys are stored inside publicly readable binary packages when the docert() function is used by src_compile() or src_install(). A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain SSL keys via extraction from the binary package.Refer to GLSA 200803-30 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1384.title: PHP php_sprintf_appendstring() integer overflow
CVE-2008-1384.body: PHP is vulnerable to an integer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the php_sprintf_appendstring() function. By sending an overly long string using the npad parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the fix, available from the PHP CVS Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-1386.title: Serendipity installer cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1386.body: Serendipity is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the installer. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple path fields or the database host field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Serendipity (1.3.1 or later), available from the Serendipity Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1391.title: Multiple BSD systems strfmon() integer overflow
CVE-2008-1391.body: Multiple BSD systems are vulnerable to multiple integer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the strfmon() function in the libc library. By sending a specially-crafted value containing malicious format specifiers, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to crash.For NetBSD:Apply the fix, available from the NetBSD CVS Repository. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.6 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2008-1395.title: Plone authentication state weak security
CVE-2008-1395.body: Plone could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the failure to record the authentication state of the user and the implementation of the logout feature on both the client and server side. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to reuse a session and gain access to features that the victim assumes is no longer accessible.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Hotfix 20080314), available from the Plone Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1397.title: Check Point VPN-1 IP address denial of service
CVE-2008-1397.body: Check Point VPN-1 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of IP address collisions. If the SecuRemote back-connections are enabled, a remote access client and the encryption domain of a gateway for a site-to-site VPN tunnel connection share the same IP address. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause an interruption of connectivity and re-route sensitive information to the client.Refer to Check Point Downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1398.title: AuraCMS online.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1398.body: AuraCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the online.php script using the X-Forwarded-For header, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1403.title: BootManage TFTP Server filename buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1403.body: BootManage TFTP Server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in the BootManage Administrator. By requesting a file with an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1404.title: Viso module for eXV2 index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1404.body: The Viso module for eXV2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the kid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1405.title: fuzzylime (cms) display.php file include
CVE-2008-1405.body: fuzzylime (cms) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the display.php script using the admindir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.01a or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1406.title: MyAnnonces module for eXV2 annonces-p-f.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1406.body: The MyAnnonces module for eXV2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the annonces-p-f.php script using the lid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1407.title: WebChat module for eXV2 index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1407.body: WebChat module for eXV2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the roomid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1408.title: phpBP index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1408.body: phpBP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the banners-external.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (phpbp2-RC3-204-fix5_22.html), available from the PHP BP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1409.title: Exero CMS theme file include
CVE-2008-1409.body: Exero CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the theme parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Exero CMS (1.0.1.1 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-1411.title: Acronis Snap Deploy PXE Server denial of service
CVE-2008-1411.body: Acronis Snap Deploy is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the PXE Server (pxesrv.exe). By sending a specially-crafted TFTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1412.title: Multiple F-Secure antivirus products archives code execution
CVE-2008-1412.body: Multiple F-Secure antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of archives. By sending a specially-crafted archive, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory, execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to hang.Refer to F-Secure Security Bulletin FSC-2008-2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1413.title: SnewsCMS search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1413.body: SnewsCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the query parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1414.title: Multiple Time Sheets (MTS) index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1414.body: Multiple Time Sheets (MTS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the tab parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1416.title: PHPauction include_path parameter file include
CVE-2008-1416.body: PHPauction could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the converter.inc.php, messages.inc.php, or settings.inc.php script using the include_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of PHPauction (3.2 or later), available from the PHPAUCTION Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1419.title: libvorbis OGG denial of service
CVE-2008-1419.body: libvorbis is vulnerable to a denial of service attack. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted OGG file containing a codebook dimension of "0", a remote attacker could cause the application to enter into an infinite loop resulting in a denial of service.Refer to the Xiph SVN repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1419.title: libvorbis OGG buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1419.body: libvorbis is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted OGG file containing a codebook dimension of "0", a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the Xiph SVN repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1420.title: libvorbis residue partition values buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1420.body: libvorbis is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error when processing residue partition values. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted OGG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the Xiph SVN repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1423.title: libvorbis quantvals and quantlist buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1423.body: libvorbis is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow during the computation of "quantvals" and "quantlist". By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted OGG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to the Xiph SVN repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1425.title: Easy-Clanpage index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1425.body: Easy-Clanpage is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1428.title: Ubercart module for Drupal attribute cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1428.body: Ubercart module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the attribute module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-020 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1436.title: Microsoft Windows MSDTC privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1436.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by an error when executing code in the security context of the NetworkService or LocalService accounts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via IIS (using ISAPI filters and extensions or ASP.NET code running in full trust), SQL Server (when administrative privileges are granted to load and run code), and the Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) service, to gain access to resources in processes that are also running as NetworkService or LocalService, and possibly execute arbitrary code with LocalSystem privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS09-012. See References.

CVE-2008-1446.title: Microsoft Windows Knowledge Base Article 953155 update is not installed
CVE-2008-1446.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 953155 is not installed on the system, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerability: Microsoft Windows servers, when running IIS, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) implementation. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request to a vulnerable Web server that causes the Web server to connect to a malicious server impersonating an IPP printer, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-062. See References.

CVE-2008-1446.title: Microsoft Windows Internet Printing Protocol code execution
CVE-2008-1446.body: Microsoft Windows servers, when running IIS, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) implementation. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request to a vulnerable Web server that causes the Web server to connect to a malicious server impersonating an IPP printer, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-062. See References.

CVE-2008-1458.title: CS-Cart index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1458.body: CS-Cart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "q" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the CS-Cart Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1459.title: Alberghi module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1459.body: The Alberghi module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Joomla! Extensions Directory Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1460.title: Joovideo module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1460.body: The Joovideo module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1462.title: Section module for RunCMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1462.body: The Section module for RunCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the artid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1465.title: Restaurante module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1465.body: The Restaurante module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1467.title: CenterIM chat message shell command execution
CVE-2008-1467.body: CenterIM could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper handling of URLs received in a chat message. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted URL request containing shell metacharacters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with the privileges of the Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of CenterIM (4.22.4 or later), available from the CenterIM Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1468.title: Namazu character encoding cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1468.body: Namazu is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the namazu.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted UTF-7 encoded URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Namazu (2.0.18 or later), available from the Namazu Download Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1471.title: Multiple Panda Software Antivirus products cpoint.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1471.body: Multiple Panda Software products could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the cpoint.sys driver. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite system memory or cause a denial of service and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.For Panda Internet Security 2008:Apply the hotfix for this vulnerability (hfp120801s1.exe), available from the Panda Security Online Support Center Help Web site. See References.For Panda Antivirus + Firewall 2008:Apply the hotfix for this vulnerability (hft70801s1.exe), available from the Panda Security Online Support Center Help Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1472.title: CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup ActiveX control (ListCtrl.ocx) buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1472.body: The CA BrightStor ARCserve Backup ActiveX control (ListCtrl.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the AddColumn() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system, available from the CA Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1473.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Aclient.exe privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1473.body: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by an unspecified error in the Deployment Server Agent (AClient.exe). An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a shatter attack to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the vulnerable system.Refer to SYM008-008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1474.title: Roundup multiple unspecified
CVE-2008-1474.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Roundup have an unknown impact and attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of Roundup (1.4.4 or later), available from the Roundup Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1475.title: Roundup XML-RPC security bypass
CVE-2008-1475.body: Roundup could allow an attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the XML-RPC server during permission checking. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the list, display, or set method to edit or read restricted properties.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the SourceForge.net Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-1476.title: Serendipity Trackbacks data cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1476.body: Serendipity is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input within received Trackbacks. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Serendipity (1.3 or later), available from the Serendipity Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1479.title: cfnetgs index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1479.body: cfnetgs is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the directory parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1481.title: webSPELL board parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1481.body: webSPELL is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the board parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1482.title: xine-lib multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2008-1482.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to multiple heap-based buffer overflows, caused by integer overflow errors in demux_flv.c, demux_qt.c, demux_real.c, demux_wc3movie.c, ebml.c, and demux_film.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FLV, MOV, RM, MVE, MKV, or CAK file containing an overly large field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of xine-lib (1.1.11.1 or later), available from the xine Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1486.title: Phorum non-fulltext search SQL injection
CVE-2008-1486.body: Phorum is vulnerable to SQL injection when mysql_use_ft is disabled. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the non-fulltext search, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Phorum (5.2.6 or later), available from the Phorum Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1488.title: Alternative PHP Cache (APC) apc_search_paths() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1488.body: Alternative PHP Cache (APC) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the apc_search_paths() function. By sending an overly long filename to the include() function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with Web server privileges or cause the Web server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Alternative PHP Cache (APC) (3.0.17 or later), available from the PECL Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1489.title: VLC media player MP4_ReadBox_rdrf() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1489.body: VLC media player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the MP4_ReadBox_rdrf function in the libmp4.c file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted MP4 file containing a malicious RDRF atom, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Apply the patch available from the VideoLAN GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-1490.title: Aurigma ImageUploader 4.1 ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1490.body: The Aurigma ImageUploader 4.1 ActiveX control (ImageUploader4.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the Action property, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Aurigma ImageUploader (5.0 or later), available from the Aurigma Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1491.title: ASUS ASMB3 DPC Proxy buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1491.body: ASUS ASMB3 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DPC Proxy. By sending an overly long string to port 623, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the device with elevated privileges or cause the device to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1492.title: phpAddressBook skin parameter directory traversal
CVE-2008-1492.body: phpAddressBook could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php or install.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the skin parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1493.title: Cuteflow Bin login.php file include
CVE-2008-1493.body: Cuteflow Bin could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the login.php script using the language parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1495.title: PEEL CMS produits.php file upload
CVE-2008-1495.body: PEEL CMS could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the produits.php script. An authenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted to upload and possibly execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1496.title: PEEL CMS membre.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1496.body: PEEL CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the membre.php script using the email parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1500.title: TinyPortal index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1500.body: TinyPortal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the PHPSESSID parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1503.title: F5 BIG-IP audit log cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1503.body: F5 BIG-IP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the management interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the node name, sysContact or the sysLocation SNMP configuration field, which would be executed in the victim's Web browser, once the audit log is opened. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1504.title: phpMyChat setup.php3 cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1504.body: phpMyChat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the setup.php3 script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Lang parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1505.title: Custompages module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2008-1505.body: Custompages module for Mambo and Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the cpage parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1506.title: PEEL phpinfo.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-1506.body: PEEL could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The phpinfo.php script contains the phpinfo() function. By sending a direct request to the phpinfo.php script, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1508.title: E-Kontor id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1508.body: E-Kontor is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1509.title: XL Portal index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1509.body: XL Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the query parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1510.title: OpenCms users_list.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1510.body: OpenCms is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the users_list.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the searchfilter or listSearchFilter parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1512.title: XS module for phpBB admin_xs.php file include
CVE-2008-1512.body: XS module for phpBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin_xs.php script using the phpEx parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1513.title: CMS Danneo index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1513.body: CMS Danneo is vulnerable to SQL injection. If the "Referers statistics" option is enabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1514.title: Linux Kernel ptrace denial of service
CVE-2008-1514.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in ptrace. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user-area-padding test to cause a kernel panic.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.27-rc6 or later), available from the The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1515.title: OTRS SOAP interface weak security
CVE-2008-1515.body: OTRS could provide weaker than expected security. The SOAP interface does not perform security checks to determine if a user is valid. By sending a specially-crafted SOAP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read and modify arbitrary objects on the system.Refer to OTRS Security Advisory 2008-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1517.title: Apple Mac OS X kernel workqueue code execution
CVE-2008-1517.body: The Apple Mac OS X kernel could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unchecked index error when handling workqueues. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges or cause the system to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1518.title: Kaspersky Internet Security kl1.sys buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1518.body: Kaspersky Internet Security is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the kl1.sys. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to Kaspersky Tech News 06.03.2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1523.title: ZyXEL Prestige multiple information disclosure
CVE-2008-1523.body: ZyXEL Prestige could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on administrative pages. By sending a direct URI request to the WAN.html, wzPPPOE.html, and rpDyDNS.html and viewing the source code, an attacker could obtain the ISP and Dynamic DNS credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1528.title: ZyXEL Prestige SNMP and WEP information disclosure
CVE-2008-1528.body: ZyXEL Prestige could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending direct HTTP requests to the RemMagSNMP.html and WLAN.html files and viewing the source code, an attacker could obtain authentication information and WEP keys.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1530.title: GnuPG duplicate keys code execution
CVE-2008-1530.body: GnuPG could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error while duplicating user IDs. By importing OpenPGP keys from key servers using specially-crafted duplicate keys, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of GnuPG (1.4.9 or 2.0.9 or later), available from the GNU Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1532.title: Perlbal ClientProxy.pm denial of service
CVE-2008-1532.body: Perlbal is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in ClientProxy.pm when buffer_uploads is enabled. By sending a zero-byte chunked upload, a remote attacker could crash the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Perlbal (1.70 or later), available from the Perlbal Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1534.title: PowerPHPBoard footer.inc.php and header.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-1534.body: PowerPHPBoard could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files when REGISTER_GLOBALS is enabled. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the footer.inc.php or header.inc.php script using the settings[footer] or settings[header] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1536.title: Photo Cart index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1536.body: Photo Cart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the amessage parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the Photo Cart Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1537.title: PowerBook index.php file include
CVE-2008-1537.body: PowerBook could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1539.title: Platinum module for PHP-Nuke modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1539.body: The Platinum module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the "p" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. The version of Platinum affected by this vulnerability is a Beta version only, and was not intended for public release. It was released without the vendor's approval.Download version 7.6.B.4 v2, available from the PHP-Nuke Platinum Web site.

CVE-2008-1540.title: Datsogallery module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1540.body: The Datsogallery module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1541.title: HIS WebShop his-webshop.pl directory traversal
CVE-2008-1541.body: HIS WebShop could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the his-webshop.pl script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the "t" parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1545.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer setRequestHeader chunk security bypass
CVE-2008-1545.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a failure in the setRequestHeader method of the XMLHttpRequest object method to prevent Transfer-Encoding HTTP header requests. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request containing a "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" header and a request body with an incorrect chunk size, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct HTTP request splitting and smuggling attacks.Refer to Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-031 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1550.title: CubeCart index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1550.body: CubeCart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the _a or Submit parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1551.title: Photo module for RunCMS viewcat.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1551.body: The Photo module for RunCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewcat.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1553.title: TopperMod mod.php file include
CVE-2008-1553.body: TopperMod could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote authenticated attacker could send a specially-crafted GET request to the mod.php script using the "to" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1555.title: BolinOS gbincluder.php file include
CVE-2008-1555.body: BolinOS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the gbincluder.php script using the _bFileToInclude parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1556.title: BolinOS multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1556.body: BolinOS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the gBImageViewer.php, gBselectorContents.php, gBLoginPage.php, gBPassword.php and index.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1557.title: BolinOS gBphpInfo.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-1557.body: BolinOS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Access to the phpinfo page is not restricted. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct URL request to the gBphpInfo.php script to obtain sensitive information and possibly launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1558.title: MPlayer sdpplin_parse() integer overflow
CVE-2008-1558.body: MPlayer is vulnerable to an integer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sdpplin_parse() function. By persuading a victim to connect to a specially-crafted RTSP stream using an overly large "StreamCount" SDP parameter, a remote attacker could overwrite arbitrary memory regions and execute malformed code on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1559.title: AlphaContent module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1559.body: The AlphaContent module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1560.title: DigiDomain multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1560.body: DigiDomain is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the lookup_result.asp and suggest_result.asp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the domain, word1, or word2 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1564.title: File Transfer file directory traversal
CVE-2008-1564.body: File Transfer could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request for any known filename containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to download the targeted file and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of File Transfer (1.2f or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-1565.title: phpBB PJIRC module irc.php file include
CVE-2008-1565.body: The PJIRC module for phpBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the irc.php script using the phpEx parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1567.title: phpMyAdmin session data information disclosure
CVE-2008-1567.body: phpMyAdmin could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of user credentials and the Blowfish secret as plain text in session data. An attacker with access to a shared host could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (2.11.5.1 or later), available from the phpMyAdmin Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1568.title: Comix filename command execution
CVE-2008-1568.body: Comix could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error when executing the rar, unrar, or jpegtran programs. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file containing shell metacharacters in the filename, an attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Comix (3.6.5 or later), available from the Comix Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1571.title: Apple Mac OS X Image Capture Web server directory traversal
CVE-2008-1571.body: The Apple Mac OS X Image Capture Web server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to view arbitrary files on the system.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1572.title: Apple Mac OS X Image Capture symlink
CVE-2008-1572.body: Apple Mac OS X Image Capture could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack, caused by the improper handling of temporary files that are created with insecure permissions. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to other files on the system, which would allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with the privileges of the victim, access the contents of images being resized, or obtain sensitive information.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1574.title: Apple Mac OS X ImageIO JPEG2000 buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1574.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in ImageIO. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted JPEG2000 image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1575.title: Apple Mac OS X Apple Type Services (ATS) code execution
CVE-2008-1575.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in Apple Type Services (ATS). By persuading a victim to print a PDF document containing a specially-crafted embedded font, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1576.title: Apple Mac OS X Mail code execution
CVE-2008-1576.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a uninitialized buffer in Mail. By sending mail through an SMTP server over IPv6, an attacker could obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary code, or crash the application.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1579.title: Apple Mac OS X Wiki Server information disclosure
CVE-2008-1579.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when Wiki Server is enabled. By accessing a nonexistent blog, an attacker could obtain local user names via error messages.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1580.title: Apple Mac OS X CFNetwork information disclosure
CVE-2008-1580.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in CFNetwork during Safari SSL client certificate handling. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site that issues a client certificate request, an attacker could obtain the first client certificate found in the keychain.Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1582.title: Apple QuickTime AAC-encoded media content code execution
CVE-2008-1582.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of AAC-encoded media content. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted media file containing AAC-encoded media content, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1583.title: Apple QuickTime PICT image buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1583.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling PICT images. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PICT image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1584.title: Apple QuickTime Indeo video codec content buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1584.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling Indeo video codec content. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted movie file containing malicious Indeo video codec content, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1585.title: Apple QuickTime QuickTime content code execution
