CVE-2008-1585.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of "file:" URLs containing malicious QuickTime content. By persuading a victim to play specially-crafted QuickTime content in QuickTime Player, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1588.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone address bar spoofing
CVE-2008-1588.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to spoof the URL in the address bar, caused by an error in Safari when yielding Unicode ideographic spaces. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page and displaying the current URL in the address bar, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the address bar or conduct phishing attacks.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (2.0 or later) or Apple iPhone (2.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1589.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone certificate information disclosure
CVE-2008-1589.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in Safari when connecting to a Web site that uses self-signed or invalid certificates. If a user selects the menu button while being prompted to accept or reject the certificate, the Safari browser will automatically accept the certificate next time without prompting. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (2.0 or later) or Apple iPhone (2.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1590.title: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone runtime garbage code execution
CVE-2008-1590.body: Apple iPod touch and Apple iPhone could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in JavaScriptCore when handling runtime garbage collection. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iPod touch (2.0 or later) or Apple iPhone (2.0 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1591.title: PostNuke pnVarPrepForStore SQL injection
CVE-2008-1591.body: PostNuke is vulnerable to SQL injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the pnVarPrefForStore function when the magic_quotes_runtime option is enabled. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using various server variables, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1602.title: Orbit Downloader URL conversion buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1602.body: Orbit Downloader is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when converting URL strings from ASCII to Unicode. By persuading a victim to initiate a download with an overly long URL string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Orbit Downloader (2.6.5 or later), available from the Orbit Downloader Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1603.title: GNB DesignForm email form cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1603.body: GNB DesignForm is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the email form. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of GNB DesignForm (3.9 or later), available from the GNB Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1604.title: PerlMailer unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1604.body: PerlMailer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of PerlMailer (3.02 or later), available from the PerlMailer Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1605.title: LEADTOOLS Multimedia ActiveX controls file overwrite
CVE-2008-1605.body: The LEADTOOLS Multimedia Toolkit 15 (ltmmCaptureCtrl Class, ltmmConvertCtrl Class, and ltmmPlayCtrl Class) ActiveX controls (ltmm15.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote or local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveSettingsToFile() method to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1606.title: Elastic Path elasticpath_dir path directory traversal
CVE-2008-1606.body: Elastic Path could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../..\..\..\) to the elasticpath_dir path, which would allow the attacker to upload arbitrary files on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (security_vulnerabilities_fix_1.1.zip), available from the Elastic Path Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1606.title: Elastic Path multiple scripts directory traversal
CVE-2008-1606.body: Elastic Path could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the getImportFileRedirect.jsp or fileManager.jsp script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file or dir parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (_security_vulnerabilities_fix_1.1.zip), available from the Elastic Path Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1609.title: JAF CMS multiple file include
CVE-2008-1609.body: JAF CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the forum.php, headlines.php, or main.php script using the website or main_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1612.title: Squid Web Proxy Cache arrayShrink() denial of service
CVE-2008-1612.body: Squid Web Proxy Cache is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assert error in the arrayShrink() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to crash the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Squid Web Proxy Cache (2.6.STABLE18 or later), available from the Squid Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1613.title: RedDot ioRD.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-1613.body: RedDot is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the ioRD.asp script using the LngId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.RedDot customers should contact RedDot support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2008-1614.title: suPHP files privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1614.body: suPHP could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a race condition error when creating a symbolic link to other files or directories on the system. By directing the symlink to a file of another user and then back to its own file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute malicious scripts and gain elevated privileges on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of suPHP (0.6.3 or later), available from the suPHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1615.title: Linux kernel process-trace (ptrace) denial of service
CVE-2008-1615.body: The Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when running on AMD64 architectures. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a process-trace (ptrace) call to cause a denial of service.Refer to RHSA-2008:0237 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1621.title: GeeCarts id cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1621.body: GeeCarts is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php, show.php, and the view.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1622.title: GeeCarts id file include
CVE-2008-1622.body: GeeCarts could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the show.php, search.php, or view.php script using the id parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1623.title: Smoothflash admin_view_image.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1623.body: Smoothflash is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin_view_image.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1625.title: avast! 4 Home and Professional aavmker4.sys driver privilege escalation
CVE-2008-1625.body: avast! 4 Home and Professional could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the aavmker4.sys driver. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite system memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of avast! 4 Home or avast! 4 Professional (4.8.1169 or later), available from the avast! Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1626.title: eggBlog unspecified cookie SQL injection
CVE-2008-1626.body: eggBlog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using an unspecified cookie, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of eggBlog (4.0.1 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-1627.title: CDS Invenio personal email notification alert weak security
CVE-2008-1627.body: CDS Invenio could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in personal email notification alerts. By using a specially-crafted URL parameter, a remote authenticated attacker could delete email alerts when the victim's internal UID is known.Upgrade to the latest version of CDS Invenio (0.99.0 or later), available from the CDS Invenio Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1628.title: Linux Audit audit_log_user_command() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1628.body: Linux Audit is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the audit_log_user_command() function. By sending an overly long command argument, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with libaudit privileges, or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Audit (1.7 or later), available from the Linux Audit Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1629.title: PHPkrm unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1629.body: PHPkrm is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of PHPkrm (1.5.0 or later), available from the PHPkrm Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1631.title: CuteFlow login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1631.body: CuteFlow is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the UserId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1632.title: CuteFlow multiple scripts SQL injection
CVE-2008-1632.body: CuteFlow is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the editmailinglist_step1.php, edituser.php, editfield.php, or edittemplate_step1.php script using the listid, userid, fieldid, or templateid parameter which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1635.title: KISGB (Keep It Simple Guest Book) view_private.php file include
CVE-2008-1635.body: KISGB (Keep It Simple Guest Book) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the view_private.php script using the tmp_theme parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1637.title: PowerDNS DNS Cache weak security
CVE-2008-1637.body: PowerDNS could provide weaker than expected security. Random numbers are generated using predictable standard C library functions and are then used to create the transaction ID (TRXID) and UDP source port. By guessing the transaction ID (TRXID) and UDP source port, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform DNS Cache Poisoning.Upgrade to the latest version of PowerDNS (3.1.5 or later), available from the PowerDNS Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1639.title: Neat weblog index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1639.body: Neat weblog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the articleId parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1640.title: JGS-Treffen add-on for Woltlab Burning Board jgs_treffen.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1640.body: JGS-Treffen add-on for Woltlab Burning Board is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to jgs_treffen.php script using the view_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of JGS-Treffen (2.0.3 or later), available from the JGS-XA Support Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1641.title: EfesTECH Video default.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-1641.body: EfesTECH Video is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the default.asp script using the catID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1642.title: Sava's Guestbook index.php file include
CVE-2008-1642.body: Sava's Guestbook could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1643.title: LANDesk Management Suite PXE TFTP directory traversal
CVE-2008-1643.body: LANDesk Management Suite could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted TFTP GET request to the PXE TFTP Service (PXEMTFTP.exe) using directory traversal sequences to download arbitrary files from the vulnerable system.For LANDesk Management Suite version 8.7 SP5:Apply the patch for this vulnerability (OSD-737487.5.zip), available from the LANDesk Security Bulletin 2659. See References.For LANDesk Management Suite version 8.8:Apply the patch for this vulnerability (OSD-737488.0.zip), available from the LANDesk Security Bulletin 2659. See References.

CVE-2008-1644.title: Sava's Link Manager category parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1644.body: Sava's is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using category parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1645.title: PHP Spam Manager body.php file include
CVE-2008-1645.body: PHP Spam Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the body.php script using the filename parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1646.title: WP-Download plugin for WordPress wp-download.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1646.body: WP-Download plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the wp-download.php script using the dl_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of WP-Download plugin for WordPress (1.2.1 or later), available from the WP-Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1648.title: Sympa MIME::Entity::head object denial of service
CVE-2008-1648.body: Sympa is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when a method is called on an undefined MIME::Entity::head object. By sending an email containing a specially-crafted Content-Type header, a remote attacker could crash the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Sympa (5.4 or later), available from the Sympa Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1649.title: EasyNews index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1649.body: EasyNews is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the read parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1651.title: EasyNews login.php file include
CVE-2008-1651.body: EasyNews could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing an appended NULL byte (%00) to the login.php script using the lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1652.title: Perlbal _serve_request_multiple() directory traversal
CVE-2008-1652.body: Perlbal could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error when concat get is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted request to the _serve_request_multiple() function, a remote attacker could view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Perlbal (1.70 or later), available from the Perlbal Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1653.title: Sava's Link Manager index.php file include
CVE-2008-1653.body: Sava's Link Manager could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1654.title: Adobe Flash navigateToURL function cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-1654.body: Adobe Flash is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when using the navigateToURL function to communicate with Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) services. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed SOAP request to a UPnP device to modify the IP address of the primary DNS server, perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Refer to APSB08-11 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1655.title: Adobe Flash Player DNS rebinding security bypass
CVE-2008-1655.body: An unspecified error in Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to perform DNS rebinding attacks using unknown vectors.Refer to APSB08-11 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1656.title: Adobe ColdFusion CFC methods security bypass
CVE-2008-1656.body: Adobe ColdFusion could allow a remote attacker to bypass CFC method security restrictions when the access level is set to public. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Flex 2 remoting to gain access to functions intended for local use only.Refer to APSB08-12 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1657.title: OpenSSH ForceCommand directive security bypass
CVE-2008-1657.body: OpenSSH could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when using the shd_config ForceCommand directive. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via ~/.ssh/rc to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSH (4.9 or later), available from the OpenSSH Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1667.title: HP OpenView Internet Services Probe Builder Service (PBOVISServer.exe) denial of service
CVE-2008-1667.body: HP OpenView Internet Services is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a weakness in the Probe Builder Service (PBOVISServer.exe). By sending a termination opcode, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to terminate arbitrary processes on the server.Refer to HPSBMA02353 SSRT080066 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1668.title: HP-UX ftpd security bypass
CVE-2008-1668.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP-UX, when running the ftpd server, could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system with elevated privileges.Refer to HPSBUX02356 SSRT080051 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1669.title: Linux kernel fcntl_setlk() and close() denial of service
CVE-2008-1669.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error while preventing a race condition in the SMP system between the fcntl_setlk() and close() calls. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain reordered access to the descriptor table and file_lock structure of an inode and cause the kernel to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux kernel (2.6.25.2 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1673.title: Linux kernel BER decoder buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1673.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ASN.1 BER decoder of the cifs and ip_nat_snmp_basic modules. By sending specially-crafted BER encoded data, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to The Linux Kernel Archives Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1675.title: Linux kernel Tehuti network buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1675.body: Linux kernel is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Tehuti network driver. By sending a specially-crafted BDX_OP_WRITE IOCTL call, a local attacker could overflow a buffer to corrupt kernel memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux kernel (2.6.25.1 or later), available from the The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1677.title: Red Hat Directory Server and Fedora Directory Server regular expression buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1677.body: Multiple vendors, including the Red Hat Directory Server and Fedora Directory Server, are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the regular expression handler. By sending a specially-crafted LDAP search request containing an overly long regular expression, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Refer to RHSA-2008:0269-2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1678.title: OpenSSL libssl denial of service
CVE-2008-1678.body: OpenSSL and the Apache HTTP Server are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak within the libssl library and the mod_ssl module. By invoking multiple SSL connections with zlib support, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume an overly large amount of memory resulting in a denial of service.For Apache HTTP Server:Upgrade to the latest version of Apache (2.2.9 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1679.title: Python imageop.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1679.body: Python is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflow errors in the imageop.c module. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.For Apple Mac OS:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1681.title: IBM DB2 Content Manager AllowedTrustedLogin privilege unspecified
CVE-2008-1681.body: An unspecified vulnerability in IBM DB2 Content Manager related to the AllowedTrustedLogin privilege has an unknown impact and attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of IBM DB2 Content Manager (8.3 Fix Pack 8 or later), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1685.title: GNU Compiler Collection (gcc) weak security
CVE-2008-1685.body: GNU Compiler Collection (gcc) could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error when cast operators are not used. This could result in buffer and integer overflow protection being unintentionally removed in applications compiled with affected versions of gcc.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1689.title: SLMail Pro WebContainer.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1689.body: SLMail Pro is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by WebContainer.exe. By sending an overly long HTTP request to TCP port 801, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1696.title: DaZPHPNews makepost.php file include
CVE-2008-1696.body: DaZPHPNews could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the makepost.php script using the prefixdir parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1698.title: Simple Gallery index.php album parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1698.body: Simple Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the album parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1699.title: Writer's Block CMS permalink.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1699.body: Writer's Block CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the permalink.php script using the PostID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1700.title: WorkSite Web Web TransferCtrl Class 8,2,1,4 (iManFile.cab) denial of service
CVE-2008-1700.body: WorkSite Web is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Web TransferCtrl Class 8,2,1,4 (iManFile.cab). A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a large number of SendNrlLink directives to cause the utilization of all memory resources.Upgrade to the latest version of WorkSite Web (8.2 SP1 P2 or later), available from the Interwoven Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1702.title: my_gallery plugin for e107 dload.php file download
CVE-2008-1702.body: The my_gallery plugin for e107 could allow a remote attacker to download arbitrary files to a victim's system, caused by improper validation by the dload.php script. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .jpg file using the file parameter, an attacker could force the victim to download the file to their system. This file could then be used to launch further attacks against the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1703.title: TIBCO Rendezvous multiple products code execution
CVE-2008-1703.body: Rendezvous, as used in multiple TIBCO products, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted message to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory April 9, 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1704.title: TIBCO Software Enterprise Message Service (EMS) and iProcess Engine code execution
CVE-2008-1704.body: TIBCO Software Enterprise Message Service (EMS) and iProcess Engine could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code. By sending a specially-crafted message to the EMS server, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory April 9, 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1706.title: IBM solidDB array index denial of service
CVE-2008-1706.body: IBM solidDB is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an array index error in the Solid Database Engine. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 1315, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to invalid memory addresses and cause the affected server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1707.title: IBM solidDB solid.exe denial of service
CVE-2008-1707.body: IBM solidDB is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the Solid Database Engine (solid.exe). By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 1315, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1708.title: IBM solidDB memory denial of service
CVE-2008-1708.body: IBM solidDB is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to allocate a specific amount of memory. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 1315, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to stop responding.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1711.title: Terong PHP Photo Gallery password information disclosure
CVE-2008-1711.body: Terong PHP Photo Gallery could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of passwords in cleartext within the database. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1712.title: mx_blogs module for mxBB functions_weblog.php file include
CVE-2008-1712.body: The mx_blogs module for mxBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the functions_weblog.php script using the mx_root_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1714.title: Faphoto show.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1714.body: Faphoto is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the show.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1717.title: WoltLab Burning Board WoltLab Community Framework exception handling information disclosure
CVE-2008-1717.body: The WoltLab Burning Board WoltLab Community Framework (WCF) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper exception handling. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by submitting invalid data to the page or form parameter to obtain full path locations.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1718.title: Autonomy (formerly Verity) KeyView mimesr.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1718.body: The Autonomy (formerly Verity) KeyView Viewer, which is used in IBM Lotus Notes, and possibly other applications, is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the Text mail (MIME) mimesr.dll file. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted email message containing a malformed Text mail (MIME) attachment using one of the affected file viewers, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's application to crash.For IBM Lotus Notes:Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1298453 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1719.title: NukeET multiple unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-1719.body: NukeET is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform administrative actions, cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1720.title: rsync xattr buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1720.body: rsync is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error when extended attribute (xattr) support is enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to Rsync Security Advisories, April 8th, 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1721.title: zlib extension module for python PyString_FromStringAndSize() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1721.body: The zlib extension module for python is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by an integer signedness error in the PyString_FromStringAndSize() function. By sending a specially-crafted input stream, an attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to the Python SVN repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1722.title: CUPS image-png.c and image-zoom.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1722.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in image-png.c and image-zoom.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PNG file containing overly large width and height fields, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to CUPS STR #2790 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1724.title: SecureTransport Server FileTransfer ActiveX control (vcst_eu.dll and vcst_en.dll) TransferFile() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1724.body: The SecureTransport Server FileTransfer ActiveX Control (vcst_eu.dll and vcst_en.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TransferFile method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments via the remoteFile parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Hotfix 20), available from the Tumbleweed Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1726.title: KnowledgeQuest kqid and username parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1726.body: KnowledgeQuest is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the articletext.php, articletextonly.php, or logincheck.php script using the kqid or username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1727.title: KnowledgeQuest admincheck.php security bypass
CVE-2008-1727.body: KnowledgeQuest could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admincheck.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to create arbitrary user accounts.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1728.title: Openfire ConnectionManagerImpl.java denial of service
CVE-2008-1728.body: Ignite Realtime Openfire is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in ConnectionManagerImpl.java. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via outgoing queues with unread messages to crash the service.Upgrade to the latest version of Openfire (3.5.0 or later), available from the Ignite Realtime Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1731.title: Simple access module for Drupal privacy information disclosure
CVE-2008-1731.body: The Simple access module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain node privacy information, caused by an unspecified error during interaction with the Node clone or Project issue tracking modules. An attacker could exploit vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to make private nodes public.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-025 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1732.title: Prediction Football matchid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1732.body: Prediction Football is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showpredictionsformatch.php script using the matchid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1733.title: Pragmatic Utopia PU Arcade component for Joomla! gid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1733.body: The Pragmatic Utopia PU Arcade component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the gid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1734.title: PHP Toolkit php-select denial of service
CVE-2008-1734.body: PHP Toolkit, when running on Gentoo Linux, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a sting interpretation error in php-select. By passing a specially-crafted filename to the tr command, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to prevent Apache from loading mod_php and disclose PHP source code.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1737.title: Sophos Anti-Virus SSDT() denial of service
CVE-2008-1737.body: Sophos Anti-Virus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when handling arguments passed to the "NtCreateKey()" System Service Descriptor Table (SSDT) function. If the Runtime Behavioural Analysis setting is enabled, a local attacker could invoke the vulnerable function with specially-crafted arguments and cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1738.title: Rising Antivirus SSDT() denial of service
CVE-2008-1738.body: Rising Antivirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when handling arguments passed to the "NtOpenProcess()" System Service Descriptor Table (SSDT) function. By invoking the function with specially-crafted arguments, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Rising Antivirus (20.38.20 or later), available from the RISING Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1739.title: Apple QuickTime ftyp code execution
CVE-2008-1739.body: Apple QuickTime could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper parsing of ftyp atoms in movie files. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted movie file containing ftyp atoms, a remote attacker could corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1741.title: Cisco Unified Presence Server SIP Proxy denial of service
CVE-2008-1741.body: Cisco Unified Presence Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SIP Proxy. A remote attacker could exploit this via a TCP port scan to crash the device.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cup for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1742.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CTLProvider.exe TCPFUZZ denial of service
CVE-2008-1742.body: The Certificate Trust List (CTL) Provider service (CTLProvider.exe) of the Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM) is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending specially-crafted TCP packets to port 2444, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory resources, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cucmdos for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1743.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CTLProvider.exe TCP denial of service
CVE-2008-1743.body: The Certificate Trust List (CTL) Provider service (CTLProvider.exe) of the Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM) is vulnerable to a denial of service. Under certain situations, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted TCP packets to port 2444 to consume all available memory resources, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cucmdos for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1744.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CAPF service denial of service
CVE-2008-1744.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of malformed traffic by the Certificate Authority Proxy Function (CAPF) service. By sending specially-crafted data to TCP port 3804, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cucmdos for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1745.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager SIP JOIN denial of service
CVE-2008-1745.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of messages. By sending a specially-crafted SIP JOIN message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to terminate.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cucmdos for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1747.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager SIP INVITE packet denial of service
CVE-2008-1747.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of SIP INVITE packets. By sending a specially-crafted SIP INVITE message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to become unresponsive and eventually restart.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cucmdos for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1748.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager SIP INVITE URL denial of service
CVE-2008-1748.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of SIP URL input. By sending a specially-crafted SIP INVITE message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to become unresponsive and eventually restart.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-cucmdos for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1749.title: Cisco Content Switching Module (CSM) and Content Switching Module with SSL (CSM-S) denial of service
CVE-2008-1749.body: The Cisco Content Switching Module (CSM) and Content Switching Module with SSL (CSM-S) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak error when layer 7 load balancing is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted TCP packet containing certain flags, a remote attacker could cause the utilization of all memory resources.Refer to cisco-sa-20080514-csm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1750.title: LiveCart id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1750.body: LiveCart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of LiveCart (1.1.2 or later), available from the LiveCart Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1751.title: KSEMAIL index.php file include
CVE-2008-1751.body: KSEMAIL could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the language or lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1752.title: ezRADIUS config.ini and database.ini information disclosure
CVE-2008-1752.body: ezRADIUS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insecure permissions on config.ini and database.ini in the Web root. By downloading the affected files, a remote attacker could obtain user names and passwords.Upgrade to the latest version of ezRADIUS (0.2beta or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1753.title: OpenCms sessions.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1753.body: OpenCms is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the sessions.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the searchfilter parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1754.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Agent AClient information disclosure
CVE-2008-1754.body: The Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Agent could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. The AClient password is stored as clear text in system memory. By dumping system memory for AClient.exe, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain password information.Refer to SYM08-011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1755.title: World of Phaos showSource.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-1755.body: World of Phaos could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the showSource.php script. By sending a direct URL request to config_settings.php using the file parameter, an attacker could obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1757.title: ConcoursPhoto module for KwsPHP index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1757.body: The ConcoursPhoto module for KwsPHP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the VIEW parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0069.title: XnView slideshow buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0069.body: XnView is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by slideshow files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted slideshow file containing an overly long Fontname parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of XnView (1.93.4 or later), available from the XnView Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-0312.title: Symantec AutoFix Tool ActiveX control GetEventLogInfo() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0312.body: The Symantec AutoFix Tool ActiveX control (SYMADATA.DLL) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GetEventLogInfo method. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to SYM08-009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-0409.title: HFS (HTTP File Server) host field cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-0409.body: HFS (HTTP File Server) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the host field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of HFS (HTTP File Server) (2.2c or later), available from the HFS ~ Http File Server Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-0490.title: WP-Cal plugin for WordPress editevent.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0490.body: WP-Cal plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the editevent.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0492.title: Persits XUpload ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-0492.body: The Persits XUpload ActiveX control (xupload.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes overly long arguments to the AddFile() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0538.title: phpIP display.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-0538.body: phpIP Management is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the display.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-0706.title: Multiple HP Compaq laptops PC BIOS power-on password security bypass
CVE-2008-0706.body: Multiple HP Compaq laptops could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions caused by an unspecified error in PC BIOS. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the power-on password feature to gain access to the system.Refer to HPSBGN02319 SSRT080027 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1006.title: Apple Safari window.open() security bypass
CVE-2008-1006.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by an error in the window.open() function in the WebCore component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could use the window.open() function to bypass policy restrictions and modify the security context of a Web page to the caller's context. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (3.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1017.title: Apple QuickTime crgn atom buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1017.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in quicktime.qts, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing crgn atoms. By persuading a victim to open a malicious movie file containing malformed clipping region (crgn) atoms, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.4.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1066.title: Smarty modifier.regex_replace.php plugin security bypass
CVE-2008-1066.body: Smarty could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the modifier.regex_replace.php plugin. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the template security features related to a '\0' character search string to bypass the template security and possibly execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Smarty (2.6.19 or later), available from the Smarty Download Web page. See References.For Serendipity:Upgrade to the latest version of Serendipity (1.3 or later), available from the Serendipity Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1149.title: phpMyAdmin $_REQUEST variable SQL injection
CVE-2008-1149.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the $_REQUEST superglobal variable, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to PMASA-2008-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1182.title: pfSense unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1182.body: pfSense is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of pfSense (1.2 or later), available from the pfSense Digest Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1221.title: Multiple MicroWorld eScan products filename directory traversal
CVE-2008-1221.body: Multiple MicroWorld eScan products could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. By sending an FTP request for any known filename prepended by forward slash or back slash characters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download the targeted file and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1224.title: BosClassifieds Classified Ads System account.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1224.body: BosClassifieds Classified Ads System is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the account.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the returnTo parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the BosDev Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1247.title: Linksys WRT54g router security bypass
CVE-2008-1247.body: The Linksys WRT54g router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the invoking of scripts without checking for valid credentials by the Web interface. By sending a direct request to multiple "tri" files, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system and perform arbitrary administrative tasks.For WRT54G wireless routers 5 and 6:Upgrade to the latest firmware version of WRT54g (1.02.5 or later), available from the Linksys Web site. See References.For WRT54G wireless router 8:Upgrade to the latest firmware version of WRT54g (8.00.5 or later), available from the Linksys Web site. See References.For WRT54G wireless router 8.2:Upgrade to the latest firmware version of WRT54g (8.2.05 or later), available from the Linksys Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1269.title: Alice Gate 2 Plus Wi-Fi router admin panel security bypass
CVE-2008-1269.body: Alice Gate 2 Plus Wi-Fi router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the cp06_wifi_m_nocifr.cgi admin panel script. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URL containing a direct request to the wlRadioEnable parameter, an attacker could disable Wi-Fi encryption on the affected device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1293.title: Linux Terminal Server Project ldm.c weak security
CVE-2008-1293.body: Linux Terminal Server Project (LTSP) could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in ldm.c. By establishing an X session to an LTSP client, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view a victim's windows or keystrokes.Refer to DSA-1561-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1316.title: QuickTalk forum id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1316.body: QuickTalk forum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the qtf_ind_search_ov.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1385.title: Top Referrers plugin for Serendipity referer header cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1385.body: The Top Referrers plugin for Serendipity is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the HTTP Refer header to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Serendipity (1.3.1 or later), available from the Serendipity Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1483.title: OpenSSH sshd session hijacking
CVE-2008-1483.body: OpenSSH could allow a local authenticated attacker to hijack forwarded X11 sessions, caused by an error in sshd when setting the DISPLAY environment variable. By listening to the same port used to forward the X11 session, a local attacker could obtain the MIT-MAGIC-COOKIE and hijack other user's sessions.For Globus Toolkit GSI:Upgrade to the latest version of Globus Toolkit GSI (4.3 or later), available from the GSI-OpenSSH Bundle Web page. See References.For cwrsync:Upgrade to the latest version of cwrsync (2.12 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1535.title: rekry!Joom module for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1535.body: The rekry!Joom module for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the op_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of rekry!Joom (1.0.1 alpha or later), available from the Joomla! Extensions Directory Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1617.title: WorkSite Web TransferCtrl Class ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2008-1617.body: The Interwoven WorkSite Web TransferCtrl Class ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to execute code on the system, caused by a double-free error when referencing certain JavaScript variables. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that passes specially-crafted requests via the Server method, an attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of WorkSite Web (8.2 SP1 P2 or later), available from the Interwoven Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1630.title: CuteFlow language parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1630.body: CuteFlow is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the showcirculation.php, edittemplate_step2.php, showfields.php, showuser.php, editmailinglist_step1.php, and showtemplates.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the language parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1650.title: EasyNews index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1650.body: EasyNews is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to index.php using the read parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1672.title: OpenSSL Server Key exchange message denial of service

CVE-2008-1867.title: Blog Pixel Motion index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1867.body: Blog Pixel Motion is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the categorie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1868.title: Blog Pixel Motion sauvBase.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-1868.body: Blog Pixel Motion could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the sauvBase.php script. By sending a direct URL request to sauvBase.php, an attacker could download the backend database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1869.title: Site Sift Listings index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1869.body: Site Sift Listings is vulnerable to SQL injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1872.title: Comdev News Publisher index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1872.body: Comdev News Publisher is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the home.news.php script using the arcmonth parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1873.title: NukeET private messages cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1873.body: NukeET is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when sending private messages. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the mensaje parameter to inject malicious JavaScript code or HTML elements into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed using Internet Explorer. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1874.title: Xpoze mail.html SQL injection
CVE-2008-1874.body: Xpoze is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the mail.html script using the reed parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Xpoze (3.10 or later), available from the Xpoze Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1875.title: Terong PHP Photo Gallery index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1875.body: Terong PHP Photo Gallery is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the photo_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1876.title: VisualPic index.php file include
CVE-2008-1876.body: VisualPic could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the _CONFIG[files][functions_page] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1877.title: tss file information disclosure
CVE-2008-1877.body: tss, when running on Debian Linux, could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the "-a" parameter to read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1881.title: VideoLAN VLC media player ParseSSA() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1881.body: VideoLAN VLC media player is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ParseSSA function. By persuading a victim to load a SSA media file containing an overly long subtitle, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest SVN version of VLC media player, available from the VLC SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-1881.title: VLC Media Player subtitle buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1881.body: VLC Media Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing subtitles. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ssa or .avi file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1883.title: Blackboard Academic Suite modified client information disclosure
CVE-2008-1883.body: Blackboard Academic Suite could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of MD5 password hashes. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a modified client that ignores the hash calculation to access acounts and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Blackboard Academic Suite (6.3.1.683, 7.0.404.58, 7.1.467.35, 7.2.383.45, 7.3.216.0, or 8.0.184.0 or later), available from the Blackboard Academic Suite Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1884.title: Wikepage index.php multiple parameters file include
CVE-2008-1884.body: Wikepage could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the template, Admin, or Recent_changes parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1885.title: Nefficient Download NeffyLauncher ActiveX control (NeffyLauncher.dll) directory traversal
CVE-2008-1885.body: The Nefficient Download NeffyLauncher ActiveX control (NeffyLauncher.dll) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that passes a specially-crafted string to the SkinPath parameter containing "dot dot" sequences (/../), an attacker could download a malicious file specified in the HttpSkin parameter to the victim's system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the CDNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1886.title: Nefficient Download ActiveX control (NeffyLauncher.dll) KeyCode security bypass
CVE-2008-1886.body: The Nefficient Download ActiveX control (NeffyLauncher.dll) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, when using weak cryptography to determine a keycode. By calculating the KeyCode, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the protection mechanism and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the CDNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1887.title: Python PyString_FromStringAndSize() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1887.body: Python is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when assert() is disabled. By passing a negative size value to the PyString_FromStringAndSize() function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.For Apple Mac OS:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1888.title: Microsoft SharePoint Services Picture Source cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1888.body: Microsoft SharePoint Services is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Rich Text Editor. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Picture Source field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1889.title: XplodPHP AutoTutorials viewcat.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1889.body: XplodPHP AutoTutorials is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewcat.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1890.title: Jom Comment component for Joomla! unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-1890.body: The Jom Comment component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to unspecified scripts, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of JomComment component for Joomla! (3.0.1 or later), available from the azrul Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1891.title: Ruby WEBrick CGI information disclosure
CVE-2008-1891.body: Ruby could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the WEBrick class when used with certain filesystems. By sending a specially-crafted URL request appended with certain encoded characters, an attacker could bypass CGI execution to download the affected file.Refer to Ruby Programming Language Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1892.title: Blogator Script bs_auth.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1892.body: Blogator Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bs_auth.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1893.title: W2B Online Banking index.php file include
CVE-2008-1893.body: W2B Online Banking could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-1894.title: BusinessObjects Infoview cms parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1894.body: BusinessObjects Infoview XI is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cms parameter when logging in to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Fix Pack 3.5), available from the Business Objects Support Web site. CVE-2008-1895.title: Carbon Communities id SQL injection
CVE-2008-1895.body: Carbon Communities is vulnerable to SQL injection.
