CVE-2008-1896.title: Carbon Communities login.asp and member_send.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1896.body: Carbon Communities is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.asp and member_send.asp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Redirect or OrderBy parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1897.title: Asterisk IAX2 Protocol ACK response denial of service
CVE-2008-1897.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to verify the ACK response has a call number matching the server's reply to a NEW message during IAX2 handshakes by the IAX2 Protocol. By sending a spoofed ACK response message, a remote attacker could cause the system to release early audio packets to the targeted address and cause a denial of service.Refer to AST-2008-006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1898.body: The Microsoft Works ActiveX control (WkImgSrv.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on a system. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that passes a negative integer to the WksPictureInterface method, an attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the victim or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1903.title: NewsOffice news_show.php file include
CVE-2008-1903.body: NewsOffice could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-1904.body: CcMail could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of authentication credentials by the admin.php script. By setting the cookie to "admin", a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access, with administrative credentials, to a vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of CcMail (1.0.2 or later), available from the Cicoandcico Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1905.body: Nero MediaHome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the NMMediaServer.exe service. By sending an overly long HTTP request to TCP port 54444, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1906.title: cpCommerce calendar.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1906.body: cpCommerce is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the calendar.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1907.body: cpCommerce is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1911.body: 1024 CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1913.body: Lasernet CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1914.body: BigAnt Messenger is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the AntServer Module (AntServer.exe). CVE-2008-1915.title: BlogWorx view.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-1915.body: BlogWorx is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the view.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1916.title: Ubercart module for Drupal orders cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1916.body: Ubercart module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-1917.title: AMFPHP multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1917.body: AMFPHP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the methodTable.php, code.php, and details.php scripts. CVE-2008-1918.title: PHP-Fusion submit_info parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-1918.body: PHP-Fusion is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote authenticated attacker with knowledge of the database table prefix could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the submit.php script using the submit_info[] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP-Fusion (7.00.3 or later), available from the PHP-Fusion Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1918.title: PHP-Fusion submit.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1918.body: PHP-Fusion is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote authenticated attacker with knowledge of the database table prefix could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the submit.php script using the submit_info[] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP-Fusion (6.01.15 or later), available from the PHP-Fusion Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1919.title: Apartment Search Script listtest.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1919.body: Apartment Search Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the listtest.php script using the "r" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1920.title: ICQ boxelyRenderer module buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1920.body: ICQ is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the boxelyRenderer module in the Personal Status Manager. By persuading a victim to view a malicious status message containing specially-crafted HTML tags, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for your system, available from the ICQ Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1921.title: 5th Avenue E-Commerce Packages category_list.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1921.body: 5th Avenue E-Commerce Packages are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the category_list.php script using the category_ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1924.title: phpMyAdmin unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2008-1924.body: An unspecified error in phpMyAdmin could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disclose arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (2.11.5.2 or later), available from the phpMyAdmin Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1925.title: InspIRCd namesx and uhnames modules buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1925.body: InspIRCd is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the namesx and uhnames modules. By sending specially-crafted nicknames, idents, and long hostnames via a large number of channel users, an attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of InspIRCd (1.1.18 or later), available from the InspIRCd Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1926.title: util-linux-ng login data manipulation
CVE-2008-1926.body: util-linux-ng could allow a remote attacker to manipulate data, caused by an argument injection vulnerability in login-utils/login.c. By editing portions of log events, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hide activities and possibly insert arbitrary data into the audit log.Upgrade to the latest version of util-linux-ng (2.13.1.1 or later), available from the util-linux Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1927.title: Perl UTF8 double free memory corruption denial of service
CVE-2008-1927.body: Perl is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a double free memory corruption error. By sending a specially-crafted regular expression containing UTF8 characters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service on the affected system. Note: It may also be possible for this vulnerability to be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Perl (5.10.0-1 or later), available from The Perl Foundation Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1928.title: Imager image-based fill buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1928.body: Imager is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing certain images containing an image-based fill. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Imager (0.64 or later), available from the Imager Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-1930.title: WordPress authentication cookie security bypass
CVE-2008-1930.body: WordPress could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of the authentication cookie. By creating a specially-crafted account and authentication cookie, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain administrative access and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress (2.5.1 or later), available from the WordPress Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1931.body: Multiple Realtek HD Audio Codec Drivers could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when handling IOCTL requests. CVE-2008-1932.title: Multiple Realtek HD Audio Codec Drivers IOCTL integer overflow
CVE-2008-1932.body: Multiple Realtek HD Audio Codec Drivers are vulnerable to an integer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling IOCTL requests. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Realtek HD Audio Codec Driver (6.0.1.5605 or later), available from the Realtek Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1933.title: Zune ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2008-1933.body: The Zune ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site and authorize the code to run, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SaveToFile() insecure method to create and overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1934.title: Crazy Goomba id SQL injection
CVE-2008-1934.body: Crazy Goomba is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1935.title: Filiale component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1935.body: The Filiale component for Joomla! and Mambo is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1936.title: Gonafish ClassifedCaffe index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1936.body: Gonafish ClassifedCaffe is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1937.title: MoinMoin userform security bypass
CVE-2008-1937.body: MoinMoin could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error during userform processing. CVE-2008-1938.title: Sony Mylo COM-2 SSL certificate spoofing
CVE-2008-1938.body: Sony Mylo COM-2 could allow a remote attacker to spoof trusted SSL certificates, caused by improper validation of certificates. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof SSL certificates and redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information that could be used to launch further attacks against the victim's system.Upgrade to the latest version of Sony Mylo COM-2 (1.002 or later), available from the Sony Mylo Download Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1939.title: Philboard philboard_reply.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-1939.body: Philboard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the philboard_reply.asp or the philboard_newtopic.asp script using the id, topic or forumid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1940.title: grsecurity Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) security bypass
CVE-2008-1940.body: grsecurity could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the user_transition_deny and user_transition_allow Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system rules. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via calls to sys_setfsuid() and sys_setfsgid() to bypass RBAC system rules.Upgrade to the latest version of grsecurity (2.1.11-2.6.24.5 or 2.1.11-2.4.36.2 or later), available from the grsecurity Download Web site. CVE-2008-1942.title: Foxit Reader ExtGState dictionary code execution
CVE-2008-1942.body: Foxit Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when processing PDF documents. By persuading a victim to view a PDF document containing a specially-crafted ExtGState dictionary, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Foxit Reader (2.3 Build 2825 or later), available from the Foxit Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1942.title: Foxit Reader PDF XObject code execution
CVE-2008-1942.body: Foxit Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when processing PDF documents. By persuading a victim to view a PDF document containing a specially-crafted PDF XObject, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Foxit Reader (2.3 Build 2825 or later), available from the Foxit Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1943.title: Xen para-virtualized framebuffer (PVFB) description denial of service
CVE-2008-1943.body: Xen is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by hypervisor's para-virtualized framebuffer (PVFB). A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malformed frontend framebuffer description to crash the application or execute arbitrary code in the privileged domain (Dom0).Refer to RHSA-2008-0194 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2008-1944.title: Xen para-virtualized framebuffer (PVFB) message denial of service
CVE-2008-1944.body: Xen is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the hypervisor's para-virtualized framebuffer (PVFB). A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malformed frontend framebuffer description to crash the application or execute arbitrary code in the privileged domain (Dom0).Refer to RHSA-2008-0194 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1946.title: GNU Coreutils pam_succeed_if security bypass
CVE-2008-1946.body: GNU Coreutils could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper use of the Pluggable Authentication Module (PAM) pam_succeed_if() function in a configuration file. By sending an "su" command, a local attacker with knowledge of the password could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to a locked or expired account.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1947.title: Apache Tomcat Host Manager cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1947.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Host Manager. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the name parameter in a specially-crafted form to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the form is submitted. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (5.5.SVN, 6.0.SVN, or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1948.title: GnuTLS _gnutls_server_name_recv_params() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1948.body: GnuTLS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper validation of data by the _gnutls_server_name_recv_params function. By sending a TLS 1.0 Client Hello message containing a specially-crafted server name extension, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of GnuTLS (2.2.5 or later), available from the GNU TLS Library Project Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1949.title: GnuTLS _gnutls_recv_client_kx_message() denial of service
CVE-2008-1949.body: GnuTLS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the _gnutls_recv_client_kx_message function. By sending a TLS record containing multiple Client Hello handshake messages, a remote attacker could cause the service to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of GnuTLS (2.2.5 or later), available from the GNU TLS Library Project Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1950.title: GnuTLS _gnutls_ciphertext2compressed() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1950.body: GnuTLS is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by an integer signedness error in the _gnutls_ciphertext2compressed function. By sending an encrypted Client Hello message in a TLS Record containing an invalid Record Length field following the TLS 1.0 handshake, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of GnuTLS (2.2.5 or later), available from the GNU TLS Library Project Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1951.title: Red Hat sblim RPATH privilege esclation
CVE-2008-1951.body: An untrusted search path vulnerability related to an incorrect RPAH setting in the Red Hat sblim package could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. By forcing a binary to load a malformed shared library, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-1953.title: Magnolia Enterprise Edition Magnolia Enterprise Edition Sitedesigner search template script cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1953.body: Magnolia Enterprise Edition is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Magnolia Enterprise Edition Sitedesigner search template script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the query parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Magnolia Enterprise Edition Sitedesigner (1.1.5 or later), available from the Magnolia Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1954.title: Web Calendar Pro one_day.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1954.body: Web Calendar Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the one_day.php script using the user_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1955.title: MyBoard rep.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1955.body: Martin BOUCHER MyBoard is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the rep.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1956.title: Wikepage wiki parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1956.body: Wikepage is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2008-1957.body: Tr Script News is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the news.php script using the nb parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1958.body: Tr Script News could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the main.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1959.title: SIPp get_remote_video_port_media() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1959.body: SIPp is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the get_remote_video_port_media() function. By sending a specially-crafted SIP message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SIPp (3.1 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-1960.title: ContRay search.cgi cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1960.body: ContRay is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using search parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1961.title: AllMyGuests index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1961.body: AllMyGuests is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the AMG_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1962.title: aterr functions.inc.php and common.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-1962.body: aterr could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the functions.inc.php or common.inc.php scripts using the class or file parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1963.title: Grape Web Statistics functions.php file include
CVE-2008-1963.body: Grape Web Statistics could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the functions.php script using the location parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Grape Web Statistics (0.2 alpha-0.8.6.17 (0.2 Alpha 4)), available from the Quate Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1965.title: IBM Lotus Symphony and Expeditor Client rcplauncher.exe code execution
CVE-2008-1965.body: IBM Lotus Symphony and Lotus Expeditor Client for Desktop could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by insecure use of the cai: URI handler (rcplauncher.exe). By persuading a victim to click on a cai: URI that passes a specially-crafted request to the -launcher option, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1303813 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1966.title: IBM DB2 UDB RECOVERJAR and REMOVE_JAR denial of service
CVE-2008-1966.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the RECOVERJAR and REMOVE_JAR procedures. By sending a specially-crafted parameter to either of the affected procedures, a remote authenticated attacker could crash the database.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1287889, 1256235, and 1255572 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-1967.title: Cezanne CFLogon.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1967.body: Cezanne is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the CFLogon.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SleUserName parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1968.body: Cezanne is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the CFLookup.asp or CznCustomContainer.asp script using the FUNID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1969.title: Cezanne multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1969.body: Cezanne is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the CFLookUP.asp, CznCustomContainer.asp, home.asp, CVCard.asp, PayrollCard.asp, and CznDFStartProcess.asp scripts. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1971.body: phShoutBox could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of authentication credentials by the admin.php script. By setting the cookie to "phadmin" or "ssbadmin", a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access, with administrative credentials, to a vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of phShoutBox (1.5.1 Final or later), available from the phphq.Net Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1973.title: SubEdit Player subtitle files buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1973.body: SubEdit Player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing supplied subtitles. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted subtitle file containing an overly long line, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1974.body: Horde Groupware Webmail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the addevent.php script. CVE-2008-1975.body: E RESERV' is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1976.body: The Internationalization and the Localizer module for Drupal are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-1978.title: Ubercart module for Drupal cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1978.body: The Ubercart module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when editing certain product features. CVE-2008-1979.body: CA ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an out-of-bounds memory access error in the CA ARCserve Discovery Service (casdscvc). CVE-2008-1981.body: The E-Publish module for Drupal is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by certain forms. CVE-2008-1982.title: Spreadsheet plugin for WordPress ss_load.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-1982.body: The Spreadsheet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-1983.body: Advanced Electron Forum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2008-1985.title: Digital Hive base.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-1985.body: Digital Hive is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the base.php script. CVE-2008-1987.body: EncapsGallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. CVE-2008-1989.body: 123 Flash Chat module for e107 could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-1990.body: Acidcat CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the default.asp and main_login2.asp scripts using the cID or the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1991.body: Acidcat CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin_colors_swatch.asp script. CVE-2008-1992.title: Acidcat CMS email security bypass
CVE-2008-1992.body: Acidcat CMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions of the default_mail_aspemail.asp, default_mail_cdosys.asp or the default_mail_jmail.asp scripts. CVE-2008-1993.title: Acidcat CMS FckEditor file upload
CVE-2008-1993.body: Acidcat CMS could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the failure of permissions on the FCKEditor component. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to gain unauthorized access to the system and upload arbitrary files using FCKEditor.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1994.title: Acon HOME buffer overflow
CVE-2008-1994.body: Acon is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by acon.c, menu.c, and child.c. By sending an overly large $HOME variable or terminal columns number, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-1996.title: Licq host connections denial of service
CVE-2008-1996.body: Licq is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to release unused host connections. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by establishing multiple simultaneous connections to cause the server to stop accepting requests, resulting in a denial of service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (licq_socket.h), available from the Licq Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-1998.title: IBM DB2 Universal Database SYSPROC.NNSTAT file overwrite
CVE-2008-1998.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database could allow a remote authenticated attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system, caused by an error in the SYSPROC.NNSTAT procedure. By passing a name of an existing file to the NNSTAT log file parameter, an attacker could overwrite arbitrary files.Refer to IBM Technote (FAQ) 1287889, 1256235, and 1255572 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2000.title: Apple Safari document.write() denial of service
CVE-2008-2000.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing certain requests. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that passes an overly long value to the document.write() function, a remote attacker could cause the utilization of all memory resources or crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2001.title: Apple Safari file URI denial of service
CVE-2008-2001.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error during the handling of file: URIs. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URI, a remote attacker could crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2003.title: BadBlue badblue.exe, uninst.exe, and dyndns.exe files weak security
CVE-2008-2003.body: BadBlue could cause weaker than expected security, caused by insecure permissions on the badblue.exe, uninst.exe, and dyndns.exe files in the Web root. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to uninstall the application and possibly launch further attacks against the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2005.title: SuiteLink Service slssvc.exe denial of service
CVE-2008-2005.body: SuiteLink Service, as used in multiple Wonderware products, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in slssvc.exe. By sending an overly long Registration packet to TCP port 5413, a remote attacker could crash the service.Upgrade to the latest version of SuiteLink (2.0 Patch 01 or later), available from the Wonderware Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2006.title: Apple iCal TRIGGER denial of service
CVE-2008-2006.body: Apple iCal is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of integer input. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ics file using the TRIGGER parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a NULL pointer dereference error and crash the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-003, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2011.title: National Rail Enquiries Live Departure Board Gadget code execution
CVE-2008-2011.body: The National Rail Enquiries Live Departure Board Gadget could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code, caused by the improper validation of arguments passed from the Web server. By performing a man-in-the-middle attack, a remote attacker could inject and execute arbitrary script code on the computer with the privileges of the affected gadget.Upgrade to the latest version of National Rail Enquiries Live Departure Boards Gadget (1.1 or later), available from the Windows Live Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2013.title: The pnFlashGames module for PostNuke id SQL injection
CVE-2008-2013.body: The pnFlashGames module for PostNuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-2014.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service. By invoking the document.write() function using JavaScript code, a remote attacker could cause the application to enter into an infinite loop resulting in a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2015.title: Watchfire AppScan ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2008-2015.body: The Watchfire AppScan ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. CVE-2008-2016.title: ChiCoMaS operation and lang parameter file include
CVE-2008-2016.body: ChiCoMaS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the operation or lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2017.title: ChiCoMaS operation and lang parameter file include
CVE-2008-2017.body: ChiCoMaS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the operation or lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2018.title: PHPizabi template.class.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-2018.body: PHPizabi could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the template.class.php script. CVE-2008-2023.title: MegaBBS attach-file.asp and controlpanel.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-2023.body: MegaBBS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the attach-file.asp or controlpanel.asp script using the attachmentid, invisible, or timeoffset parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2024.title: miniBB glang[] parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2024.body: miniBB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the glang[] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of miniBB (2.2a or later), available from the miniBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2027.title: RSA Authentication Agent IISWebAgentIF.dll security bypass
CVE-2008-2027.body: RSA Authentication Agent could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in IISWebAgentIF.dll. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and open a malicious ftp link using the url parameter, a remote attacker could bypass cross-domain security restrictions and redirect the victim to a malicious site and possibly conduct phishing attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of RSA WebID Authentication Agent (5.3.3.378 or later), available from the RSA Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2028.title: miniBB index.php glang parameter information disclosure
CVE-2008-2028.body: miniBB could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the index.php script when register_globals is enabled. By sending a URL direct request to the glang parameter, an attacker could obtain the full installation path.Upgrade to the latest version of miniBB (2.2a or later), available from the miniBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2029.title: miniBB setup_mysql.php and setup_options.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2029.body: miniBB is vulnerable to SQL injection, caused by an error in the setup_mysql.php and setup_options.php scripts. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the xtr parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of miniBB (2.2a or later), available from the miniBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2031.title: VicFTPS LIST command denial of service
CVE-2008-2031.body: VicFTPS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error that can occur when processing a malformed LIST command. By sending a specially-crafted LIST command, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the FTP server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2032.title: Femitter Server FTP denial of service
CVE-2008-2032.body: Acritum Femitter Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the FTP server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted RETR command to crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2035.title: Multiple Bluemoon, Inc. modules for XOOPS unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2035.body: Multiple Bluemoon inc. modules for XOOPS are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For BackPack:Upgrade to the latest version of BackPack (0.93 or later), available from the Bluemoon XOOPS Web site. See References.For BmSurvey:Upgrade to the latest version of BmSurvey (0.85 or later), available from the Bluemoon XOOPS Web site. See References.For newbb_fileup:Upgrade to the latest version of newbb_fileup (1.84 or later), available from the Bluemoon XOOPS Web site. See References.For News_embed:Upgrade to the latest version of News_embed (1.45 or later), available from the Bluemoon XOOPS Web site. See References.For PopnupBlog:Upgrade to the latest version of PopnupBlog (3.20 or later), available from the Bluemoon XOOPS Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2036.title: Koobi Pro poll_id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-2036.body: Koobi Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the poll_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2037.title: EsContacts msg cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2037.body: EsContacts is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the add_groupe.php, contacts.php, groupes.php, importer.php, login.php, and search.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2038.title: SunShop Shopping Cart adminindex.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2038.body: SunShop Shopping Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the adminindex.php script using the orderby or sort parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2040.title: Peercast HTTP::getAuthUserPass() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2040.body: Peercast is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the HTTP::getAuthUserPass() function when the authorization type is set to HTTP Basic. By sending a specially-crafted authentication request using an overly long HTTP Basic authentication string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects GNOME PeerCast.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2042.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Javascript API app.checkForUpdate() code execution
CVE-2008-2042.body: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file that invokes the Javascript API app.checkForUpdate() function, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute restricted functions and arbitrary code on a victim's system.Refer to APSB08-13 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2043.title: cPanel HTTP requests cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-2043.body: cPanel is vulnerable to multiple cross-site request forgeries, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to create a new database, add a new mysql or ftp user, add a cron entry, or perform other malicious activities such as cross-site scripting attacks or Web cache poisoning.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2045.title: Sugar Community Edition Feed.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-2045.body: Sugar Community Edition could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the Feed.php script. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the RSS URL field in the RSS module to obtain sensitive information.Refer to the SugarCRM Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2046.title: SiteXS CMS index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2046.body: SiteXS CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2047.title: Angelo-Emlak profil.asp and prodetail.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-2047.body: Angelo-Emlak is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the profil.php and the prodetail.asp scripts using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2048.title: Angelo-Emlak Default.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2048.body: Angelo-Emlak is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Default.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sayfa parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2049.title: E-Post Mail Server POP3 information disclosure
CVE-2008-2049.body: E-Post Mail Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the POP3 service. By sending specially-crafted APOP commands, an attacker with knowledge of the victim's account name could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the POP3 password and other sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (EPSTPOP3S.EXE version 4.23), available from the E-Post Mail Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2050.title: PHP FastCGI SAPI buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2050.body: PHP is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by FastCGI SAPI. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.6 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate upgrade for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2055.title: Cisco ASA and Cisco PIX TCP ACK packet denial of service
CVE-2008-2055.body: Cisco ASA and Cisco PIX devices are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when Telnet, Secure Shell (SSH), WebVPN, SSL VPN, or ASDM is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted TCP ACK packet to the outside interface, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20080604-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2059.title: Cisco ASA and Cisco PIX Control-plane Access Control Lists (ACLs) weak security
CVE-2008-2059.body: Cisco ASA and Cisco PIX could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in Control-plane Access Control Lists (ACLs). Certain ACLs may not function after initial configuration. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20080604-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2063.title: Joovili category parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-2063.body: Joovili is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the browse.videos.php script using the category parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2065.title: Jokes Site Script jokes.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2065.body: Jokes Site Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the jokes.php script using the catagorie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Jokes Site Script Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2066.title: miniBB bb_admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2066.body: miniBB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bb_admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the whatus parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2069.title: Novell GroupWise client mailto: URI buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2069.body: Novell GroupWise client is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper parsing of mailto: URIs. By persuading a victim to open an HTML email attachment containing a specially-crafted mailto: URI in an iframe SRC tag, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7000314 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2070.title: cPanel WHM interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2070.body: cPanel is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the WHM interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the issue, user, search, and possibly other parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of cPanel (11.18.4 or later), available from the cPanel Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2071.title: cPanel WHM interface cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-2071.body: cPanel is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the WHM interface. By persuading an authenticated victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to create new users, modify permissions, suspend accounts, change passwords, or perform other malicious activities such as cross-site scripting attacks or Web cache poisoning.Upgrade to the latest version of cPanel (11.18.4 or later), available from the cPanel Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2072.title: vlbook "l" parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2072.body: vlbook is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "l" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2073.title: vlbook global.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-2073.body: vlbook could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the global.inc.php script using the "l" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2074.title: Harris Wap Chat sysFileDir file include
CVE-2008-2074.body: Harris Wap Chat could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the sysFileDir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2075.title: AstroCam pic.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2075.body: AstroCam is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the pic.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the picfile parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of AstroCam (2.7.4 or later), available from the Steffen Wendzel Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2076.title: ActualAnalyzer Lite admin.php file include
CVE-2008-2076.body: ActualAnalyzer Lite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.php script using the style parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2078.title: Robocode AWT Event Queue security bypass
CVE-2008-2078.body: Robocode could allow an attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the internals of the Robocode game. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the AWT Event Queue to access AWT Event Queue internals.Upgrade to the latest version of Robocode (1.6.0 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: File Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2080.title: Common Data Format (CDF) Read32s_64() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2080.body: Common Data Format (CDF) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Read32s_64() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted CDF file containing overly long length tags, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of CDF (3.2.1 or later), available from the CDF NASA Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2081.title: Siteman admin.php code execution
CVE-2008-2081.body: Siteman could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the module parameter to inject arbitrary shell script into the Big Textbox, which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2083.title: Prozilla Hosting Index directory.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2083.body: Prozilla Hosting Index is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the directory.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2084.title: MyArticles module for RunCMS topics.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2084.body: MyArticles module for RunCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the topics.php script using the topic_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2085.title: SIPp get_remote_ip_media() and get_remote_ipv6_media() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2085.body: SIPp is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the get_remote_ip_media() and get_remote_ipv6_media() functions in call.cpp. By sending a specially-crafted SIP message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of July 17, 2010.

CVE-2008-2087.title: Web Host Directory Script host_id SQL injection
CVE-2008-2087.body: Web Host Directory Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search_result.php script using the host_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2090.title: Sun Solaris SCTP denial of service
CVE-2008-2090.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the SCTP protocol. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via specially-crafted SCTP packets to panic the system cause the network device to hang.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 236521 or Sun Alert ID: 236321 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2091.title: Kubelance ipn.php file include
CVE-2008-2091.body: Kubelance could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the ipn.php script using the "i" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2092.title: Linksys SPA2102 Phone Adapter ping denial of service
CVE-2008-2092.body: Linksys SPA2102 Phone Adapter is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of network datagrams. By sending an overly large number of ICMP Echo Requests (Ping), a remote attacker could cause the device to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2093.title: Community Builder suite Profiler component for Mambo and Joomla! user parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-2093.body: The Community Builder suite Profiler component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the user parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Community Builder (1.0.2 or later), available from the Joomlapolis Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2094.title: Article module for XOOPS article.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2094.body: The Article module for XOOPS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the article.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2095.title: FlippingBook component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2095.body: The FlippingBook component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the book_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2097.title: VMware openwsman privilege escalation
CVE-2008-2097.body: VMware could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by an error in the openwsman management service. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted Content-Length value to gain root privileges.Refer to VMSA-2008-0009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2098.title: Multiple VMware products HGFS buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2098.body: Multiple VMware products are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the implementation of the Host Guest File System (HGFS) shared folders feature. If the shared folders are enabled and at least one folder is shared, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the vmx process.Refer to VMSA-2008-0008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2103.title: Bugzilla bug view cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2103.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "Format for Printing" or "Long Format" view of a bug or bug list in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Bugzilla Security Advisory, May 4, 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2104.title: Bugzilla XML-RPC interface security bypass
CVE-2008-2104.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to bypass "canconfirm" security restrictions, caused by an error in the XML-RPC interface. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the XML-RPC interface to put bugs in the NEW or ASSIGNED status.Refer to Bugzilla Security Advisory, May 4, 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2105.title: Bugzilla email_in.pl security bypass
CVE-2008-2105.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in email_in.pl. By sending an email containing a changer/reporter value in the message body, an attacker could bypass security restrictions on certain systems that filter on "From" header content.Refer to Bugzilla Security Advisory, May 4, 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2106.title: Call of Duty 4 stats command denial of service
CVE-2008-2106.body: Call of Duty 4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a negative integer error when processing certain stats commands. By sending a specially-crafted "type (7)" stats command, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2107.title: PHP GENERATE_SEED security bypass
CVE-2008-2107.body: PHP, when running on 32-bit systems, could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. A multiplication process by the GENERATE_SEED macro function uses values which create a zero seed and makes a security bypass easier on the protection mechanism. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to generate predictable random values for the rand and mt_rand functions and gain unauthorized access to the applications.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.6 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2107.title: PHP GENERATE_SEED() weak security
CVE-2008-2107.body: PHP, when running on 64-bit systems, could provide weaker than expected security. A multiplication process by the GENERATE_SEED macro function creates zero bit portions and makes attacks easier on protection mechanisms that use the rand and mt_rand functions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to generate predictable random numbers and gain unauthorized access to the applications.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.6 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2108.title: PHP GENERATE_SEED() weak security
CVE-2008-2108.body: PHP, when running on 64-bit systems, could provide weaker than expected security. A multiplication process by the GENERATE_SEED macro function creates zero bit portions and makes attacks easier on protection mechanisms that use the rand and mt_rand functions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to generate predictable random numbers and gain unauthorized access to the applications.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.6 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2110.title: QTOFileManager qtofm.php file upload
CVE-2008-2110.body: QTOFileManager could allow a remote attacker to upload .jpg files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the qtofm.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload malicious .jpg files and execute arbitrary script code on the system, once the attachment is opened by the victim.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2111.title: Yahoo! Assistant yNotifier.dll ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2008-2111.body: The Yahoo! Assistant ActiveX Control (yNotifier.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that passes specially-crafted arguments using unspecified vectors in the Ynoifier COM object, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Yahoo! Assistant Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2113.title: PHPEasyData annuaire.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2113.body: PHPEasyData is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the annuaire.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2114.title: PRE SHOPPING MALL search.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2114.body: PRE SHOPPING MALL is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php script using the search parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2115.title: Power Editor editor.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2115.body: Power Editor is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the editor.php script when performing a tempedit action. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "te" or dir parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2116.title: Power Editor editor.php file include
CVE-2008-2116.body: Power Editor could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the editor.php script when performing a tempedit action using the te or dir parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2117.title: Project Alumni year parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2117.body: Project Alumni is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2008-2139.title: rootpw plugin in rPath Appliance Platform Agent cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-2139.body: The rootpw plugin in rPath Appliance Platform Agent is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when the rootpw plugin is enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2216.body: Project Based Calendaring System (PBCS) could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the yopy_upload.php script. CVE-2008-2217.body: Content Management System for Phprojekt could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2230.body: reportbug and reportbug-ng could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to untrusted search paths. CVE-2008-2232.title: Afuse filenames command execution
CVE-2008-2232.body: Afuse could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by filenames prior to a system() call. CVE-2008-2234.body: Openwsman could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an SSL session replay attack. CVE-2008-2234.body: Openwsman is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking when decoding the HTTP basic authentication header. CVE-2008-2235.title: OpenSC smart cards and USB crypto token weak security
CVE-2008-2235.body: OpenSC could provide weaker than expected security. The 5015 directory on smart cards and USB crypto tokens running Siemens CardOS M4 uses ADMIN file control information of 00. CVE-2008-2250.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 954211 is not installed, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerabilities: The Microsoft Windows kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of input passed from a parent window to a child when a new window is created. By executing a malicious application on the system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. The Microsoft Windows kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper handling of system calls from multiple threads. By executing a malicious application on the system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. The Microsoft Windows kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of input passed from user mode to the kernel. By executing a malicious application on the system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-061.
