CVE-2008-2908.title: Novell iPrint ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2908.body: The Novell iPrint ActiveX control (ienipp.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string value to the operation, printer-url or target-frame parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to Novell Technical Information Document ID: 5028061 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2909.title: Clever Copy results.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2909.body: Clever Copy is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the results.php script using the searchtype parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2910.title: autoProducer DXTTextOutEffect ActiveX control (TextOut.dll) FontSetting buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2910.body: The autoProducer DXTTextOutEffect ActiveX control (TextOut.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the FontSetting() method. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page using Internet Explorer, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2911.title: Contenido index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2911.body: Contenido is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the contenido, Belang, or username parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Contenido (4.8.6 or 4.6.24 or later), available from the Contenido Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2912.title: Contenido multiple parameters file include
CVE-2008-2912.body: Contenido could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If the allow_url_fopen and allow_url_include settings are enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the contenido_path, the cfg[path][contenido], the cfg[path][templates] or the cfg[templates][right_top_blank] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Contenido (4.8.6 or 4.6.24 or later), available from the Contenido Web site. See References..

CVE-2008-2914.title: PHP JOBWEBSITE PRO JobSearch3.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2914.body: PreProducts PHP JOBWEBSITE PRO is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the JobSearch3.php script using the kw or position parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2915.body: Pre Job Board is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the JobSearch.php script using the kw or position parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2916.title: Pre ADS Portal showcategory.php software-description.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2916.body: Pre ADS Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showcategory.php or software-description.php script using the cid or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2917.title: Esmartcart productsofcat.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-2917.body: Pre Projects E-SMART CART is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the productsofcat.asp script using the category_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2919.title: gllcTS2 listing.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-2919.body: gllcTS2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the listing.php script using the sort parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-2920.title: EZCMS filemanager unauthorized access
CVE-2008-2920.body: EZCMS could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access, caused by improper restrictions on the filemanager page. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, an attacker could gain access to restricted administrative pages.Upgrade to the latest version of EZCMS (1.2.1 or later), available from the EZTechhelp Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2921.title: EZCMS page parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-2921.body: EZCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of EZCMS (1.2.1 or later), available from the EZTechhelp Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2923.title: Lyris ListManager words parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2923.body: Lyris ListManager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the words parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Lyris ListManager (9.3e or later), available from the Lyris ListManager Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2924.title: Webmatic unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2924.body: Webmatic is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Webmatic (2.8 or later), available from the Valarsoft Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2925.title: Webmatic unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-2925.body: Webmatic is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Webmatic (2.8 or later), available from the Valarsoft Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2927.title: Adium MSN protocol handler code execution
CVE-2008-2927.body: Adium could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by multiple integer overflow errors in the msn_slplink_process_msg() function in the MSN protocol handler. By sending a specially-crafted SLP message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Adium (1.3 or later), available from the Adium Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2928.title: Red Hat Directory Server Accept-Language buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2928.body: Red Hat Directory Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing Accept-Language HTTP headers. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker with access to the Administration Server Web interface could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Red Hat Directory Server (7.1 SP7 or later), available from the Red Hat Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2930.title: Red Hat Directory Server LDAP search denial of service
CVE-2008-2930.body: Red Hat Directory Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of LDAP search patterns. By sending a specially-crafted LDAP request that matches malformed data records, a remote attacker with access to the LDAP service could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available CPU resources resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Red Hat Directory Server (7.1 SP7 or later), available from the Red Hat Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2931.title: Linux kernel do_change_type function privilege escalation
CVE-2008-2931.body: The Linux kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by improper verification of caller CAP_SYS_ADMIN capability in the do_change_type function. By modifying the properties of a mountpoint, an attacker could gain elevated privileges or cause a denial of service.Refer to Red Hat Bugzilla Bug 454388 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2933.title: Mozilla Firefox chrome: and file: command line URI security bypass
CVE-2008-2933.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when handling command line URIs. An attacker could exploit this vulnerably via pipe "|" symbols passed from another Internet-connected application when Firefox is not running to open multiple tabs via chrome: URIs, read data from the victim's disk via file: URIs following the placement of a malicious file in a guessable location, or execute arbitrary code using XUL based error pages.Refer to MFSA 2008-35 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2934.title: Mozilla Firefox GIF file code execution
CVE-2008-2934.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the Mozilla graphics code on Mac OS X. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to free an uninitialized pointer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2008-36 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2935.title: libxslt exsltCryptoRc4EncryptFunction and exsltCryptoRc4DecryptFunction function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2935.body: libxslt is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the exsltCryptoRc4EncryptFunction and exsltCryptoRc4DecryptFunction functions. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted stylesheet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2936.title: Postfix symlink code execution
CVE-2008-2936.body: Postfix could allow a local attacker with write permission to the mail spool directory to execute arbitrary code on the system when a root mailbox does not exist on the system, caused by an error when handling symlink files. By creating hardlink a root-owned symlink to /var/mail, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Postfix (2.5.4 Patchlevel 4 or later), available from the Postfix Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2937.title: Postfix email information disclosure
CVE-2008-2937.body: Postfix could allow a local attacker with create permissions to the mail spool directory to obtain sensitive information. The destination ownership is not properly verified during email delivery. By creating an insecure mailbox file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read other user's mail.Upgrade to the latest version of Postfix (2.5.4 Patchlevel 4 or later), available from the Postfix Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2938.title: Apache Tomcat allowLinking UTF-8 directory traversal
CVE-2008-2938.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error when allowLinking is set to true or URIEncoding is set to UTF-8. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL request to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Tomcat (6.0.18 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2939.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_ftp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-2939.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mod_proxy_ftp module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an FTP wildcard character in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. Note: This vulnerability affects multiple vendor HTTP server components that utilize the Apache mod_proxy_ftp module. See References.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.2.11 or later) or (2.0.63 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.For IBM HTTP Server 6.0.2:Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.33 or later) or APAR PK70197. See References.For IBM HTTP Server 6.1:Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.21 or later) or APAR PK70197. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2940.title: HP Linux Imaging and Printing (HPLIP) alert-mailing privilege escalation
CVE-2008-2940.body: HP Linux Imaging and Printing (HPLIP) could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the alert-mailing functionality. By sending a specially-crafted packet that triggers alert mails to be sent from the root account, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2941.title: HP Linux Imaging and Printing (HPLIP) hpssd denial of service
CVE-2008-2941.body: HP Linux Imaging and Printing (HPLIP) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the hpssd message parser. By sending specially-crafted packets to port 2207/TCP, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to stop the hpssd process.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2942.title: Mercurial patch.py directory traversal
CVE-2008-2942.body: Mercurial could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted request to the patch.py script containing "dot dot" sequences (..) using a patch file to modify arbitrary files on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (87c704ac92d4), available from the Mercurial Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2943.title: IBM Tivoli Directory Server ldapadd denial of service
CVE-2008-2943.body: IBM Tivoli Directory Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a double-free error while handling requests. By sending a specially-crafted request using ldapadd, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to add the GlobalAdminGroup entry and crash the affected application. Note: It is possible that an attacker with ldap administrative privileges could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to IBM APAR IO09113 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2944.title: Linux kernel utrace support denial of service
CVE-2008-2944.body: The Linux kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a double-free error in the utrace functionality. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the GNU GDB testsuite to cause the kernel to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux kernel (2.6.25.10 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-2945.title: Sun Java System Access Manager XSLT stylesheet code execution
CVE-2008-2945.body: Sun Java System Access Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when processing XSLT stylesheets contained inside XSLT Transforms. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted XML Signature, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with privileges of the application.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 201538 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-2950.title: poppler Page class constructor/destructor code execution
CVE-2008-2950.body: poppler could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the deletion of an uninitialized pageWidgets object in the Page class constructor/destructor. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could invoke a call to an address during the deletion of the object and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of poppler (0.8.5 or later), available from the poppler Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2951.title: Trac quickjump function URI redirect
CVE-2008-2951.body: Trac could allow a remote attacker to redirect URLs, caused by an error in the quickjump function. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URI, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct phishing attacks.Upgrade to the latest version of Trac (0.10.5 or later), available from the Trac Project Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-2952.title: OpenLDAP ber_get_next function denial of service

CVE-2008-2959.title: Microsoft Visual Basic Enterprise Edition vb6stkit.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2008-2959.body: Microsoft Visual Basic Enterprise Edition is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the vb6stkit.dll module. By persuading a victim to open a malicious visual basic form that passes an overly long string to the lpstrLinkPath parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

If register_globals is enabled and support for .htaccess files is disabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (2.11.7 or later), available from the phpMyAdmin Web site. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Refer to TYPO3-20080701-4 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3044.title: News Calendar extension for TYPO3 unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-3044.body: The News Calendar (newscalendar) extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3046.title: Packman extension for TYPO3 blacklist weak security
CVE-2008-3046.body: The Packman (kb_packman) extension for TYPO3 could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error related to an incomplete blacklist. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerablity using unknown attack vectors.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3049.title: PDF Generator 2 extension for TYPO3 unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2008-3049.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the PDF Generator 2 (pdf_generator2) extension for TYPO3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information using unknown attack vectors.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3052.title: SQL Frontend extension for TYPO3 unspecified denial of service
CVE-2008-3052.body: The SQL Frontend (mh_omsqlio) extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to cause a denial of service.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3053.title: SQL Frontend extension for TYPO3 unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-3053.body: The SQL Frontend (mh_omsqlio) extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3055.title: Support view extension for TYPO3 unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-3055.body: The Support view (ext_tbl) extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3056.title: Codeon Petition extension for TYPO3 unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-3056.body: The Codeon Petition (cd_petition) extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unspecified parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to TYPO3-200807011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3057.title: Oempro cookie session hijacking
CVE-2008-3057.body: Oempro could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the improper handling of insecure cookies. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that fails to set the PHPSESSID cookie with a secure flag, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTTP requests to hijack the victim's HTTP session and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Oempro (4 or later), available from the Octeth Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3058.title: Oempro index.php and campaign_track.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3058.body: Oempro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php or campaign_track.php script using the member, client, admin or FormValue_SearchKeywords parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Oempro (4 or later), available from the Octeth Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3060.title: V-webmail login page path disclosure
CVE-2008-3060.body: V-webmail could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the login page using invalid input or an invalid session ID to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3063.title: V-webmail login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3063.body: V-webmail is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3064.title: RealPlayer local resource reference unspecified
CVE-2008-3064.body: An unspecified vulnerability in RealPlayer could allow an attacker to reference local resources using unknown attack vectors.Refer to the Real Player Customer Support Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3066.title: RealNetworks RealPlayer ActiveX control (rjbdll.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3066.body: The RealPlayer ActiveX control (rjbdll.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the import() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to the Real Player Customer Support Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3076.title: Netrw plugin for VIM multiple code execution
CVE-2008-3076.body: The Netrw plugin for VIM could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by errors in multiple functions in the mz and mc commands. By persuading a victim to execute certain commands on a file or directory containing a specially-crafted name, an attacker could execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3078.title: Opera canvas functions information disclosure
CVE-2008-3078.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in canvas function handling. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via JavaScript to obtain random data from the victim's memory.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (9.51 or later), available from the Opera Download Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3081.title: Avaya Messaging Storage Server FTP storage settings command execution
CVE-2008-3081.body: Avaya Messaging Storage Server (MSS) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the Messaging Administration interface. By configuring the remote FTP storage settings, a remote attacker with Avaya MSS administrative interface privileges could exploit this vulnerability to execute system commands as the "vexvm" user.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3081.title: Avaya Messaging Storage Server name server lookup command execution
CVE-2008-3081.body: Avaya Messaging Storage Server (MSS) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the Messaging Administration interface. By using the name server lookup, a remote attacker with Avaya MSS administrative interface privileges could exploit this vulnerability to execute system commands as the "vexvm" user.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3081.title: Avaya Messaging Storage Server TCP/IP Networking parameters command execution
CVE-2008-3081.body: Avaya Messaging Storage Server (MSS) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the Messaging Administration interface. By configuring the TCP/IP Networking parameters, a remote attacker with Avaya MSS administrative interface privileges could exploit this vulnerability to execute system commands as the "vexvm" user.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3083.title: Brightcode Weblinks component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3083.body: The Brightcode Weblinks component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3087.title: Kasseler CMS index.php file include
CVE-2008-3087.body: Kasseler CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If module is set to phpManual, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the file parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3088.title: Kasseler CMS index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3088.body: Kasseler CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3089.title: Xpoze user.html SQL injection
CVE-2008-3089.body: Xpoze is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the user.html script using the uid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Xpoze customers should contact Xpoze support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2008-3090.title: BlognPlus d or m parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3090.body: BlognPlus is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "d" or "m" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of BlognPlus (2.5.6 or later), available from the BlognPlus Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3090.title: BlognPlus index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3090.body: BlognPlus is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "p" or "e" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of BlognPlus (2.5.6 or later), available from the BlognPlus Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3091.title: Taxonomy Autotagger module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3091.body: The Taxonomy Autotagger module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability when creating or editing a post to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-041 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3092.title: Taxonomy Autotagger module for Drupal unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-3092.body: The Taxonomy Autotagger module for Drupal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script when creating or editing posts, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-041 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3093.title: ImperialBB avatar file upload
CVE-2008-3093.body: ImperialBB could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions when uploading avatars. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3094.title: Organic groups module for Drupal title information disclosure
CVE-2008-3094.body: The Organic groups module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. If the OG Access module is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the private groups feature to display the title of private groups and obtain sensitive information.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-040 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3095.title: Organic groups module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3095.body: The Organic groups module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability when starting a discussion in a group to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the victim joins a group and starts a discussion. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-040 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3096.title: Outline Designer module for Drupal unspecified security bypass
CVE-2008-3096.body: The Outline Designer module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a programming error. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain authentication as the author of a current content item.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-043 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3097.title: Tinytax taxonomy block module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3097.body: The Tinytax taxonomy block module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability when creating taxonomy terms to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-042 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3098.title: fuzzylime (cms) usercheck.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3098.body: fuzzylime (cms) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the usercheck.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.0.3 or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3100.title: Owl Intranet Engine register.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3100.body: Owl Intranet Engine is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the register.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Owl Intranet Engine (0.95 or later), available from the Owl Intranet Engine Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3101.title: vtiger CRM index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3101.body: vtiger CRM is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user_password or parenttab parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (vtigercrm5_0_4sec_patch.rar), available from the vtiger CRM Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3102.title: Mantis cookie session hijacking
CVE-2008-3102.body: Mantis could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the improper handling of insecure cookies. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that assigns cookies a secure flag, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's HTTP session and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Mantis (1.1.3 or later), available from the Mantis Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3103.title: Sun Java Management Extensions (JMX) management agent security bypass
CVE-2008-3103.body: The Java Management Extensions (JMX) management agent included in the Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an unspecified error. If local monitoring is enabled, a JMX client could exploit this vulnerability and perform unauthorized actions on a system running JMX.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238965 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3104.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment same origin policy security bypass
CVE-2008-3104.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by multiple unspecified errors. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass same origin policy restrictions and create socket connections to gain unauthorized access to certain services on the local host.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238968 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3105.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment XML JAX-WS data processing denial of service
CVE-2008-3105.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in XML data processing. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the JAX-WS client or a service in a trusted application to cause a denial of service.Refer to Sun Alert: 238628 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3105.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment XML JAX-WS data processing unauthorized access
CVE-2008-3105.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access, caused by an error in XML data processing. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the JAX-WS client or a service in a trusted application, to gain unauthorized access to certain files and Web pages.Refer to Sun Alert: 238628 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3107.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment Virtual Machine unauthorized access
CVE-2008-3107.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the Virtual Machine of Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. By persuading a victim to download an untrusted applet or application, a remote attacker could read and write local files or execute local applications that are accessible to the victim.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238967 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3108.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment font processing buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3108.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper validation of fonts. By persuading a victim to execute a specially-crafted applet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and read or write local files or execute local applications that are accessible to the victim.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238666 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3109.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment scripting language support unauthorized access
CVE-2008-3109.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by an error related to scripting language support. By persuading a victim to download an untrusted applet or application, a remote attacker could read and write local files or execute local applications that are accessible to the victim.Refer to Sun Alert 238687 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3110.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment scripting language support information disclosure
CVE-2008-3110.body: Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error related to scripting language support. By persuading a victim to download an untrusted applet, a remote attacker could obtain information from another applet.Refer to Sun Alert 238687 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3111.title: Sun Java Web Start GetVMArgsOption function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3111.body: Sun Java Web Start is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GetVMArgsOption function. By persuading a victim to download an untrusted Java Web Start application containing an overly long java-vm-args value, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the victim to read and write local files, execute local applications, or cause the affected application to crash.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238905 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3112.title: Sun Java Web Start writeManifest method directory traversal
CVE-2008-3112.body: Sun Java Web Start could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error in the writeManifest method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could traverse directories and create arbitrary files. This vulnerability could be further exploited to execute arbitrary code from a malicious file via Runtime.getRuntime.exec.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238905 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3114.title: Sun Java Web Start cache information disclosure
CVE-2008-3114.body: An unspecified error in Sun Java Web Start could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By persuading a victim to download an untrusted Java Web Start application, an attacker could obtain the location of the Java Web Start cache.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 238905 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3119.title: DreamPics Builder index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3119.body: DreamPics Builder is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3122.body: Xerox CentreWare Web is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3123.body: Real Estate Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the listing_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3124.title: Hotel Script index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3124.body: Hotel Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3126.body: Fujitsu ServerView is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ServerView Web interface. CVE-2008-3128.body: Pivot could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. CVE-2008-3129.body: Catviz is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3130.body: OpenCart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2008-3130.title: OpenCart index.php cross-site scripting

CVE-2008-3131.body: pSys is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3132.body: The beamospetition component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3134.title: GraphicsMagick multiple denial of service

CVE-2008-3139.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the RTMPT dissector. See References.

CVE-2008-3141.title: Wireshark RMI information disclosure
CVE-2008-3141.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the RMI dissector. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malformed packet or trace file to obtain system memory.Refer to wnpa-sec-2008-03 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3142.title: Python Unicode string processing buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3142.body: Python is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by an integer overflow during Unicode string processing on 32bit platforms. By sending an overly long string to the application using an unspecified attack vector, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to GLSA 200807-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3144.title: Python multiple files integer overflow
CVE-2008-3144.body: Python is vulnerable to multiple integer overflows in the pymem.h, _csv.c, _struct.c, arraymodule.c, audioop.c, binascii.c, cPickle.c, cStringIO.c, multibytecodec.c, datetimemodule.c, md5.c, rgbimgmodule.c, stropmodule.c, bufferobject.c, listobject.c, obmalloc.c, node.c, asdl.c, ast.c, bltinmodule.c, and compile.c files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified attack vector to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to GLSA 200807-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3144.title: Python PyOS_vsnprintf integer overflow
CVE-2008-3144.body: Python is vulnerable to multiple integer overflows in the PyOS_vsnprintf function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via specially-crafted input to string formatting operations to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to GLSA 200807-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3145.title: Wireshark packet reassembly denial of service
CVE-2008-3145.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error that could occur during packet reassembly. By persuading a victim to open a malformed trace file or by sending a specially-crafted packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2008-04 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3147.title: WeFi ClientWeFiLog.dat and ClientWeFiLog.bak information disclosure
CVE-2008-3147.body: WeFi could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper storage of unencrypted keys in the ClientWeFiLog.dat and ClientWeFiLog.bak log files. By viewing the log files, a local attacker could obtain WEP, WPA and WPA2 access point keys.Refer to WeFi Web site for upgrade information. See References.

CVE-2008-3148.title: ImpREC export macro names buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3148.body: ImpREC is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of export-macro names. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted DLL, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the application or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3148.title: OllyDBG export macro names buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3148.body: OllyDBG is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of export-macro names. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted DLL, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the application or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3149.title: FirePass SNMP denial of service
CVE-2008-3149.body: FirePass is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when traversing OID branches. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via hrSWInstalled in HOST-RESOURCES-MIB to crash the SNMP service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3150.title: Neutrino Atomic Edition index.php code execution
CVE-2008-3150.body: Neutrino Atomic Edition could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of input by the index.php script. If action is set to usb, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "p" or mail parameter to delete the sess.php file and create new pages to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3151.title: 4ndvddb module for PHP-Nuke modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3151.body: The 4ndvddb module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3152.title: SmartPPC directory.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3152.body: SmartPPC is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the directory.php script using the idDirectory parameter which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3153.title: Triton CMS Pro X-Forwarded-For SQL injection
CVE-2008-3153.body: Triton CMS Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using an HTTP request containing the X-Forwarded-For header, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3154.title: CMS WebBlizzard index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3154.body: CMS WebBlizzard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3155.title: Panda ActiveScan AV Class ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3155.body: The Panda ActiveScan AV Class ActiveX control (as2guiie.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an argument to the Update method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Panda ActiveScan (2.01.00 or later), available from the Panda Security Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3156.title: Panda ActiveScan AV Class ActiveX control file download
CVE-2008-3156.body: The Panda ActiveScan AV Class ActiveX control (as2guiie.dll) could allow a remote attacker to download arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an argument to the Update() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download and install arbitrary cabinet files, which could allow the attacker to perform other unauthorized actions on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Panda ActiveScan (2.01.00 or later), available from the Panda Security Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3161.title: IBM Maximo debug.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3161.body: IBM Maximo is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the debug.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "Accept", "Accept-Language", "UA-CPU", "Accept-Encoding", "User-Agent" or "Cookie" HTTP header in a specially-crafted HTTP GET request to inject malicious script into a log file which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the vulnerable application, once the file is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3164.title: fuzzylime (cms) blog.php file include
CVE-2008-3164.body: fuzzylime (cms), formerly PHP-Update could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the blog.php script using the file parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.01b or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3164.title: fuzzylime (cms) content.php command execution
CVE-2008-3164.body: fuzzylime (cms), formerly PHP-Update, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the content.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted URL request to the content.php script to inject and execute malicious shell commands with the privileges of the application.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.01b or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3165.title: fuzzylime (cms) rss.php file include
CVE-2008-3165.body: fuzzylime (cms), formerly PHP-Update, could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the rss.php script using the "p" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.01b or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3166.body: Ray could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the content.inc.php script using the sIncPath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3167.body: Dolphin could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the HTMLSax3.php, safehtml.php, and content.inc.php scripts using the dir[plugins] or sIncPath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3168.title: Empire Server unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2008-3168.body: An unspecified error in thie files utility in Empire Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain the PRNG seed using unknown attack vectors.Upgrade to the latest version of Empire Server (4.3.15 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3169.title: Empire Server unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3169.body: An unspecified error in Empire Server could allow a remote attacker to overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Empire Server (4.3.15 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3171.title: Apple Safari Referer header information disclosure
CVE-2008-3171.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request with a malformed HTTP Referer header to different HTTP Web sites, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read the Referer log data and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3172.title: Opera cookie session hijacking
CVE-2008-3172.body: Opera is vulnerable to session hijacking, caused by improper handling of cookies. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that sets cookies for country-specific top-level domains that have DNS A records, a remote attacker could hijack the victim's HTTP session.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3173.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer cookie dot session hijacking
CVE-2008-3173.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to session hijacking, caused by improper handling of cookies. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that sets cookies for domains that have a public suffix with more than one dot character, a remote attacker could hijack the victim's HTTP session.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3175.title: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops rxRPC.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3175.body: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by an integer underflow in rxRPC.dll. By sending a specially-crafted request to the LGServer service on TCP port 1900, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the service or cause the application to crash.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID: 181721 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2008-3178.title: webXell Editor upload_pictures.php file upload
CVE-2008-3178.body: webXell Editor could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the upload_pictures.php script. CVE-2008-3179.title: phpDatingClub website.php file include
CVE-2008-3179.body: phpDatingClub could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the website.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3180.title: contentNow language_menu.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3180.body: contentNow is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by language_menu.php. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the pageid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3181.title: contentNow upload.php file upload
CVE-2008-3181.body: contentNow could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the upload.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3182.body: Download Accelerator Plus is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when verifying URLs within a .m3u file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .m3u file containing an overly long URL, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3183.body: GAPI CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-3185.body: Relative Real Estate Systems is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3186.body: Chipmunk Blog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the members.php, comments.php, photos.php, archive.php, and cat.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the membername parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3190.title: CodeDB list.php file include
CVE-2008-3190.body: CodeDB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-3191.body: mForum is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3192.title: jSite module parameter file include
CVE-2008-3192.body: jSite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3193.title: jSite page parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3193.body: jSite is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of jSite (1.1 or later), available from the Sclek Web site. CVE-2008-3194.title: pluck predefined_variables.php file include
CVE-2008-3194.body: pluck could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the predefined_variables.php script using the langpref, file, blogpost, or cat parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. CVE-2008-3195.title: TWiki configure image parameter command execution
CVE-2008-3195.body: TWiki could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the configure script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the image parameter to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of TWiki (4.2.3 or later), available from the TWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3195.title: TWiki configure directory traversal
CVE-2008-3195.body: TWiki could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the configure script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the image parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of TWiki (4.2.3 or later), available from the TWiki Web site. CVE-2008-3197.title: PhpMyAdmin db, convcharset and collation_connection parameters cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-3197.body: PhpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-3198.title: Mozilla Firefox chrome cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3198.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a chrome document which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MFSA 2008-35 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3199.title: ReSIProcate multiple unspecified denial of service
CVE-2008-3199.body: ReSIProcate is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. CVE-2008-3200.body: Avlc Forum is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3201.title: Pagefusion index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3201.body: Pagefusion is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the acct_lname, PID, PGID or rez parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3202.title: Xomol CMS index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3202.body: Xomol CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. CVE-2008-3203.title: AuraCMS pages_data.php security bypass
CVE-2008-3203.body: AuraCMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the pages_data.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request using the id parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to add, edit or delete arbitrary data from the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (update_pages_data_php.tar.gz), available from the AuraCMS Web site. CVE-2008-3204.title: Million Pixels tops_top.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3204.body: Million Pixels is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the tops_top.php script using the id_cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3205.title: Wysi Wiki Wyg index.php file include
CVE-2008-3205.body: Wysi Wiki Wyg could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-3206.body: Pubs Black Cat is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3207.body: Pragyan could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2008-3209.title: Black Ice Document Imaging SDK ActiveX control OpenGifFile() buffer overflow

CVE-2008-3213.title: WebCMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3213.body: WebCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3215.title: Clam AntiVirus libclamav/petite.c denial of service

CVE-2008-3218.title: Drupal taxonomy terms cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3218.body: Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-3220.body: The OpenID module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to delete translation strings and perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-045 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For vbDrupal:Upgrade to the latest version of vbDrupal (5.7.0 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3223.title: Drupal Schema API SQL injection
CVE-2008-3223.body: Drupal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the numeric fields in the Schema API, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-045 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For vbDrupal:Upgrade to the latest version of vbDrupal (5.7.0 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3226.title: Joomla! file caching unauthorized access
CVE-2008-3226.body: Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access, caused by an unspecified error in file caching. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to gain unauthorized access to cached pages.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! (1.5.4 or later), available from the Joomla Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3229.title: Op tool Go() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3229.body: The Op tool is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Go() function if "xauth" is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted request using an overly long "XAUTHORITY" parameter, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to SwapOff Changeset 563 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3230.title: FFmpeg lavf demuxer denial of service
CVE-2008-3230.body: The lavf demuxer in FFmpeg is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to FFmpeg Web page for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3231.title: Xine .OGG file denial of service
CVE-2008-3231.body: Xine is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling certain .OGG files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .OGG file, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Xine (xine-lib 1.1.15 or later), available from the Xine-lib Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3232.title: Dotclear images upload unspecified
CVE-2008-3232.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Dotclear related to a missing images upload vulnerability fix has an unknown impact and attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of Dotclear (1.2.8 or later), available from the dotclear Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3232.title: Dotclear images.php file upload
CVE-2008-3232.body: Dotclear could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the images.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3234.title: OpenSSH sshd SELinux role unauthorized access
CVE-2008-3234.body: OpenSSH could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access, caused by an error in sshd. By appending a :/ (colon slash) sequence followed by the role name to the username, an attacker could gain unauthorized access to arbitrary SELinux roles.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3236.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Wsadmin information disclosure
CVE-2008-3236.body: The WebSphere Application Server System Management/Repository component could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in Wsadmin where certain previously encrypted properties become unencrypted. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified attack vectors to obtain sensitive information.For WebSphere Application Server 6.1:Apply Fix Pack 19 (6.1.0.19) or APAR PK61941. See References.For WebSphere Application Server 6.0.2:Apply Fix Pack 29 (6.1.0.29) or APAR PK61941. See References.For WebSphere Application Server 5.1.1:Apply Fix Pack 19 (5.1.5.19) or APAR PK61941. See References.

CVE-2008-3237.title: ITechBids forward_to_friend.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3237.body: ITechBids is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forward_to_friend.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the productid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3239.title: PHPizabi writeLogEntry() code execution
CVE-2008-3239.body: PHPizabi could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the writeLogEntry() function. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the CONF[CRON_LOGFILE] or CONF[LOCALE_LONG_DATE_TIME] parameter to write arbitrary data to files and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3240.title: AlstraSoft Affiliate Network Pro pgm parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3240.body: AlstraSoft Affiliate Network Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. If "Act" is set to "directory", a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the pgm parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3241.title: UltraStats players-detail.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3241.body: UltraStats is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the players-detail.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (players_detail_fixed_30212.rar), available from the Shooter-Szene Web site. CVE-2008-3242.title: PPMate PPMedia Class ActiveX control (PPMPlayer.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3242.body: The PPMate PPMedia Class ActiveX control (PPMPlayer.dll) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the StartUrl() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3243.body: F-PROT Antivirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the antivirus engine. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted ASPack-compressed file to cause the 64-bit engine to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of F-Prot Antivirus (6.0.9.0 or later), available from the F-PROT Web site. CVE-2008-3243.body: F-PROT Antivirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the antivirus engine. CVE-2008-3243.body: F-PROT Antivirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the antivirus engine. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted UPX-compressed file to crash the application.Upgrade to the latest version of F-Prot Antivirus (6.0.9.0 or later), available from the F-PROT Web site. CVE-2008-3244.body: F-PROT Antivirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an out-of-bounds memory access error when handling CHM files. By persuading a victim to open a CHM file containing a specially-crafted header, an attacker could cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of F-Prot Antivirus (6.0.9.0 or later), available from the F-PROT Web site. CVE-2008-3245.title: phpHoo3 viewCat parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3245.body: phpHoo3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the phpHoo3.php script using the viewCat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.
