CVE-2008-3477.title: Microsoft Windows Knowledge Base Article 956416 update is not installed
CVE-2008-3477.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 956416 is not installed, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerabilities: Microsoft Excel could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of calendar object data in the VBA Performance Cache. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Office Excel file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim. Microsoft Excel is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper processing of the Microsoft Excel spreadsheet BIFF file format. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Office Excel file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim. Microsoft Excel could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the REPT function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Office Excel file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-057. See References.

CVE-2008-3477.title: Microsoft Excel calendar object code execution
CVE-2008-3477.body: Microsoft Excel could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of calendar object data in the VBA Performance Cache. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Office Excel file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. OR Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-3479.title: Microsoft Windows Knowledge Base Article 951071 update is not installed
CVE-2008-3479.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 951071 is not installed, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerability: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper parsing of RPC requests by the Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) service. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to a system with the (MSMQ) service installed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-065. See References.

CVE-2008-3479.title: Microsoft Message Queuing RPC code execution
CVE-2008-3479.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper parsing of RPC requests by the Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) service. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to a system with the (MSMQ) service installed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-065. See References.

CVE-2008-3482.title: Panasonic Network Camera error page cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3482.body: Panasonic Network Cameras are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the error page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the Panasonic Support Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3483.title: ScrewTurn Wiki system log cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3483.body: ScrewTurn Wiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the system log. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a URL request to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of ScrewTurn Wiki (2.0.31 or later), available from the ScrewTurn Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3485.title: Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server icabar.exe privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3485.body: An untrusted search path vulnerability in Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. By placing a malicious icabar.exe file in the path, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3486.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery lang cookie parameter file include
CVE-2008-3486.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to various scripts using the lang cookie parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Coppermine Photo Gallery (1.4.19 or later), available from the Coppermine Photo Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3487.title: PHPAuction GPL Enhanced profile.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3487.body: PHPAuction GPL Enhanced is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the profile.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3489.title: PHPX PXL parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3489.body: PHPX is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the PXL cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3490.title: Online Dating mail.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3490.body: Online Dating is vulnerable to SQL injection. If action is set to view, a remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the mail.php script using the mail_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3491.title: iPost go.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3491.body: iPost is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the go.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3491.title: iTGP go.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3491.body: iTGP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the go.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3493.title: RealVNC vncviewer.exe denial of service
CVE-2008-3493.body: RealVNC is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking by the vncviewer.exe application. By sending a specially-crafted update packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3494.title: R3000 Internet Filter HTTP request security bypass
CVE-2008-3494.body: R3000 Internet Filter could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a weakness in URL filtering when processing HTTP headers. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP header with the string "Host:" followed by an unrestricted site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to restricted Web sites.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (R3000 patch version 2.1.05), available from the 8e6 Technologies Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3495.title: Pcshey Portal kategori.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-3495.body: Pcshey Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the kategori.asp script using the kid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3497.title: MyPHP CMS pages.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3497.body: MyPHP CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the pages.php script using the pid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3498.title: nBill index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3498.body: The nBill component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of nBill (1.2.1 or later), available from the nBill Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3500.title: Suggested Terms module for Drupal taxonomy terms cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3500.body: The Suggested Terms module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using taxonomy terms to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the terms are viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-039 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3501.title: Novell Groupwise WebAccess simple interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3501.body: Novell Groupwise is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input within the WebAccess simple interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Novell Technical Information Document ID: 5028200 or Novell Technical Information Document ID: 5028303 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3504.title: mask PHP File Manager unspecified security bypass
CVE-2008-3504.body: mask PHP File Manager (mPFM) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions set on an unspecified script which creates an insecure cookie. By setting the cookie, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of mask PHP File Manager (2.3 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3505.title: PolyPager nr cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3505.body: PolyPager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the nr parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3507.title: LiteNews id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3507.body: LiteNews is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3508.title: LiteNews cookie authentication bypass
CVE-2008-3508.body: LiteNews could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a weakness in session handling. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted admin cookie to gain administrative access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3509.title: LoveCMS addblock.php code execution
CVE-2008-3509.body: LoveCMS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper restrictions on the addblock.php, blocks.php and themes.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute arbitrary PHP code included in inserted page blocks on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3509.title: LoveCMS addblock.php security bypass
CVE-2008-3509.body: LoveCMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to prevent access to the addblock.php, blocks.php and themes.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system to modify various application settings.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3510.title: Crafty Syntax Live Help (CSLH) livehelp_js.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3510.body: Crafty Syntax Live Help (CSLH) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the livehelp_js.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the department parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Crafty Syntax Live Help (2.15.0 or later), available from the Crafty Syntax Live Help Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3511.title: Softbiz Image Gallery latest or msg cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3511.body: Softbiz Image Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the latest or msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3512.title: Kleinanzeigen module for PHP-Nuke modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3512.body: The Kleinanzeigen module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the lid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3513.title: Book Catalog module for PHP-Nuke modules.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3513.body: The Book Catalog module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3520.title: JasPer image file buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3520.body: JasPer is vulnerable to multiple integer overflows. By sending a specially-crafted packet image file related to integer multiplication for memory allocation, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer which would result in an unknown impact.Refer to the JasPer Web page for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3522.title: JasPer jas_stream_printf buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3522.body: JasPer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the jas_stream_printf function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors related to the mif_hdr_put function and the use of vsprint to overflow a buffer which would result in an unknown impact.Refer to the JasPer Web page for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3528.title: Linux Kernel error-reporting denial of service
CVE-2008-3528.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unlimited number of printk console messages reporting corruption within the error-reporting function in the fs/ext2/dir.c, fs/ext3/dir.c, and fs/ext4/dir.c files. By mounting a filesystem containing corrupted data structures, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to hang resulting in a denial of service.Refer to The Linux Kernel Archives Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3529.title: Libxml2 entity names buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3529.body: Libxml2 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the xmlParseAttValueComplex() function. By parsing overly long XML entity names using Libxml2, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of libxml2 (2.7.0 or later), available from the XMLsoft Web site. See References.For Apple Safari:Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (3.2.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See Referencees.

CVE-2008-3531.title: FreeBSD vfs_mount.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3531.body: FreeBSD is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the vfs_mount.c file in the kernel. If vfs.usermount is enabled, a local attacker could send a specially-crafted mount or nmount system call to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-08:08.nmount for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3532.title: Pidgin SSL spoofing
CVE-2008-3532.body: Pidgin could allow a remote attacker to spoof valid servers, caused by improper validation of certificates when an SSL session is initiated. If Pidgin is configured to use the NSS plugin, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof SSL certificates and redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information that could be used to launch further attacks against the victim's system.Upgrade to the latest version of Pidgin (2.5.1 or later), available from the Pidgin Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3539.title: HP OpenView Select Identity (HPSI) Connectors unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2008-3539.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP OpenView Select Identity (HPSI) Connectors could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information using unknown attack vectors.Refer to HPSBMA02361 SSRT080119 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3542.title: HP Insight Diagnostics unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2008-3542.body: An unspecified error in HP Insight Diagnostics could allow a remote attacker to read restricted files and obtain sensitive information.Refer to HPSBMA02373 SSRT071467 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3546.title: GIT repository pathname multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2008-3546.body: GIT is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by multiple functions. By persuading a victim to running a certain command against an overly long repository pathname, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of GIT (1.5.6.4 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3547.title: OpenTTD companies and clients buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3547.body: OpenTTD is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By sending a specially-crafted argument containing overly long names for "companies and clients", a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenTTD (0.6.2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3549.title: Sun Solaris pthread_mutex_reltimedlock_np denial of service
CVE-2008-3549.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the pthread_mutex_reltimedlock_np API. If the deadman feature is enabled, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to hang or panic resulting in a denial of service.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 239387 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3550.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest login page information disclosure
CVE-2008-3550.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the CQWeb login page. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a combination of unspecified scripts in the id field to view the source code and obtain sensitive information.Refer to IBM APAR PK68332 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3553.title: Nokia Series 40 multiple unspecified code execution
CVE-2008-3553.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Nokia Series 40 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors possibly related to MIDP privilege escalation and persistent MIDlets to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3554.title: Discuz! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3554.body: Discuz! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the searchid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3555.title: Mutiple WSN products TID parameter file include
CVE-2008-3555.body: WSN Links, Forum, Knowledge Base, and Gallery could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the TID parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3556.title: Battle.net Clan Script index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3556.body: Battle.net Clan Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the showmember or thread parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3557.title: Free Hosting Manager cookie security bypass
CVE-2008-3557.body: Free Hosting Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of authentication credentials. By modifying the adminuser and cookie parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Free Hosting Manager (2.0.2 or later), available from the Free Hosting Manager Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3558.title: Cisco Webex Meeting Manager WebexUCFObject ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3558.body: The Cisco WebexUCFObject ActiveX control (atucfobj.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the NewObject() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20080814-webex for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3559.title: KAPhotoservice search.asp and order.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3559.body: KAPhotoservice is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.asp and order.asp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the filename or page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3560.title: Kshop module for Xoops kshop_search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3560.body: The Kshop module for Xoops is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the kshop_search.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the search parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3561.title: Shopsystem s03.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3561.body: Shopsystem is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the s03.php script using the ag parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3562.title: Contact module for Chupix CMS index.php file include
CVE-2008-3562.body: The contact module for Chupix CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the module parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3563.title: Plogger plog-download.php, plog-remote.php and plog-themes.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3563.body: Plogger is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the plog-download.php, plog-remote.php or plog-themes.php script using the checked array or activate parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. Note: An attacker must be an authenticated administrator in order to successfully exploit the plog-themes.php script using the activate parameter.Refer to the Plogger Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3564.title: Dayfox Blog p, cat or archive file include
CVE-2008-3564.body: Dayfox Blog could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the "p", cat or archive parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3565.title: MRBS area parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3565.body: MRBS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the day.php, week.php, month.php, search.php, report.php, and help.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the area parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3566.title: freeForum acuparam cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3566.body: freeForum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the acuparam parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3567.title: Winamp NowPlaying unspecified
CVE-2008-3567.body: An unspecified vulnerability related to the NowPlaying feature in Winamp has an unknown impact and attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of Winamp (5.541 or later), available from the Winamp Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3568.title: UNAK-CMS connector.php file include
CVE-2008-3568.body: UNAK-CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the connector.php script using the Dirroot parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3569.title: XAMPP text cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3569.body: XAMPP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the iart.php and ming.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the text parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3571.title: Xerox Phaser UDP denial of service
CVE-2008-3571.body: Xerox Phaser is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling certain requests. By sending an empty UDP packet to a listening port, a remote attacker could cause the device to reboot.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3572.title: Pligg category parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3572.body: Pligg is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the category parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3573.title: Pligg CAPTCHA security bypass
CVE-2008-3573.body: Pligg could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the CAPTCHA implementation that discloses a critical random number. By combining the disclosed number with the current date and the HTTP User-Agent string, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the CAPTCHA registration and automatically create new user accounts for the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3574.title: Pluck multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3574.body: Pluck is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the footer.php, header.php, header2.php, and themeinstall.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3575.title: ezContents CMS minicalendar.php file include
CVE-2008-3575.body: ezContents CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the minicalendar.php script using the GLOBALS[rootdp] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3576.title: OpenTTD TruncateString function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3576.body: OpenTTD is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TruncateString function. By sending a specially-crafted string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenTTD (0.6.2 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3577.title: OpenTTD ttd_main function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3577.body: OpenTTD is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ttd_main function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly long filename supplied as the -g parameter to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenTTD (0.6.2 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3578.title: HydraIRC irc:// URI buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3578.body: HydraIRC is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling irc:// URIs. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted irc:// URI, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of HydraIRC (0.3.165 or later), available from the HydraIRC Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3579.title: AtMail build-plesk-upgrade.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-3579.body: AtMail, when running on Linux, could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the build-plesk-upgrade.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to mirror the AtMail directory.Upgrade to the latest version of AtMail (5.42 or later), available from the Atmail Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3580.title: K-links addreview SQL injection
CVE-2008-3580.body: K-links is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the addreview script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3580.title: K-Links visit.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3580.body: K-Links is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the visit.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3582.title: Keld login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3582.body: Keld is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3583.title: IntelliTamper HTML Parser IMG SRC buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3583.body: IntelliTamper is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the HTML parser. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page containing an overly long IMG SRC tag, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the application or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3584.title: NetBSD PPPoE packet denial of service
CVE-2008-3584.body: NetBSD could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to cause a denial of service, caused by a buffer overflow when processing PPPoE tags. If a PPPoE interface has been created, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted PPPoE packet to the system, to cause the kernel to crash.Refer to NetBSD Security Advisory 2008-010 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3585.title: GreenCart PHP Shopping Cart id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3585.body: GreenCart PHP Shopping Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the product_desc.php and store_info.php scripts using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3586.title: EZ Store component for Joomla! id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3586.body: The EZ Store component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3588.title: phsBlog multiple SQL injection
CVE-2008-3588.body: phsBlog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the comments.php, index.php, and entries.php scripts using the eid, cid, or urltitle parameter which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3589.title: moziloCMS download.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-3589.body: moziloCMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, an attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the download.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the cat parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3592.title: Symphony file upload
CVE-2008-3592.body: Symphony could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (symphony-1701-security-patch), available from the Overture 21 Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3593.title: SyzygyCMS index.php file include
CVE-2008-3593.body: SyzygyCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3594.title: E-Store Kit viewdetails.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3594.body: E-Store Kit is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewdetails.php script using the pid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3595.title: txtSQL startup.php file include
CVE-2008-3595.body: txtSQL could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the startup.php script using the CFG[txtsql][class] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3596.title: Harmoni Username cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3596.body: Harmoni is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when logging in. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Username field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the malformed data is viewed in the Browse Logs page. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Harmoni (1.4.7 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3597.title: Skulltag command 29 denial of service
CVE-2008-3597.body: Skulltag is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when handling command 29. By sending a specially-crafted packet, a remote attacker connected to the server and with knowledge of the password could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Skulltag (0.97d2-RC6 or later), available from the Skulltag Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3598.title: Psi-labs psipuss categories.php and login.php script SQL injection
CVE-2008-3598.body: Psi-labs psipuss is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the categories.php or login.php script using the Cid, username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3599.title: OpenImpro image.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3599.body: OpenImpro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the image.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3600.title: Gallery modules.php file include
CVE-2008-3600.body: Gallery could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the modules.php script using the phpEx parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Gallery (1.5.8 and 1.6-RC1 or later), available from the Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3601.title: Quicksilver Forums index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3601.body: Quicksilver Forums is vulnerable to SQL injection. If "a" is set to "search", a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the forums[] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Quicksilver Forums (1.4.2 or later), available from the Quicksilver Forums Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3602.title: PHP-Ring wr_admin.php security bypass
CVE-2008-3602.body: PHP-Ring could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of authentication credentials by the wr_admin.php script, which creates an insecure cookie. By setting the cookie to "1", a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3603.title: Vacation Rental Script index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3603.body: Vacation Rental Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Vacation Rental Script customers should contact the vendor for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2008-3604.title: ZeeBuddy bannerclick.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3604.body: ZeeBuddy is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bannerclick.php script using the adid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3605.title: McAfee Encrypted USB Manager Re-use Threshold security bypass
CVE-2008-3605.body: McAfee Encrypted USB Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the setting of the Re-use Threshold password. If the Re-use Threshold policy is set to a non-zero value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and conduct off-line password guessing attacks.Refer to McAfee Security Updates Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3606.title: WinGate IMAP server buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3606.body: WinGate is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the IMAP server. By sending an overly long IMAP LIST command, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3607.title: NoticeWare Email Server NG IMAP server denial of service
CVE-2008-3607.body: Noticeware Email Server NG is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the IMAP server when handling certain requests. By sending multiple overly long LOGIN requests, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of NoticeWare Email Server NG (5.1 or later), available from the NoticeWare Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3608.title: Apple Mac OS X ImageIO component JPEG code execution
CVE-2008-3608.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of embedded ICC profiles within images by the ImageIO component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JPEG image, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3609.title: Apple Mac OS X Kernel security bypass
CVE-2008-3609.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to flush credentials during the recycling of vnode by Kernel. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the read or write permissions of a normally restricted file.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3610.title: Apple Mac OS X Login Window security bypass
CVE-2008-3610.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a race condition in the Login Window when processing login attempts. If the Guest account is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and log in as an arbitrary user without entering a password.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3611.title: Apple Mac OS X Login Screen security bypass
CVE-2008-3611.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper clearing of a current password after a failed password change by the Login Window. An attacker with access to the Login Screen could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and reset the password of another user.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3613.title: Apple Mac OS X Finder disk denial of service
CVE-2008-3613.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the Finder component when searching for a remote disk. A remote attacker with access to the local network can force the immediate exit of Finder after initialization, resulting in a denial of service.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3618.title: Apple Mac OS X File Sharing pane weak security
CVE-2008-3618.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security. The File Sharing pane improperly displays actual access privileges, giving the false sense that only folders within the Shared Folders are accessible. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to home directories and disks on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3619.title: Apple Mac OS X Time Machine information disclosure
CVE-2008-3619.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of log files with world-readable access to the backup drive by the Time Machine. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3621.title: Apple Mac OS X VideoConference code execution
CVE-2008-3621.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of H.264 encoded media in the VideoConference framework. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file containing H.264 encoded media, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3622.title: Apple Mac OS X Wiki Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3622.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Wiki Server mailing list archive. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using embedded JavaScript within email messages to inject malicious script code into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the message is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3637.title: Java on Apple Mac OS X HMAC code execution
CVE-2008-3637.body: Java on Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the use of an uninitialized variable by the hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) provider. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and download an untrusted applet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.For Java for Mac OS X 10.5:Apply Apple Security Update 2, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Java for Mac OS X 10.4:Apply Apple Security Release 7, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3638.title: Java on Apple Mac OS X plug-in code execution
CVE-2008-3638.body: Java on Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to prevent applets from launching file:// URLs by the Java plug-in. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and download an untrusted applet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Apply Apple Security Update 2, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3639.title: CUPS read_rle16() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3639.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the read_rle16() function. By sending a specially-crafted SGI (Silicon Graphics Image) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with "lp" user privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of CUPS (1.3.9 or later), available from the Common UNIX Printing System Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3640.title: CUPS WriteProlog() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3640.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error in the WriteProlog() function within the texttops utility. By sending a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with "lp" user privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of CUPS (1.3.9 or later), available from the Common UNIX Printing System Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3641.title: CUPS HPGL filter code execution
CVE-2008-3641.body: CUPS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of pen width and pen color opcodes by the Hewlett-Packard Graphics Language (HPGL) filter. If Printer Sharing is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with "lp" privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of CUPS (1.3.9 or later), available from the Common UNIX Printing System Web site. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Security Update 2008-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3642.title: Apple Mac OS X ColorSync buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3642.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ColorSync API. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image containing an embedded ICC profile, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application crash.Apply Security Update 2008-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3645.title: Apple Mac OS X EAPOLController plugin buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3645.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the IPC component of configd's EAPOLController plugin. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the system configuration daemon to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3648.title: Microsoft Windows nslookup.exe code execution
CVE-2008-3648.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error in nslookup.exe. By persuading a victim to initiate a DNS zone transfer, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3649.title: Article Friendly categorydetail.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3649.body: Article Friendly is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the categorydetail.php script using the Cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Article Friendly customers should contact Article Friendly support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2008-3651.title: IPsec-Tools racoon denial of service
CVE-2008-3651.body: IPsec-Tools is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak in the racoon daemon. By sending an invalid proposal, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of IPsec-Tools (0.7.1 or later), available from the IPsec-Tools Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3652.title: IPsec-Tool orphaned ph1 denial of service
CVE-2008-3652.body: IPsec-Tool is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure of src/racoon/handler.c in racoon to remove an "orphaned ph1" (phase 1) handle after a remote initiation. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available resources resulting in a denial of service.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ipsec-tools-devel), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2008-3655.title: Ruby safe level security bypass
CVE-2008-3655.body: Ruby could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by multiple implementation errors in the safe level restrictions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the untrace_var function, syslog function, $PROGRAM_NAME environment variable, or other insecure methods at safe levels 1 through 3 to bypass security restrictions and launch further attacks against the affected system.For 1.8 series:Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.8.6-p287 or 1.8.7-p72 or later), available from the Ruby Programming Language Web site. See References.For 1.9 series:Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.9.1 or later), available from the Ruby Core SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-3656.title: Ruby WEBrick::HTTPUtils.split_header_value() denial of service
CVE-2008-3656.body: Ruby is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the WEBrick::HTTPUtils.split_header_value() function when using regular expressions. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources, resulting in a denial of service.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For 1.8 series:Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.8.6-p287 or 1.8.7-p72 or later), available from the Ruby Programming Language Web site. See References.For 1.9 series:Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.9.1 or later), available from the Ruby Core SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-3657.title: Ruby DL module security bypass
CVE-2008-3657.body: Ruby could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper input checking by the DL module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by accessing a library using the DL.dlopen function, which would allow the attacker to bypass safe level restrictions and call multiple unsafe functions.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For 1.8 series:Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.8.6-p287 or 1.8.7-p72 or later), available from the Ruby Programming Language Web site. See References.For 1.9 series:Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.9.1 or later), available from the Ruby Core SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-3658.title: PHP imageloadfont buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3658.body: PHP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the imageloadfont function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted font file to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.9 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3659.title: PHP memnstr() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3659.body: PHP is vulnerable to a an unspecified buffer overflow in the memnstr() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the delimiter argument to the explode function to possibly execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the affected application to crash.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.9 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3660.title: PHP FastCGI module denial of service
CVE-2008-3660.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the FastCGI module. By sending a URL request containing multiple dots preceding the extension, a remote attacker could cause the application to crash.For Apple Mac OS:Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (4.4.9 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3663.title: Squirrelmail cookie session hijacking
CVE-2008-3663.body: Squirrelmail could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the improper handling of insecure cookies. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site that fails to set session cookies with a secure flag, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's HTTP session and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of SquirrelMail (1.4.16 or later), available from the SquirrelMail Web site. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3664.title: XRMS login.php, some.php and mileage.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3664.body: XRMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php, some.php and mileage.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3668.title: Yogurt Social Network module for Xoops scrapbook cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3668.body: The Yogurt Social Network module for Xoops is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the scrapbook feature. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the description field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3668.title: Yogurt Social Network module for Xoops uid parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3668.body: The Yogurt Social Network module for Xoops is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the friends.php, seutubo.php, album.php, scrapbook.php, index.php, and tribes.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the uid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3669.title: Reviews Opinions Rating Posting Engine Web-Site PHP Script comments.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3669.body: Reviews Opinions Rating Posting Engine Web-Site PHP Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the comments.php script using the ItemID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3672.title: Classified Ads Script cid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3672.body: Classified Ads Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the browsecats.php or showcategory.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3673.title: Classified Ads Script cid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3673.body: Classified Ads Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the browsecats.php or showcategory.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3675.title: Gelato CMS imgsize.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-3675.body: Gelato CMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the imgsize.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the img parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Gelato CMS, available from the gelato CMS Forum, Aug 18, 1:11 pm. See References.

CVE-2008-3676.title: hMailServer IMAP server denial of service
CVE-2008-3676.body: hMailServer is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the IMAP server. By sending a specific set of IMAP commands, a remote authenticated attacker could cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of hMailServer (4.4.2 or later), available from the hMailServer Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3677.title: Freeway events_application_top.php file include
CVE-2008-3677.body: Freeway could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the events_application_top.php script to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Freeway (1.4.2.197 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3678.title: Freeway search_links.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3678.body: Freeway is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search_links.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Freeway (1.4.2.197 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3679.title: PhpLinkExchange index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3679.body: PhpLinkExchange is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the catid or id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3681.title: Joomla! reset.php security bypass
CVE-2008-3681.body: Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the reset token validation mechanism in reset.php. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Token field to change the administrator password.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! (1.5.6 or later), available from the Joomla! Developer Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3682.title: PHP Realty dpage.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3682.body: PHP Realty is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the dpage.php script using the docID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3686.title: Linux Kernel rt6_fill_node function denial of service
CVE-2008-3686.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the rt6_fill_node function. By sending an IPv6 request when no IPv6 device is in use, a local attacker could cause a kernel OOPS.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-3687.title: Xen flask_security_label function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3687.body: Xen is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the security_label function when compiled with the XSM:FLASK module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the flask_op hypercall to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to xen changeset fa66b33f975a for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3688.title: HTTP Anti Virus Proxy (HAVP) sockethandler.cpp denial of service
CVE-2008-3688.body: HTTP Anti Virus Proxy (HAVP) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the sockethandler.cpp file when handling client requests. By flooding an unresponsive HAVP server with connection requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to enter into an infinite loop and consume all available resources.Upgrade to the latest version of HAVP (0.89 or later), available from the HTTP Anti Virus Proxy Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3697.title: VMWare Server ISAPI Extension denial of service
CVE-2008-3697.body: VMWare Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the ISAPI Extension. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to stop responding.Refer to VMSA-2008-0 014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3698.title: VMware Workstation, Player, ACE, and Server OpenProcess privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3698.body: VMware Workstation, Player, ACE, and Server contain an unspecified vulnerability related to an error in OpenProcess which could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the vulnerable system.Refer to VMSA-2008-0 014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3700.title: Kayako SupportSuite Full Name cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3700.body: Kayako SupportSuite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when creating an account, opening a ticket, or requesting a chat. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Full Name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Kayako SupportSuite (3.30 or later), available from the Kayako Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3700.title: Kayako SupportSuite sessionid or filter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3700.body: Kayako SupportSuite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sessionid or filter parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Kayako SupportSuite (3.30 or later), available from the Kayako Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3701.title: Kayako SupportSuite customfieldlinkid SQL injection
CVE-2008-3701.body: Kayako SupportSuite is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the customfieldlinkid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Kayako SupportSuite (3.30 or later), available from the Kayako Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3703.title: Symantec VERITAS Storage Foundation for Windows VxSchedService.exe code execution
CVE-2008-3703.body: VERITAS Storage Foundation for Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by NULL NTLMSSP authentication in the volume manager scheduler service (VxSchedService.exe) running on TCP port 4888. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the registry to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges when a scheduled run occurs.Refer to SYM08-015 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3704.title: Microsoft Visual Studio Masked Edit ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3704.body: The Microsoft Visual Studio Masked Edit ActiveX control (Msmask32.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that initializes the object with an overly long Mask parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-070. See References.For other distributions:Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3705.title: EchoVNC for Linux CLogger::WriteFormated() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3705.body: EchoVNC for Linux is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the CLogger::WriteFormated() function. By persuading a victim to connect to an Echo server that returns an overly large group list, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of EchoVNC for Linux (1.1.2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3706.title: ZEEJOBSITE bannerclick.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3706.body: ZEEJOBSITE is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bannerclick.php script using the adid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3707.body: CyBoards PHP Lite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the script_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3708.body: dotCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files.
