CVE-2008-3709.title: CyBoards PHP Lite options.php and subscribe.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3709.body: CyBoards PHP Lite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the options.php and subscribe.php scripts. CVE-2008-3711.body: phpArcadeScript is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3714.body: AWStats is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the awstats.pl script. CVE-2008-3716.body: Harmoni is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-3718.body: cyberBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-3728.body: MailScan for Mail Servers could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions to certain pages by the Web administration interface. CVE-2008-3730.title: NOAH unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3730.body: NOAH is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-3736.body: La!cooda WIZ and LacoodaST are vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-3789.body: Samba could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions. CVE-2008-3814.title: Cisco Unity Server anonymous authentication bypass
CVE-2008-3814.body: Cisco Unity Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. If the server is configured for anonymous authentication, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the authentication process and view or change certain configuration parameters.Refer to cisco-sa-20081008-unity for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3815.title: Cisco PIX and ASA NT Domain authentication bypass
CVE-2008-3815.body: Cisco PIX and ASA devices could allow a remote attacker to bypass the authentication process, caused by a related Microsoft Windows NT Domain authentication error. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using remote access IPSec or SSL-based VPN to connect to the device.Upgrade to the latest version of Cisco PIX and ASA (7.0(8)3, 7.1(2)78, 7.2(4)16, 8.0(4)6, 8.1(1)13 or later), available from the Cisco PIX and ASA Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3817.title: Cisco ASA Crypto Accelerator denial of service
CVE-2008-3817.body: The Cisco ASA device is vulnerable to a denial of service caused by a memory leak in the initialization code for the Crypto Accelerator. By sending specially-crafted packets to the device, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Cisco PIX/ASA (8.0(4) or 8.1(2) or later), available from the Cisco PIX/ASA Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3818.title: Multiple Cisco ONS devices control card denial of service
CVE-2008-3818.body: Multiple Cisco ONS devices are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of a steady data stream of TCP traffic to the control cards. By establishing a connection to any open TCP port, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to reset the node's control card resulting in a denial of service.Refer to cisco-sa-20090114-ons for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3821.title: Cisco IOS HTTP Server ping parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3821.body: Cisco IOS HTTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ping or an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to cisco-sr-20090114-http for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3823.title: Multiple Horde products MIME cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3823.body: Multiple Horde products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the MIME library. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using MIME attachment linking to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For Horde Groupware Webmail Edition: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Groupware Webmail Edition (1.1.3 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References. For Horde Groupware: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Groupware (1.1.3 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References. For Horde Application Framework: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Application Framework (3.2.2 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3824.title: Multiple Horde products HTML messages cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3824.body: Multiple Horde products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in HTML messages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the HTML email is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For Horde Groupware Webmail Edition: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Groupware Webmail Edition (1.0.8 or 1.1.3 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References. For Horde Groupware: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Groupware (1.0.7 or 1.1.3 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References. For Horde Application Framework: Upgrade to the latest version of Horde Application Framework (3.1.9 or 3.2.2 or later), available from the Horde Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3825.title: pam_krb5 existing_ticket option privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3825.body: pam_krb5 could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the use of incorrect privileges while reading the Kerberos credential cache when the existing_ticket option is enabled. By setting the KRB5CCNAME environment variable to an arbitrary cache filename and then running the su or sudo program, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges.Refer to RHSA-2008-0907 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3832.body: Fedora is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the utrace_control function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the kernel to crash.Refer to the Fedora Project Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3833.title: Linux Kernel generic_file_splice_write() privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3833.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to drop setuid and setgid bits when there is a write to a file by the generic_file_splice_write() function. By splicing into an inode, a local attacker could create an executable file in a setgid directory and gain the privileges of a different group, obtain certain information, and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux Kernel (2.6.19-rc3 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3834.title: D-Bus _dbus_validate_signature_with_reason() function denial of service
CVE-2008-3834.body: D-Bus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the _dbus_validate_signature_with_reason() function. By persuading a victim to validate a specially-crafted signature, a remote attacker could cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of D-Bus (1.2.4 or later), available from the freedesktop Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3836.title: Mozilla Firefox feedWriter function code execution
CVE-2008-3836.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the feedWriter function. By persuading a victim to preview a specially-crafted feed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-39 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3838.title: Sun Solaris NFS Remote Procedure Calls (RPC) zones denial of service
CVE-2008-3838.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the NFS Remote Procedure Calls (RPC) zones implementation. A local attacker with admin privileges in a non-global zone could exploit this vulnerability to intercept and corrupt NFS traffic intended for other non-global zones, resulting in a denial of service.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 240866 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3842.title: Microsoft ASP.NET ValidateRequest "less-than slash" filter bypass
CVE-2008-3842.body: Microsoft ASP.NET could allow a remote attacker to bypass ValidateRequest filters and conduct cross-site scripting attacks, caused by a vulnerability that was introduced by the MS07-040 update. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a query string containing a less-than slash sequence (</), which would allow the attacker to bypass Request Validation and conduct cross-site scripting attacks against a vulnerable ASP.NET application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3843.title: Microsoft ASP.NET ValidateRequest "less-than tilde slash" STYLE element bypass
CVE-2008-3843.body: Microsoft ASP.NET could allow a remote attacker to bypass ValidateRequest filters and conduct cross-site scripting attacks, caused by a vulnerability that was introduced by the MS07-040 update. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a query string containing a less-than tilde slash sequence (<~/) appended with a malicious STYLE element, which would allow the attacker to bypass Request Validation and conduct cross-site scripting attacks against a vulnerable ASP.NET application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3844.title: RHEL OpenSSH backdoor
CVE-2008-3844.body: The OpenSSH package installed on Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL), signed in August 2008 using a legitimate Red Hat GPG key and available from unofficial distribution points, could contain an externally introduced backdoor. Once installed, these modifications could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3845.title: Crafty Syntax Live Help is_xmlhttp.php and is_flush.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3845.body: Crafty Syntax Live Help is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the is_xmlhttp.php and is_flush.php scripts using the department parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Crafty Syntax Live Help (2.15.0 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3846.title: mysql-lists unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3846.body: mysql-lists is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 2008.

CVE-2008-3847.title: AN Guestbook unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3847.body: AN Guestbook is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of AN Guestbook (0.7.6 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3849.title: Civic Website Manager calendar control cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3849.body: Civic Website Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the calendar control. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Civic Website Manager (1.0.1 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-3850.title: Accellion File Transfer Appliance (FTA) forgot_password.html cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3850.body: Accellion File Transfer Appliance (FTA) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the forgot_password.html Web page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Accellion File Transfer Appliance (FTA_7_0_178 or later), available from the Accellion Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3852.title: IBM DB2 CLR stored procedure deployment add-ins for Visual Studio unspecified
CVE-2008-3852.body: An unspecified error in IBM DB2 related to CLR stored procedure deployment from IBM database add-ins for Visual Studio has an unknown impact and attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of IBM DB2 (9.5 Fixpak 2 or later), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3852.title: IBM DB2 CLR stored procedure deployment unspecified
CVE-2008-3852.body: An unspecified error in IBM DB2 related to CLR stored procedure deployment from IBM database add-ins for Visual Studio has an unknown impact and attack vector.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Fix Pack 5), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3853.title: IBM DB2 UDB DAS server buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3853.body: IBM DB2 UDB is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DAS server application. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the daemon to crash.Refer to IBM APAR IZ12379 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3854.title: IBM DB2 XQUERY, XMLQUERY, XMLEXISTS and XMLTABLE buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3854.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by XQUERY, XMLQUERY, XMLEXISTS and XMLTABLE. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Fix Pack 5), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3854.title: IBM DB2 SQLRLAKA() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3854.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SQLRLAKA function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Fix Pack 5), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3855.title: IBM DB2 admin server privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3855.body: An unspecified error in the DB2 Administration Server (DAS) Core DAS function could allow a local attacker to gain root privileges using unknown attack vectors related to file creation.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Fix Pack 5), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3856.title: IBM DB2 UDB infrastructure unspecified
CVE-2008-3856.body: An unspecified vulnerability in IBM DB2 in the routine infrastructure related to the failure to change ownership of the db2fmp process has an unknown impact and attack vector.Refer to IBM APAR IZ20350 or IBM APAR IZ20352 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3857.title: IBM DB2 UDB Base Service Utilities information disclosure
CVE-2008-3857.body: IBM DB2 UDB could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of a cleartext password in the memory by the Base Service Utilities component after the establishment of a database connection. By reading a memory dump, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to IBM APAR JR27422 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3858.title: IBM DB2 UDB Downlevel DB2RA Support denial of service
CVE-2008-3858.body: IBM DB2 UDB is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Downlevel DB2RA Support component. By sending a specially-crafted CONNECT request that simulates a v7 client connect request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM APAR IZ07299 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3860.title: IBM Lotus Quickr multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3860.body: IBM Lotus Quickr is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via WYSIWYG editors, creating a new local group, the rich text editor, the html import functionality, or link-page to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Lotus Quickr (8.1 Hotfix 15 or later), available from the IBM Support & downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3861.title: phpMyRealty pages.php and search.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3861.body: phpMyRealty is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the pages.php and search.php scripts using the id, price_min or price_max parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the phpMyRealty Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3863.title: GNU enscript read_special_escape() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3863.body: GNU enscript is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the read_special_escape() function. By persuading a victim to convert a specially-crafted ASCII file to PostScript with the -e option enabled, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.For Apple Mac OS: Apply Apple Security Update 2009-002, available from the Apple Web site. See References. Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3864.title: Trend Micro Personal Firewall service (TmPfw.exe) ApiThread() denial of service
CVE-2008-3864.body: Trend Micro Personal Firewall service (TmPfw.exe) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the ApiThread() function when handling packets. By sending a specially-crafted packet containing an overly large field value to TCP port 40000, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the service.For Trend Micro OfficeScan 8.0: Apply the patch for this vulnerability (8.0_SP1_Patch1_CriticalPatch), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3865.title: Trend Micro Personal Firewall service (TmPfw.exe) ApiThread() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3865.body: Trend Micro Personal Firewall service (TmPfw.exe) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ApiThread() function when handling packets. By sending a specially-crafted packet containing a small field value to TCP port 40000, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.For Trend Micro OfficeScan 8.0: Apply the patch for this vulnerability (8.0_SP1_Patch1_CriticalPatch), available from the Trend Micro Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3867.title: interact emailuser.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3867.body: interact is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with knowledge of the database table prefix could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the emailuser.php script using the email_user_key parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from SourceForge.net: Detail: 2208205. See References.

CVE-2008-3868.title: interact unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-3868.body: interact is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to add new super administrator users or perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3872.title: Adobe Flash Player SWF file security bypass
CVE-2008-3872.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted SWF file using unknown Filter evasion manipulations, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the allowScriptAccess control and gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to APSB08-11 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3875.title: Sun Solaris kernel security bypass
CVE-2008-3875.body: Sun Solaris kernel could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the system calls. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass multi-level security policy in Solaris Trusted Extensions or the zone or chroot isolation policy and establish a secret communication channel between two local processes.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 240706 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3878.title: Ultra Office Control Ultra.OfficeControl ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3878.body: The Ultra Office Control ActiveX control (OfficeCtrl.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the HttpUpload() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3880.title: ZoneMinder zm_html_view_event.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3880.body: ZoneMinder is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the zm_html_view_event.php script using the filter parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to the ZoneMinder Forum/Announcements posting dated Feb 09, 2009 9:19 pm. See References.

CVE-2008-3881.title: ZoneMinder multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3881.body: ZoneMinder is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the ZoneMinder Forum/Announcements posting dated Feb 09, 2009 9:19 pm. See References.

CVE-2008-3882.title: ZoneMinder zm_html_view_events.php and zm_html_view_state.php command execution
CVE-2008-3882.body: ZoneMinder could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation by the zm_html_view_events.php or zm_html_view_state.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the executeFilter() function or the run_state parameter to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system.Refer to the ZoneMinder Forum/Announcements posting dated Feb 09, 2009 9:19 pm. See References.

CVE-2008-3884.title: Blogn unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3884.body: Blogn is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Blogn (1.9.8 or later), available from the Blogn Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3885.title: Blogn unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-3885.body: Blogn is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Blogn (1.9.8 or later), available from the Blogn Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3886.title: dotProject index.php multiple parameters cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3886.body: dotProject is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. If various actions are set, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the inactive, date, callback or type parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3887.title: dotProject user_id SQL injection
CVE-2008-3887.body: dotProject is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the user_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3887.title: dotProject tab SQL injection
CVE-2008-3887.body: dotProject is vulnerable to SQL injection. If "m" is set to "projects", a remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the tab parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3889.title: Postfix file descriptor denial of service
CVE-2008-3889.body: Postfix is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a file descriptor leak during the execution of non-Postfix commands. By gaining access to a leaked epoll file descriptor, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a performance reduction resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Postfix (2.4.9, 2.5.5, 2.6-20080902 or later), available from the Postfix Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3890.title: FreeBSD General Protection Fault privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3890.body: FreeBSD, when running on a 64bit system with a FreeBSD/amd64 kernel, could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. By causing a General Protection Fault while the kernel is returning from processing an interrupt or system call, a local attacker could cause the incorrect execution of swapgs CPU instruction. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-08:07.amd64 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3892.title: VMware COM API for Windows ActiveX control (VmCOM.dll) GuestInfo() method buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3892.body: The VMware COM API for Windows ActiveX control (VmCOM.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the GuestInfo() method. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page using Internet Explorer, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Refer to VMSA-2008-0014.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3903.title: Asterisk PBX username information disclosure
CVE-2008-3903.body: Asterisk PBX could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. When Digest authentication is used, a different error message is returned depending on whether or not a valid SIP username has been entered during a login attempt. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to enumerate valid usernames and gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to AST-2009-003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3905.title: Ruby resolv.rb DNS spoofing
CVE-2008-3905.body: Ruby resolv.rb is vulnerable to spoofing attacks, caused by the usage of a fixed source port and sequential transaction IDs for DNS requests. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof DNS responses.Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.8.6-p287, 1.8.7-p72, 1.9 r18423, or later), available from the Ruby Programming Language Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3906.title: Mono Sys.Web module index.php CRLF header injection
CVE-2008-3906.body: Mono is vulnerable to CRLF header injection. A remote attacker could inject CRLF combinations into HTTP headers in the index.php script using the Sys.Web module, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.Refer to Novell Bugzilla Bug 418620 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3907.title: newsbeuter URL command execution
CVE-2008-3907.body: newsbeuter could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted URL within an RSS feed using a Web browser, a remote attacker could inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of newsbeuter (1.1 or later), available from the newsbeuter Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3908.title: WordNet binsrch.c and search.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3908.body: WordNet is vulnerable to a stack-based and heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the binsrch.c and search.c files. By sending an overly long request using library calls, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for WordNet, available from the oCert patch Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3908.title: WordNet wninit() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3908.body: WordNet is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the wninit() function. By sending an overly long request using the WNDBVERSION environment variable, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for WordNet, available from the oCert patch Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3908.title: WordNet morph_init() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3908.body: WordNet is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the morph_init() function. By sending an overly long request using the WNSEARCHDIR and WNHOMES environment variables, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for WordNet, available from the oCert patch Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3908.title: WordNet morph.c and search.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3908.body: WordNet is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the morph.c and search.c files. By sending a specially-crafted command line argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for WordNet, available from the oCert patch Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3911.title: Linux Kernel proc_do_xprt buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3911.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the proc_do_xprt function. By sending a specially-crafted read system call for the /proc/sys/sunrpc/transports file, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3912.title: Clam AntiVirus libclamav denial of service
CVE-2008-3912.body: Clam AntiVirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a Null pointer dereference error in libclamav. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an out-of-memory condition to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Clam AntiVirus (0.94 or later), available from the Clam AntiVirus Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3915.title: Linux Kernel NFSv4 ACL decoding buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3915.body: The Linux Kernel is vulnerable to an unspecified buffer overflow related to NFSv4 ACL decoding. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and possibly execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.26.4 or later), available from the The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3916.title: GNU ed strip_escapes() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3916.body: GNU ed is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the strip_escapes() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of GNU ed (1.0 or later), available from the GNU Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-3917.title: Ovidentia index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3917.body: Ovidentia is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. If tg is set to search and idx to find, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the field parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3918.title: Ovidentia field parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-3918.body: Ovidentia is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the field parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3919.title: JustSystems Ichitaro JTD document code execution
CVE-2008-3919.body: JustSystems Ichitaro could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted JTD document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3920.title: BitlBee unspecified security bypass
CVE-2008-3920.body: An unspecified vulnerability in BitlBee could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and possibly hijack sessions to overwrite existing accounts.Upgrade to the latest version of BitlBee (1.2.2 or later), available from the BitlBee Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3921.title: AWStats Totals unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3921.body: AWStats Totals is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the month or year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of AWStats Totals (1.15 or later), available from the Telartis Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3922.title: AWStats Totals multisort() command execution
CVE-2008-3922.body: AWStats Totals could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrray command on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the multisort() function. By creating specially-crafted sort parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of AWStats Totals (1.15 or later), available from the Telartis Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3923.title: CMME statistics.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3923.body: CMME is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the statistics.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page or year parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of CMME (1.18 or later), available from the CMME Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3924.title: CMME backup information disclosure
CVE-2008-3924.body: CMME could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the backup directory. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a direct request to discover account names, discover password hashes, or download backup files.Upgrade to the latest version of CMME (1.18 or later), available from the CMME Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3925.title: CMME admin.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-3925.body: CMME is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could cause the victim to logout. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3926.title: CMME admin.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-3926.body: CMME could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.asp script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the env parameter to create arbitrary directories on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3926.title: CMME env parameter file include
CVE-2008-3926.body: CMME could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the env parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of CMME (1.18 or later), available from the CMME Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3932.title: Wireshark NCP dissector (packet-ncp2222.inc) denial of service
CVE-2008-3932.body: Wireshark is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the NCP dissector (packet-ncp2222.inc). By sending a specially-crafted NCP packet, a remote attacker could cause an infinite loop.Upgrade to the latest version of Wireshark (1.0.3 or later), available from the Wireshark Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3936.title: Dreambox DM500 Web interface denial of service
CVE-2008-3936.body: Dreambox DM500 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Web interface. By sending an overly long request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the affected device to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3942.title: Full PHP Emlak Script landsee.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3942.body: Full PHP Emlak Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the landsee.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3947.title: OpenVMS DCL privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3947.body: OpenVMS could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an unspecified error in DCL. By sending an overly long command line, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3949.title: emacs python.el code execution
CVE-2008-3949.body: emacs could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in python.el. By placing a specially-crafted emacs.py script in a world writable directory and invoking the run-python command or eldoc-mode option, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with privileges of the user.Refer to the emacs-devel Mailing List, Fri, 05 Sep 2008 13:16:38 -0400 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-3951.title: Agent Zone view_ann.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3951.body: Agent Zone is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the view_ann.php script using the ann_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3952.title: EsFaq questions.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3952.body: EsFaq is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the questions.php script using the idcat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3953.title: Shaadi Zone keyword_search_action.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3953.body: Shaadi Zone is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the keyword_search_action.php script using the tage parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3954.title: Altrasoft Forum Pay Per Post Exchange index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3954.body: Altrasoft Forum Pay Per Post Exchange is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat or catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3955.title: Masir Camp E-Shop Module index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-3955.body: The Masir Camp E-Shop Module is vulnerable to SQL injection. If page is set to vieworderstatus, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the ordercode parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3956.title: Microsoft Organization Chart code execution
CVE-2008-3956.body: Microsoft Organization Chart could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory access violation error in orgchart.exe. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Organization Chart document, an attacker could execute arbitrary code.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3957.title: Microsoft Windows Image Aquisition Logger ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2008-3957.body: The Microsoft Windows Image Aquisition Logger ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the insecure Save() method to overwrite or corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3962.title: sSMTP from_format() information disclosure
CVE-2008-3962.body: sSMTP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the from_format() function that calls the strdup() with uninitialized memory. If geco is unset and FromLineOverride is disabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information copied from the "From:" field within an email.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (ssmtp-unitialized-strdup.patch), available from the Gentoo-Portage Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3964.title: libpng png_push_read_zTXt() function denial of service
CVE-2008-3964.body: libpng is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an off-by-one error in the png_push_read_zTXt() function. By persuading a victim to view a PNG image containing specially-crafted zTXt chunks, an attacker could cause the affected application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libpng (1.2.32beta01 or later), available from the SourceForge.net: Files Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3968.title: PunBB userlist.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-3968.body: PunBB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the userlist.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "p" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of PunBB (1.2.20 or later), available from the PunBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-3970.title: pam_mount luserconf privilege escalation
CVE-2008-3970.body: pam_mount could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a regression error when the luserconf option is enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via user-defined volumes to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of pam_mount (0.47 or later), available from the pam_mount Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-3971.title: Gnome Manual Pages Editor (gmanedit) open_man_file() function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3971.body: Gnome Manual Pages Editor (gmanedit) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the open_man_file() function in callbacks.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted manpage containing an overly long name or title, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3971.title: Gnome Manual Pages Editor (gmanedit) ReadConfFromFile() function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-3971.body: Gnome Manual Pages Editor (gmanedit) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ReadConfFromFile() function in callbacks.c. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted gmanedit configuration file containing an overly long COMMAND string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-3972.title: OpenSC pkcs15-tool weak security
CVE-2008-3972.body: OpenSC could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the failure to apply security updates to a smart card whose label does not match the "OpenSC" string by the pkcs15-tool. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability and possibly launch further attacks on the system.Refer to OpenSC Security Advisory [27-Aug-2008] for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4018.title: IBM AIX swcons command execution
CVE-2008-4018.body: IBM AIX could allow a local authenticated attacker with system group privileges to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the swcons command. By creating a specially-crafted file with root ownership, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to create arbitrary file content and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Refer to IBM SECURITY ADVISORY, Wed Sep 3 09:53:43 CDT 2008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4019.title: Microsoft Excel REPT code execution
CVE-2008-4019.body: Microsoft Excel could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the REPT function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Office Excel file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.  OR  Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-4020.title: Microsoft Windows Knowledge Base Article 957699 update is not installed
CVE-2008-4020.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 957699 is not installed on the system, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerability: Microsoft Office is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of Office documents that user the cdo:// protocol and the Content-Disposition: Attachment header. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cdo:// protocol to inject malicious script into an Office document hosted on a trusted Web site, which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information and possibly launch further attacks against the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-056. See References.

CVE-2008-4020.title: Microsoft Office Content-Disposition cdo:// protocol cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4020.body: Microsoft Office is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of Office documents that use the cdo:// protocol and the Content-Disposition: Attachment header. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cdo:// protocol to inject malicious script into an Office document hosted on a trusted Web site, which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information and possibly launch further attacks against the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-056. See References.

CVE-2008-4023.title: Microsoft Windows Active Directory LDAP search buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4023.body: Microsoft Windows 2000 when running as an Active Directory Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper allocation of memory by the LDAP service. By sending a specially-crafted LDAP request to a vulnerable server, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the system to become unresponsive and eventually restart.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.  OR  Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-4036.title: Microsoft Windows Knowledge Base Article 9556841 update is not installed
CVE-2008-4036.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 956841 is not installed on the system, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerability: Microsoft Windows Memory Manager could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper handling of memory allocation and Virtual Address Descriptors (VADs). By executing a malicious application on the vulnerable system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-064. See References.

CVE-2008-4036.title: Microsoft Windows Memory Manager Virtual Address Descriptors privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4036.body: Microsoft Windows Memory Manager could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper handling of memory allocation and Virtual Address Descriptors (VADs). By executing a malicious application on the vulnerable system, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.  OR  Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-4038.title: Microsoft Windows Knowledge Base Article 957095 update is not installed
CVE-2008-4038.body: Microsoft Knowledge Base Article 957095 is not installed on the system, which could allow a remote attacker to exploit the following vulnerability: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a buffer underflow, caused by improper validation of file names by the Microsoft Server Message Block (SMB) protocol. By sending specially-crafted packets to a vulnerable server, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS08-063. See References.

CVE-2008-4038.title: Microsoft Windows SMB file name buffer underflow
CVE-2008-4038.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a buffer underflow, caused by improper validation of file names by the Microsoft Server Message Block (SMB) protocol. By sending specially-crafted packets to a vulnerable server, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References.  OR  Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2008-4039.title: Spice Classifieds index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4039.body: Spice Classifieds is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat_path parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4040.title: Kyocera FS-118MFP Command Center directory traversal
CVE-2008-4040.body: Kyocera FS-118MFP could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted GET request to the Kyocera Command Center containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4041.title: Softalk Mail Server IMAP denial of service
CVE-2008-4041.body: Softalk Mail Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when handling commands. By sending a specially-crafted IMAP APPEND command, a remote attacker could consume an overly large amount of CPU resources resulting in a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4043.title: AJ HYIP Acme comment.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4043.body: AJ HYIP Acme is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the acme/article/comment.php and prime/article/comment.php scripts using the artid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4045.title: @Mail parse.php, showmail.php and abook.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4045.body: @Mail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the parse.php, showmail.php and abook.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4048.title: Friendly Technologies ActiveX control CreateURLShortcut() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4048.body: The Friendly Technologies ActiveX control (fwRemoteCfg.dll) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long parameter to the CreateURLShortcut() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4049.title: Friendly Technologies ActiveX control command execution
CVE-2008-4049.body: The Friendly Technologies ActiveX control (fwRemoteCfg.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes parameters to the insecure RunApp() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4050.title: Friendly Technologies ActiveX control RegistryValue() information disclosure
CVE-2008-4050.body: The Friendly Technologies ActiveX control (fwRemoteCfg.dll) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the use of the insecure RegistryValue() method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read and write arbitrary registry information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4051.title: Smart Survey surveyresults.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4051.body: Smart Survey is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the surveyresults.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4052.title: HP OpenVMS SMGSHR.EXE buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4052.body: HP OpenVMS is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by SMGSHR.EXE. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4053.title: XOOPS PopnupBlog module index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4053.body: The XOOPS PopnupBlog module is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the param, cat_id or view parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4054.title: Kolifa Download Script indir.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4054.body: Kolifa Download Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the indir.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4056.title: Matterdaddy Market login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4056.body: Matterdaddy Market is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4059.title: Multiple Mozilla products XPCNativeWrappers code execution
CVE-2008-4059.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox 2, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to XPCNativeWrappers pollution. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page and perform certain actions, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-41 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4060.title: Multiple Mozilla products XSLT and document.loadBindingDocument() code execution
CVE-2008-4060.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by errors related to XSLT and the document.loadBindingDocument() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page and perform certain actions, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-41 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4061.title: Multiple Mozilla products layout engine code execution variant 1
CVE-2008-4061.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability related to the layout engine. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and crash the browser or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-42 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4062.title: Multiple Mozilla products JavaScript engine code execution
CVE-2008-4062.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability related to the JavaScript engine. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and crash the browser or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-42 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4065.title: Multiple Mozilla products BOM characters security bypass
CVE-2008-4065.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. Certain BOM characters are stripped from JavaScript code prior to execution. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing specially-crafted control format Unicode characters, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass script filters and perform cross-site scripting attacks.Refer to MFSA 2008-43 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4066.title: Multiple Mozilla products HTML parser security bypass
CVE-2008-4066.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The HTML parser ignores certain low surrogate characters if they are HTML-escaped. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site and click on a specially-crafted JavaScript link, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass script filters and perform cross-site scripting attacks.Refer to MFSA 2008-43 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4067.title: Multiple Mozilla products resource: protocol URL-encoded slash directory traversal
CVE-2008-4067.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page with a specially-crafted resource: protocol URI containing URL-encoded slashes, a remote attacker could view aribitrary files on the victim's system.Refer to MFSA 2008-44 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4068.title: Multiple Mozilla products resource: protocol information disclosure
CVE-2008-4068.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insecure restrictions placed on local HTML files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the resource: protocol to obtain sensitive information about the system.Refer to MFSA 2008-44 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

See References.  OR  Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.
