CVE-2008-4151.body: Cyask could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the collect.php script using the neturl parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4152.title: Talk module for Drupal node title cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4152.body: The Talk module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the node title to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-049 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4153.title: Talk module for Drupal comments security bypass
CVE-2008-4153.body: The Talk module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an improper access setting for viewing a node. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the node page and view the comments.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-049 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4154.title: webEdition CMS we_objectID parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-4154.body: webEdition CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the we_objectID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4156.title: CustomCMS print.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4156.body: CustomCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the print.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4157.title: phpVID groups.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4157.body: phpVID is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the groups.php script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4158.title: Zanfi CMS lite index.php file include
CVE-2008-4158.body: Zanfi CMS lite could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the flag or inc parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4159.title: Zanfi CMS lite page parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-4159.body: Zanfi CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4160.title: Sun Solaris Access Control List (ACL) denial of service
CVE-2008-4160.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the Solaris Access Control List (ACL) implementation for UFS file systems. If the system mounts a world-writeable UFS file system, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a system panic.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 242267 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4163.title: ISC BIND UDP denial of service
CVE-2008-4163.body: ISC BIND is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of UDP packets. By sending a specially-crafted UDP packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the UDP client handler to stop responding.Upgrade to the latest version of ISC BIND (9.3.5-P2-W2, 9.4.2-P2-W2, or 9.5.0-P2-W2 or later), available from the Internet Software Consortium (ISC) Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4164.title: MemHT Portal cron.php path disclosure
CVE-2008-4164.body: MemHT Portal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a direct request to the cron.php script using an invalid parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4165.title: Kolab Groupware Server log file information disclosure
CVE-2008-4165.body: Kolab Groupware Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of passwords by the log file. A remote attacker, currently logged into the server, could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the password of another user and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to Kolab Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4166.title: Avant Browser JavaScript Engine denial of service
CVE-2008-4166.body: Avant Browser is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer overflow error in the JavaScript Engine when handling an overly long string. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4168.title: Pro2col Stingray FTS verify_login.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4168.body: Pro2col Stingray FTS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the verify_login.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username or password parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4169.title: EasyIndex detaillist.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4169.body: EasyIndex is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the detaillist.php script using the produid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4170.title: osCommerce create_account.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-4170.body: osCommerce could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation by the create_account.php script. By sending specially-crafted POST requests using the DOB parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4172.title: Cars & Vehicle page.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4172.body: Cars & Vehicle is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the page.php script using the lnkid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4173.title: ProArcadeScript random parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-4173.body: ProArcadeScript is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the random parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4174.title: Dynamic MP3 Lister index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4174.body: Dynamic MP3 Lister is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the currentpath, invert, search or sort parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4175.title: Link Bid Script edit.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4175.body: Link Bid Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the edit.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4175.title: Link Bid Script upgrade.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4175.body: Link Bid Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the upgrade.php script using the ucat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4176.title: FoT Video scripti izle.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-4176.body: FoT Video scripti is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the izle.asp script using the oyun parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4177.title: Real Estate Website search.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4177.body: Real Estate Website is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4178.title: DownlineGoldmine tr.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4178.body: Multiple DownlineGoldmine products are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the tr.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4179.title: NooMS smileys.php and search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4179.body: NooMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the smileys.php and search.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page_id or the "q" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4180.title: NooMS db.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-4180.body: NooMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the error in the db.php script. By sending a direct request using the g_dbhost parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to brute force the root password and username to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4182.title: Horde Turba Contact Manager test.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4182.body: Horde Turba Contact Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the test.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the User field during an IMAP session the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4183.title: IntegraMOD backup information disclosure
CVE-2008-4183.body: IntegraMOD could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the insecure storing of backups under a Web root directory. By directly accessing the backup folder, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Per the vendor, change the security settings after installation. Refer to the forum Admin Index "IntegraMOD News" section of your own forum or to the Security Update Web page for further information. See References.

CVE-2008-4184.title: webCMS Portal Edition patron parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4184.body: webCMS Portal Edition is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the patron parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4185.title: webCMS Portal Edition id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-4185.body: webCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4186.title: webCMS Portal Edition id_doc SQL injection
CVE-2008-4186.body: webCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id_doc parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4187.title: ProActive CMS index.php file include
CVE-2008-4187.body: ProActive CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing an appended NULL byte (%00) to the index.php script using the template parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4188.title: Secure Directory (kw_secdir) extention for TYPO3 unspecified code execution
CVE-2008-4188.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the Secure Directory (kw_secdir) extension for TYPO3 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to TYPO3-20080919-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4193.title: Alt-N SecurityGateway Web interface buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4193.body: Alt-N SecurityGateway is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of requests sent to the admin Web interface. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request to SecurityGateway.dll using an overly long username parameter, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Alt-N SecurityGateway (1.0.2 or later), available from the Alt-N Technologies Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4194.title: pdnsd p_exec_query denial of service
CVE-2008-4194.body: pdnsd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the p_exec_query function. By sending an overly long DNS reply containing multiple entries in the answer field, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the daemon to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of pdnsd (1.2.7-par or later), available from the pdnsd Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-4195.title: Opera frame address spoofing
CVE-2008-4195.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error in the way Opera checks which address frames can be changed. By creating a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could change the address of frames from other sites opened inside a pop-up window and redirect a user to a malicious Web page that would appear to be trusted.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (9.52 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4197.title: Opera shortcuts code execution
CVE-2008-4197.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when handling custom shortcut and menu commands. By persuading a victim to modify shortcuts or menu files, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to activate applications with malicious parameters and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (9.52 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4199.title: Opera Web feed source information disclosure
CVE-2008-4199.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when verifying if a Web page links to a local file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to link to feed source files on a local system and verify if a file exists or not.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (9.52 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4200.title: Opera news feed subscription requests weak security
CVE-2008-4200.body: Opera could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error when handling news feed subscription requests. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and modify the page address to cause the address field to incorrectly update and provide misleading information to the user.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (9.52 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4202.title: LinksCaffePRO index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4202.body: LinksCaffePRO is vulnerable to SQL injection. If action is set to deadlink, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the idd parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4203.title: CzarNews cn_users.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4203.body: CzarNews is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the cn_users.php script using the recook cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4204.title: SoftAcid Hotel Reservation System city.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-4204.body: SoftAcid Hotel Reservation System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the city.asp script using the city parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4210.title: Linux Kernel open.c privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4210.body: The Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in open.c. Setuid and setgid bits are not removed when there is a write to a file. By creating an executable file in a setgid directory using the truncate or ftruncate function in conjunction with memory-mapped I/O, an attacker could gain the privileges of a different group, obtain certain information, and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux Kernel (2.6.22-rc1or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4211.title: Apple Mac OS X Quicklook code execution
CVE-2008-4211.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a signedness error in QuickLook when handling Microsoft Excel columns. By persuading a victim to download or open a specially-crafted Microsoft Excel file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2008-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4214.title: Apple Mac OS X Script Editor symlink
CVE-2008-4214.body: Apple Mac OS X Script Editor could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. Scripting dictionary temporary files are created with insecure permissions. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to other files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.Apply Security Update 2008-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4215.title: Apple Mac OS X Weblog weak security
CVE-2008-4215.body: Apple Mac OS X could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in the Weblog access control list. Users added to posting ACLs with multiple short names may have improperly enforced access controls. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the system.Apply Security Update 2008-007, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4234.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreTypes Quarantine feature code execution
CVE-2008-4234.body: The Apple Mac OS X CoreTypes module could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an incomplete blacklist vulnerability in the Quarantine feature. By persuading a victim to open a malicious executable file without an associated application for the file content type, which would not cause a "potentially unsafe" warning message to be displayed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply Apple Security Update 2008-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.6 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4241.title: CJ Ultra Plus SID SQL injection
CVE-2008-4241.body: CJ Ultra Plus is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script using the SID cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4242.title: ProFTPD URL cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-4242.body: ProFTPD is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when handling certain FTP URLs. By persuading an authenticated user to click on a specially-crafted FTP URL link containing FTP commands, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to ProFTPD Bugzilla Bug 3115 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4243.title: UT3 WebAdmin ImageServer.uc directory traversal
CVE-2008-4243.body: UT3 WebAdmin could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the ImageServer.uc script containing "dot dot" sequences to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of UT3 WebAdmin (1.7 or later), available from the UT3 WebAdmin Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-4244.title: Rianxosencabos CMS cookie security bypass
CVE-2008-4244.body: Rianxosencabos CMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of authentication credentials. By modifying the usuario and pass cookie parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4245.title: Rianxosencabos CMS Admin Control Panel security bypass
CVE-2008-4245.body: Rianxosencabos CMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the Admin Control Panel. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted URL request to bypass security restrictions and add or delete an administrative account.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4246.title: Denora IRC Stats ctcp denial of service
CVE-2008-4246.body: Denora IRC Stats is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of ctcp version replies. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Denora IRC Stats (1.4.1 or later), available from the Denora Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4278.title: VMware VirtualCenter information disclosure
CVE-2008-4278.body: VMware could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Once the victim has logged in, the VirtualCenter Server password containing special characters is displayed in cleartext by the Virtual Infrastructure Client. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to VMSA-2008-0016 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4279.title: VMware ESX / ESXi jump privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4279.body: VMware ESX / ESXi could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the CPU hardware emulation of JMP instructions to 64-bit addresses. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to jump to an incorrect memory address and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges on the guest operating system.Refer to VMSA-2008-0016 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4283.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server WebContainer HTTP response splitting
CVE-2008-4283.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting, caused by improper validation of response headers by the WebContainer component when any Web-based applications are used. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unspecified attack vectors to have an unknown impact on the system. Reported By: Alex Lauerman of FishNet SecurityApply Cumulative Fix 19 (5.1.1.19 or later) and then install Interim Fix APAR PK69929. See References.

CVE-2008-4285.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server PMI WebSphere Portal denial of service
CVE-2008-4285.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the Performance Monitoring Infrastructure (PMI) feature. If the PMI feature is enabled, there is a gradual decrease in performance that could result in a server crash. The problem can occur with any component statistic being enabled.Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.19 or later) or APAR PK64697. See References.

CVE-2008-4294.title: IBM Tivoli Netcool Webtop privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4294.body: IBM Tivoli Netcool Webtop could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper use of cached user permissions. If a user logged into Webtop with root privileges logs out without closing the browser, a local attacker with read only privileges could log in using the same browser session and gain root privileges on the vulnerable system.Refer to IBM Support & downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4295.title: Microsoft Windows Mobile bluetooth device name denial of service
CVE-2008-4295.body: Microsoft Windows Mobile is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error in the Bluetooth stack when handling advertised device names. By sending an overly long Bluetooth device name, a remote attacker could cause the device to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4297.title: Mercurial allowpull information disclosure
CVE-2008-4297.body: Mercurial could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to honor "allowpull" permissions when pulling from hgweb. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Mercurial (1.0.2 or later), available from the Mercurial Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4298.title: lighttpd http_request_parse() denial of service
CVE-2008-4298.body: lighttpd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak error when processing request headers in the http_request_parse() function. By sending a duplicate request header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to exhaust all available memory resources resulting in a denial of service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (lighttpd-1.4.19.memory.leak.patch), available from the LIGHTTPD Web site: Ticket #1774. See References.

CVE-2008-4299.title: Microsoft IAS Helper COM ActiveX control denial of service
CVE-2008-4299.body: An unspecified ActiveX control in the Microsoft Internet Authentication Service (IAS) Helper COM Component within the iashlpr.dll library is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an overly large integer value within the first argument to the PutProperty method to cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4303.title: phpCollab login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4303.body: phpCollab is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the loginForm parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4304.title: phpCollab login.php command execution
CVE-2008-4304.body: phpCollab could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the $SSL_CLIENT_CERT variable to inject and execute shell commands on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4305.title: phpCollab settings.php code execution
CVE-2008-4305.body: phpCollab could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the settings.php script. A remote attacker with admin privileges could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted data passed to the Ftp server field to inject and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4309.title: Net-SNMP netsnmp_create_subtree_cache() denial of service
CVE-2008-4309.body: Net-SNMP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer overflow in the netsnmp_create_subtree_cache() function. By sending a specially-crafted SNMP GETBULK request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Net-SNMP (5.2.5.1, 5.3.2.3, or 5.4.2.1 or later), available from the Net-SNMP Web page. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4313.title: tog-pegasus WBEM security bypass
CVE-2008-4313.body: tog-pegasus could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to apply additional Red Hat security enhancements. A remote attacker with a valid user account could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to OpenPegasus WBEM services and send a specially-crafted request to WBEM services.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4316.title: GLib glib/gbase64.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4316.body: The GNOME GLib library is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in g_base64_encode() and g_base64_decode() functions in glib/gbase64.c. By sending a specially-crafted string converted from or to a base64 representation, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GNOME SVN Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4318.title: Observer whois.php and netcmd.php command execution
CVE-2008-4318.body: Observer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the whois.php and netcmd.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the query parameter to execute arbitray commands on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4319.title: Libra File Manager fileadmin.php security bypass
CVE-2008-4319.body: Libra File Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the fileadmin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the isadmin parameter to list arbitrary file or directory contents.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4320.title: OpenNMS j_acegi_security_check, list.jsp and list cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4320.body: OpenNMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the j_acegi_security_check, list.jsp and list scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the j_username, username, or filter parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenNMS (1.5.94 or later), available from the OpenNMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4321.title: FlashGet FTP PWD buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4321.body: FlashGet is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing FTP PWD responses. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious FTP server, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4322.title: RealWin SCADA server FC_INFOTAG/SET_CONTROL buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4322.body: RealWin SCADA server is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By sending an overly large FC_INFOTAG/SET_CONTROL packet to TCP port 910, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4327.title: Microsoft Windows XP GDI+ .ICO denial of service
CVE-2008-4327.body: Microsoft Windows XP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error in gdiplus.dll. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .ICO file, a remote attacker could cause explorer.exe to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4328.title: EasyRealtorPRO site_search.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4328.body: EasyRealtorPRO is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the site_search.php script using item, search_ordermethod, or search_order parameter which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4329.title: openEngine openengine.php file include
CVE-2008-4329.body: openEngine could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the openengine.php script using the oe_classpath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4330.title: LanSuite index.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-4330.body: LanSuite could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the design parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4331.title: phpOCS index.php file include
CVE-2008-4331.body: phpOCS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the act parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4332.title: PHP infoBoard showtopic.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4332.body: PHP infoBoard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showtopic.php script using the idcat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4333.title: PHP infoBoard index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4333.body: PHP infoBoard is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4335.title: Atomic Photo Album album.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4335.body: Atomic Photo Album is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the album.php script using the apa_album_ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4336.title: Atomic Photo Album album.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4336.body: Atomic Photo Album is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the album.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the apa_album_ID parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4337.title: Bitweaver edit.php, list.php, index.php and other scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4337.body: Bitweaver is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the edit.php, list.php, index.php and various other scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4338.title: Brilliant Gallery module for Drupal bgchecklist/save SQL injection
CVE-2008-4338.body: The Brilliant Gallery module for Drupal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker with "access brilliant_gallery" permissions could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bgchecklist/save script using the nid, user, qid or state parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.This module has been removed from drupal.org and is no longer supported.

CVE-2008-4339.title: Symantec Veritas NetBackup Enterprise Server and Symantec Veritas NetBackup Server jnbSA privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4339.body: Symantec Veritas NetBackup Enterprise Server and Symantec Veritas NetBackup Server could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. By invoking the Java Administration GUI (jnbSA), a remote authenticated attacker who is logged into the GUI could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to SYM08-016 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4340.title: Google Chrome carriage return denial of service
CVE-2008-4340.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site that passes carriage return characters (\r\n\r\n) as arguments to the window.open() function, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to exhaust all available memory resources resulting in a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4341.title: MyBlog add.php cookie authentication bypass
CVE-2008-4341.body: MyBlog could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication restrictions, caused by an error in the add.php script. By modifying the admin and login cookie parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4342.title: NMS DVD Burning SDK NMSDVDX.dll ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2008-4342.body: The NMS DVD Burning SDK ActiveX control (NMSDVDX.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could pass specially-crafted arguments using the EnableLog() or LogMessage() method to overwrite and corrupt arbitrary files on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4343.title: Chilkat XML ChilkatUtil.dll ActiveX control file overwrite
CVE-2008-4343.body: The Chilkat XML ActiveX control (ChilkatUtil.dll) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could pass specially-crafted arguments to the filename or templateFilename parameter using the insecure SaveToFile(), AppendBinary() or SaveToTempFile() method to create and overwrite arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4344.title: 6rbScript cat.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4344.body: 6rbScript is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the cat.php script using the CatID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4346.title: TalkBack comments.php file include
CVE-2008-4346.body: TalkBack could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the comments.php or help.php script using the language parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4347.body: pNews is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the newskom.php script using the newsid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4348.body: PHPortfolio is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-4349.body: ParaNews is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the news.php script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4350.body: vbLOGIX Tutorials is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-4351.body: phpSmartCom could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the "p" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4352.body: phpSmartCom is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the uid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4353.body: Linkarity is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the link.php script using the cat_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4354.body: iBoutique is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4355.body: pForum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showprofil.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4356.title: Kasseler CMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4356.body: Kasseler CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id, nid, vid, fid, tid, uname, or module parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Kasseler CMS (1.3.4 or later), available from the Kasseler CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4357.title: pLink linkto.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4357.body: pLink is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the linkto.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4359.title: lighttpd url.redirect and url.rewrite information disclosure
CVE-2008-4359.body: lighttpd could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the comparison of patterns in the url.redirect and url.rewrite configuration settings with URIs prior to URL decoding. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to specific resources and obtain sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (lighttpd-1.4.x_rewrite_redirect_decode_url.patch), available from the LIGHTTPD Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4360.title: lighttpd mod_userdir information disclosure
CVE-2008-4360.body: lighttpd could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. If a case-insensitive operating system is used to generate a filename, mod_userdir performs a case-sensitive comparison on filename components. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to specific resources and obtain sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (lighttpd-1.4.x_userdir_lowercase.patch), available from the LIGHTTPD Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4364.body: ParsaWeb is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to default.aspx using the id or txtSearch parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4365.body: Siteman is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. CVE-2008-4368.title: Java on Apple Mac OS X Java Cryptography Extension information disclosure
CVE-2008-4368.body: Java on Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the limitation of Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) key sizes by the default configuration. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to decrypt ciphertext from the JCE and obtain sensitive information.Apply Apple Security Update 2, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4372.body: Availscript Article Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the articles.php script. CVE-2008-4373.body: Availscript Jobs Portal Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-4374.body: CMS Buzz is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-4375.body: Classmates Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-4376.title: Live TV Script mid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-4376.body: Live TV Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the mid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4377.body: Creator CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.asp script using the sideid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4378.title: Hot Links report.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4378.body: Hot Links is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the report.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4379.title: Hot Links report.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4379.body: Hot Links is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the report.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4380.title: Samsung DVR SHR2040 Web interface denial of service
CVE-2008-4380.body: Samsung DVR SHR2040 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of requests by the Web interface. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the HTTPD service on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4381.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer alert function denial of service
CVE-2008-4381.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a denial of service. By invoking the alert function using JavaScript containing an overly long string of URL-encoded invalid characters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4383.title: Multiple Alcatel-Lucent OmniSwitch Series products session buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4383.body: Multiple Alcatel-Lucent OmniSwitch Series products are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the embedded management Web server. By sending a specially-crafted GET request containing an overly long Session cookie, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Refer to Alcatel-Lucent Security Advisory for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4384.title: LPViewer ActiveX control (LPControl.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4384.body: LPViewer ActiveX control (LPControl.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that passes an overly long argument to the url(), toolbar(), or enableZoomPastMax() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4385.title: Systems Requirements Lab ActiveX control and Java applet code execution
CVE-2008-4385.body: The Systems Requirements Lab ActiveX control (sysreqlab.dll, sysreqlabsli.dll, or sysreqlab2.dll) and Java applet (sysreqlab2.jar or sysreqlab.jar) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes malicious data to the affected control, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download files and execute arbitrary code on a victim's system with privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of Systems Requirements Lab (3 or later), available from the Husdawg Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4387.title: SAPgui MDrmSap ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2008-4387.body: The SAPgui MDrmSap ActiveX control (mdrmsap.dll) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the IE browser to crash.SAPgui customers should contact the SAP Support Web site for assistance in obtaining the latest version of SAPgui. See References.

CVE-2008-4389.body: Symantec AppStream and Workspace Streaming could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper authentication with the Symantec Workspace Streaming server when downloading files. By configuring a Workspace Streaming server masquerading as an authorized server, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download and execute arbitrary files without interaction from the victim.Refer to SYM10-008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4393.title: Kontiki Delivery Management System zodiac cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4393.body: Kontiki Delivery Management System is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the zodiac/servlet/zodiac. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the action parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (DMS Security Patch 20102), available from the Kontiki Customer Support Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4395.title: Linux Kernel ndiswrapper module buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4395.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the ndiswrapper module. By sending a specially-crafted packet containing an overly long ESSID (Extended Service Set Identifier), a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4396.title: FileAlyzer version information buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4396.body: FileAlyzer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .exe file containing malformed version information, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4398.title: CA ARCserve Backup tape engine denial of service
CVE-2008-4398.body: CA ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation by the tape engine service (asdbapi.dll). By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID: 188143 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4399.title: CA ARCserve Backup database engine denial of service
CVE-2008-4399.body: CA ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation by the database engine service (asdbapi.dll). By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID: 188143 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2008-4400.title: CA ARCserve Backup authentication credentials denial of service
CVE-2008-4400.body: CA ARCserve Backup is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of authentication credentials. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause multiple services to crash.Refer to CA Security Advisory Vulnerability ID: 188143 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4401.title: Adobe Flash Player FileReference.browse() and FileReference.download() file upload
CVE-2008-4401.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the unassisted invoking of the FileReference.browse() and FileReference.download() functions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to persuade a victim into downloading or uploading arbitrary files to the vulnerable system.Refer to APSB08-18 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4402.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan CGI module denial of service
CVE-2008-4402.body: Trend Micro OfficeScan is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error in the CGI modules. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted HTTP header to cause a child process to terminate.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4408.title: MediaWiki useskin parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4408.body: MediaWiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the useskin parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaWiki (1.12.1, 1.13.2, or later), available from the MediaWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4409.title: Libxml2 XML file denial of service
CVE-2008-4409.body: Libxml2 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of XML files. By sending a specially-crafted XML file containing a predefined entity inside an entity definition, a remote attacker could consume all available memory resources resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Libxml2 (2.7.2 or later), available from the libxml2 FTP page. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4410.title: Linux Kernel vmi_write_ldt_entry() function
CVE-2008-4410.body: The Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the vmi_write_ldt_entry() function. A write_idt_entry is invoked where a write_ldt_entry was intended. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted function calls related to the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) experiencing an improper LDT selector state to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.27-rc8-git5 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4411.title: HP System Management Homepage unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4411.body: HP System Management Homepage is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input.
