CVE-2008-4800.body: The Microsoft Debug Diagnostic Tool DebugDiag ActiveX control (CrashHangExt.dll) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly large negative integer argument to the GetEntryPointForThread method, a remote attacker could cause the victim's Internet Explorer browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4802.title: Simple PHP Scripts blog complete.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4802.body: Simple PHP Scripts blog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the complete.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4803.title: Simple PHP Scripts gallery index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4803.body: Simple PHP Scripts gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the gallery parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4804.title: Gallery module for PHP-Nuke aid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-4804.body: The Gallery module for PHP-Nuke is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the aid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4805.title: IBM Lotus Connections API cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4805.body: IBM Lotus Connections is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the APi to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the IBM Support & downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4805.title: IBM Lotus Connections community title cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4805.body: IBM Lotus Connections is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the community title to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the IBM Support & downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4805.title: IBM Lotus Connections unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4805.body: IBM Lotus Connections is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Homepage, Blogs, Profiles, Dogear, Activities and the Global Search components. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the IBM Support & downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4806.title: IBM Lotus Connections sortField SQL injection
CVE-2008-4806.body: IBM Lotus Connections is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script using the sortField parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to the IBM Support & downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4808.title: IBM Lotus Connections password leakage unspecified
CVE-2008-4808.body: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in IBM Lotus Connections related to password leakage have an unknown impact and attack vector.Refer to the IBM Support & downloads Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4810.title: Smarty _expand_quoted_text() function code execution
CVE-2008-4810.body: Smarty could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the system, caused by an error in the _expand_quoted_text() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via vectors related to templates and a dollar-sign character or a double quoted literal string to execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Smarty (2.6.20-1 or later), available from the Smarty Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4811.title: Smarty _expand_quoted_text() function code execution
CVE-2008-4811.body: Smarty could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the system, caused by an error in the _expand_quoted_text() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via vectors related to templates and a \ (backslash) before a dollar-sign character to execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4812.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Type 1 font code execution
CVE-2008-4812.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an out of bounds array access error when handling Type 1 fonts. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted .PDF file or AcroRd32Info Explorer extension thumbnail, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code with privileges of the victim.For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. Refer to APSB08-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4813.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Collab object code execution
CVE-2008-4813.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a vulnerability regarding Collab objects and the GetCosObj() JavaScript method. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .PDF file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the victim.Refer to APSB08-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4814.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader JavaScript code execution
CVE-2008-4814.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to an input validation error in a JavaScript method. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute arbitrary code.For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. Refer to APSB08-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4815.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader unspecified privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4815.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an unspecified error when running on Unix. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to gain elevated privileges.For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. Refer to APSB08-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4818.title: Adobe Flash Player HTTP response header cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4818.body: Adobe Flash Player is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTTP response headers to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to APSB08-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For Apple Mac OS X: Apply Security Update 2008-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.6 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4820.title: Adobe Flash Player ActiveX control unspecified information disclosure
CVE-2008-4820.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the Adobe Flash Player ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB08-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For Apple Mac OS X: Apply Security Update 2008-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.6 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4821.title: Adobe Flash Player jar: URL information disclosure
CVE-2008-4821.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player related to improper interpretation of jar: URLs when used with Mozilla browsers could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB08-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For Apple Mac OS X: Apply Security Update 2008-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.6 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4822.title: Adobe Flash Player non-root domain policy security bypass
CVE-2008-4822.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper interpretation of policy files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass a non-root domain policy.Refer to APSB08-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For Apple Mac OS X: Apply Security Update 2008-008 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.5.6 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4827.title: ComponentOne SizerOne Tab ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4827.body: The ComponentOne SizerOne Tab ActiveX control (c1sizer.ocx) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow when copying tab options. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that adds multiple tabs with overly long captions using the AddTab() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the Tab ActiveX control (8.0.20081.142 or later), available from the ComponentOne Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4827.title: SAP GUI TabOne ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4827.body: The SAP GUI TabOne ActiveX control (sizerone.ocx) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow when copying tab options. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that adds multiple tabs using the AddTab() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SAP GUI (7.10 PL or later), available from the SAP Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4827.title: TSC2 Help Desk Ctab ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4827.body: The TSC2 Help Desk Ctab ActiveX control (c1sizer.ocx) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow when copying tab options. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that adds multiple tabs with overly long captions using the AddTab() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of TSC2 Help Desk (4.3.1 or later), available from the Servantix Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4828.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) dsmagent.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4828.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Agent Client (dsmagent.exe) in a generic function or when copying the NodeName. By sending a specially-crafted request packet containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system, available from IBM Support & downloads. See References.

CVE-2008-4864.title: Python imageop module buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4864.body: Python is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by multiple integer overflows by the imageop.c function within the imageop module. By sending specially-crafted arguments containing overly-large integer values, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Python (2.5.2 or later), available from the Python Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4866.title: FFmpeg utils.c multiple buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4866.body: FFmpeg is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by utils.c related to execution of DTS generation code with a delay greater than MAX_REORDER_DELAY. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4867.title: FFmpeg dca.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4867.body: FFmpeg is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by dca.c related to an incorrect DCA_MAX_FRAME_SIZE value. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4869.title: FFmpeg TCP UDP denial of service
CVE-2008-4869.body: FFmpeg is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error related to a TCP/UDP memory leak. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4870.title: Dovecot dovecot.conf information disclosure
CVE-2008-4870.body: Dovecot could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the dovecot.conf file having world-readable permissions. If the ssl_key_password parameter value is set, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the password and other sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-4872.title: ITechBids bidhistory.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4872.body: ITechBids is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bidhistory.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the item_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4877.title: WebCards admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4877.body: WebCards is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker with knowledge of an admin username could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4878.title: WebCards admin.php file upload
CVE-2008-4878.body: WebCards could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the admin.php script. By adding an image macro for the ".php" extension, a remote attacker with knowledge of an admin username could exploit this vulnerability to upload malicious PHP files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4880.body: Maran PHP Shop is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the prodshow.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4886.body: YourFreeWorld Shopping Cart Script with Affiliate Program is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4891.body: SignMe is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-4892.body: MyGallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-4893.body: Tribiq CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the header.inc.php script. CVE-2008-4894.body: Tribiq CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the header.inc.php script using the template path parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4896.title: Logz CMS add_url.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4896.body: Logz CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the add_url.php script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4897.title: Logz CMS add_url.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4897.body: Logz CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the add_url.php script using the art parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4898.body: RateMe is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2008-4899.body: RateMe is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform other arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4901.title: Article Publisher Pro admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4901.body: Article Publisher Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of December 26, 2009.

CVE-2008-4902.body: Article Publisher Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the contact_author.php using the userid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of July 17, 2010.

CVE-2008-4903.title: Typo comment[author] and comment[url] cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4903.body: Typo is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the comment[author] or comment[url] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4904.title: Typo search[published_at] SQL injection
CVE-2008-4904.body: Typo is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with valid blog publisher credentials or higher could send specially-crafted SQL statements to admin/pages using the search[published_at] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4906.title: Lyrics plugin for e107 lyrics_song.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4906.body: Lyrics plugin for e107 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the lyrics_song.php script using the l_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4907.title: Dovecot message parsing denial of service
CVE-2008-4907.body: Dovecot is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the message parsing feature when used with the FETCH ENVELOPE command. By sending an email containing a specially-crafted From address, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause an assertion error which blocks the victim's access to the mailbox.Upgrade to the latest version of Dovecot (1.1.6 or later), available from the Dovecot Download Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4910.title: Sun Java Web Start showDocument command execution
CVE-2008-4910.body: Sun Java Web Start could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by a weakness in the Basicservice showDocument method. By persuading a victim to click on a malicious URL, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted Java Web Start application to launch arbitrary files on the victim's system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4912.title: RS MAXSOFT popup_img.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-4912.body: RS MAXSOFT is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the popup_img.php script using the fotoID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4913.title: LokiCMS admin.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-4913.body: LokiCMS could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the admin.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (../) in the delete parameter to delete arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4915.title: Multiple VMware products CPU hardware privilege escalation
CVE-2008-4915.body: Multiple VMware products could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the CPU hardware emulation while handling the Trap flag. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the guest operating system.Refer to VMSA-2008-0018 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-4918.title: SonicWALL ContentFiltering cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-4918.body: SonicWALL is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when a user requests access to a blocked Web site based on universal content-filtering rules. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a Content Filtering Service message to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SonicWALL (4.0.1.1 or later), available from the SonicWALL Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4919.title: eXPert PDF ViewerX ActiveX control (VSPDFViewerX.ocx) savePageAsBitmap() method file overwrite
CVE-2008-4919.body: The eXPert PDF ViewerX ActiveX control (VSPDFViewerX.ocx) could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the savePageAsBitmap() insecure method to overwrite or corrupt arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4921.title: Chipmunk CMS reguser.php security bypass
CVE-2008-4921.body: Chipmunk CMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. All users without admin privileges are granted access to the reguser.php script. By sending a specially-crafted POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and add new administrative users to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4922.title: DjVu ActiveX Control for MS Office (DjVu_ActiveX_MSOffice.dll) ImageURL buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4922.body: The DjVu ActiveX Control for MS Office (DjVu_ActiveX_MSOffice.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the ImageURL property, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4932.title: U-Mail edit.php file upload
CVE-2008-4932.body: U-Mail could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the edit.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4933.title: Linux Kernel hfsplus_find_cat() function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-4933.body: The Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the hfsplus_find_cat() function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability via an hfsplus filesystem image with an invalid catalog namelength field to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux Kernel (2.6.28-rc1 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4934.title: Linux Kernel hfsplus denial of service
CVE-2008-4934.body: The Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the hfsplus_block_allocate() function. By mounting a specially-crafted hfsplus file system, a local attacker could cause the system to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux Kernel (2.6.28-rc1 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-4991.title: EC-CUBE unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2008-4991.body: EC-CUBE is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-4999.body: Nortel IP Phone is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of network datagrams. By sending an overly large number of ICMP Echo Requests (Ping), a remote attacker could cause the device to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5000.title: PHPX news_id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-5000.body: PHPX is vulnerable to SQL injection. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database file and obtain the password and other sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5129.title: Ocean12 Poll Manager Pro o12poll.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2008-5129.body: Ocean12 Poll Manager Pro could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the o12poll.mdb file stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database file and obtain the password and other sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5129.title: Ocean12 Contact Manager Pro o12con.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2008-5129.body: Ocean12 Contact Manager Pro could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the o12con.mdb file stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database file and obtain the password and other sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5130.title: Ocean12 Calendar Manager Gold o12cal.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2008-5130.body: Ocean12 Calendar Manager Gold could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the o12cal.mdb file stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database file and obtain the password and other sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5131.title: News And Article System article_details.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5131.body: News And Article System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the article_details.php script using the aid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5133.title: Sun Solaris IP Filter DNS response spoofing
CVE-2008-5133.body: Sun Solaris could allow a remote attacker to spoof DNS query responses, caused by an error in IP Filter (ipfilter(5)) when configured for Network Address Translation (NAT) on DNS servers. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass protection mechanisms and spoof the responses to DNS queries sent by named(1M).Refer to Sun Alert ID: 245206 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5161.title: OpenSSH and multiple SSH Tectia products CBC mode information disclosure
CVE-2008-5161.body: OpenSSH and multiple SSH Tectia products could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of errors within an SSH session which is encrypted with a block cipher algorithm in CBC mode. A remote attacker with read and write access to network data could exploit this vulnerability to display plaintext bits from a block of ciphertext and obtain sensitive information.For SSH Tectia Products: Refer to SSH Company News, Article 953 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5163.title: The Rat CMS viewarticle.php and viewarticle2.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5163.body: The Rat CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewarticle.php or viewarticle2.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5164.title: The Rat CMS viewarticle.php and viewarticle2.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5164.body: The Rat CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the viewarticle.php and viewarticle2.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5165.title: eTicket pri parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-5165.body: eTicket is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php, open.php, open_raw.php, or newticket.php script using the "pri" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of eTicket (1.7.0 or later), available from the eTicketSupport Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5168.title: Tips Website tip.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5168.body: Tips Website is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the tip.php script using the tipid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5172.title: Yazd Discussion Forum search.jsp, error.jsp and userAccount.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5172.body: Yazd Discussion Forum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.jsp, error.jsp and userAccount.jsp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "q" or msg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5173.title: testMaker unspecified code execution
CVE-2008-5173.body: An unspecified error in testMaker could allow a remote attacker with test author privileges to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of testMaker 3.0p16 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-5177.title: Yosemite Backup DtbClsLogin() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5177.body: Yosemite Backup is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the DtbClsLogin() function in libytlindtb.so on a Linux operating system. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. Note: Reportedly, successful exploitation in ytwindtb.dll on a Windows operating system could cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5180.title: Microsoft Office Communicator SIP INVITE denial of service
CVE-2008-5180.body: Microsoft Office Communicator is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SIP implementation. By sending multiple SIP INVITE requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of system resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5180.title: Microsoft Communicator SIP INVITE message unspecified denial of service
CVE-2008-5180.body: Microsoft Communicator is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when handling SIP INVITE messages. By sending a flood of SIP INVITE messages, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the utilization of all memory resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5181.title: Microsoft Communicator emoticon unspecified denial of service
CVE-2008-5181.body: Microsoft Communicator is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an unspecified error when handling emoticons. By sending a large number of emoticons, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to hang.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5183.title: CUPS RSS subscription denial of service
CVE-2008-5183.body: CUPS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling RSS subscription requests. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that passes a large number of RSS subscription requests to port 631 via a specially-crafted image tag, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the CUPS daemon to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5185.title: GeSHi XML denial of service
CVE-2008-5185.body: GeSHi is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing XML files. By sending a specially-crafted XML file, a remote attacker could cause the application to enter into an infinite loop resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of GeSHi (1.0.8.0 or later), available from the GeSHi Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5186.title: GeSHi unspecified code execution
CVE-2008-5186.body: An unspecified error in GeSHI could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code using unknown attack vectors.Upgrade to the latest version of GeSHi (1.0.8.1 or later), available from the GeSHi Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5228.title: IBM Lotus Workplace Content Management page navigation component cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5228.body: IBM Lotus Workplace Content Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the page navigation component. CVE-2008-5229.title: Microsoft Windows Vista iphlpapi.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5229.body: Microsoft Windows Vista is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Microsoft Device IO Control wrapped by the iphlpapi.dll file. By sending a specially-crafted DestinationPrefix PrefixLength value to the CreateIpForwardEntry2() function using the MIB.IPFORWARD_ROW2 structure, a local attacker with Network Configuration Operators group privileges or Admin group privileges could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of February 14, 2009.

CVE-2008-5232.title: Windows Media Services ActiveX control (nskey.dll) CallHTMLHelp() method buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5232.body: Windows Media Services ActiveX control (nskey.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to the CallHTMLHelp() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Windows Media Services customers should contact the vendor for support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2008-5233.title: xine-lib open_mod_file() function denial of service
CVE-2008-5233.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to denial of service, caused by improper checking of malloc failures by the open_mod_file() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .RM file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code.Upgrade to the latest version of xine-lib (1.1.15 or later), available from the xine Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5233.title: xine-lib mymng_process_header() function denial of service
CVE-2008-5233.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to denial of service, caused by improper checking of malloc failures by the mymng_process_header() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .RM file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code.Upgrade to the latest version of xine-lib (1.1.15 or later), available from the xine Web site. CVE-2008-5233.title: xine-lib real_parse_audio_specific_data() function denial of service
CVE-2008-5233.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to denial of service, caused by improper checking of malloc failures by the real_parse_audio_specific_data() function. CVE-2008-5234.title: xine-lib parse_moov_atom() function buffer overflow

See References.

CVE-2008-5236.title: xine-lib open_ra_file() function buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5236.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the open_ra_file() function. CVE-2008-5236.title: xine-lib parse_block_group() function buffer overflow

CVE-2008-5237.title: xine-lib parse_reference_atom() and mymng_process_header() function denial of service
CVE-2008-5237.body: xine-lib is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the parse_reference_atom() function when handling RDRF_ATOM strings and an allocation calculation error the mymng_process_header() function . CVE-2008-5239.title: xine-lib multiple input plugin buffer overflow

An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Refer to I-O Data Global Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5383.title: Electronics Workbench EWB buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5383.body: Electronics Workbench is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of EWB files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted .EWB file to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5395.title: Linux Kernel parisc_show_stack() denial of service
CVE-2008-5395.body: Linux Kernel, when running on a PARISC 32bit or 64bit machine, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the parisc_show_stack() function when attempting to unwind a malformed stack. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Kernel (2.6.28-rc7 or later), available from The Linux Kernel Archives Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5397.title: Tor User privilege escalation
CVE-2008-5397.body: Tor could allow a remote attacker gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to drop privileges to the user's primary groups. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the User parameter to leverage supplementary group memberships and gain elevated privileges on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.2.0.32 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5398.title: Tor ClientDNSRejectInternalAddresses security bypass
CVE-2008-5398.body: Tor could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by weak security in the "ClientDNSRejectInternalAddresses" configuration option. By mapping an internal IP address to the hostname of a refused stream, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.2.0.32 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5400.title: mvnForum unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-5400.body: mvnForum is vulnerable to multiple cross-site request forgeries, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to create forums, modify account privileges or enable or disable accounts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of mvnForum (1.2.1 GA or later), available from the mvnForum Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5401.title: Trillian XML AIM IMG Tag buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5401.body: Trillian is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the tooltip processing code that generates an XML tag. By sending a specially-crafted image file containing an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Trillian (3.1.12.0 or later), available from the Cerulean Studios Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5402.title: Trillian XML IMG SRC ID code execution
CVE-2008-5402.body: Trillian could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when processing XML code. By sending a specially-crafted message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via an XML expression to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Trillian (3.1.12.0 or later), available from the Cerulean Studios Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5403.title: Trillian XML AIM Plugin buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5403.body: Trillian is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing XML code. By sending a specially-crafted message, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code via an XML tag on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Trillian (3.1.12.0 or later), available from the Cerulean Studios Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5405.title: Cain & Abel RDP buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5405.body: Cain & Abel is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing RDP files. By persuading a victim to decode a specially-crafted RDP file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Cain & Abel (4.9.29 or later), available from the OXID Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5406.title: Apple QuickTime Player and iTunes .mov file buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5406.body: Apple QuickTime Player and iTunes are vulnerable to multiple off-by-one buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .mov file containing an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5407.title: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Servers Backup Exec Remote Agent security bypass
CVE-2008-5407.body: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Servers could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by multiple authentication errors within the Backup Exec Remote Agent. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to read and modify arbitrary files on the system.Refer to SYM08-021 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5408.title: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Servers data management protocol buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5408.body: Symantec Backup Exec for Windows Servers is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the data management protocol. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to SYM08-021 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5409.title: Multiple vendors pdf.xmd module denial of service
CVE-2008-5409.body: Multiple vendors, including BitDefender Antivirus and Internet Security, BullGuard Internet Security, and Software602 Groupware Server are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking by the pdf.xmd module. By persuading a victim to scan a specially-crafted PDF file using a command line scanner from BitDefender, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the BitDefender Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5411.body: WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a potential security exposure when using the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) to send telephone messages. Any telephone messages that were intended to be sent from the Server outbound as encrypted will be sent incorrectly as unencrypted, allowing the telephone message to be sent insecurely.Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.1 or later) or APAR PK74777. See References.

CVE-2008-5416.title: Microsoft SQL Server sp_replwritetovarbin() buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5416.body: Microsoft SQL Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the sp_replwritetovarbin() stored procedure. By sending a specially-crafted argument with uninitialized variables as parameters, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the SQL Server process or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS09-004. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5418.title: PunPortal module for PunBB login.php file include
CVE-2008-5418.body: The PunPortal module for PunBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the login.php script using the pun_user[language] or pun_user[is_guest] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of PunPortal (2.0 or later), available from the PunPortal Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5419.title: EMC ControlCenter msragent.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5419.body: EMC ControlCenter is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the SAN Manager Master Agent service (msragent.exe). By sending specially-crafted SST_CTGTRANS requests to TCP port 10444, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (5.2 SP5 Patch 4433 or 6.0 Patch 4434), available from the EMC Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5420.title: EMC ControlCenter msragent.exe file download
CVE-2008-5420.body: EMC ControlCenter could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper verification of requests by the SAN Manager Master Agent service (msragent.exe). By sending an SST_SENDFILE request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (5.2 SP5 Patch 4433 or 6.0 Patch 4434), available from the EMC Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5422.title: Sun Ray Server Software unspecified security bypass
CVE-2008-5422.body: An unspecified error in Sun Ray Server Software could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain to the administration password and gain unauthorized administrative access to the Sun Ray Data Store and the Sun Ray Administration GUI.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 240365 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5423.title: Sun Ray Server Software and Sun Ray Windows Connector LDAP security bypass
CVE-2008-5423.body: An unspecified error in Sun Ray Server Software and Sun Ray Windows Connector could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability during software configuration to obtain to the LDAP password and gain unauthorized administrative access to the Sun Ray Data Store and the Sun Ray Administration GUI.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 240506 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5434.title: PunBB users.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5434.body: PunBB is vulnerable to SQL injection. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and confirm the cross-site request forgery warning dialog, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the users.php or settings.php script using the order_by, direction, or various other parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PunBB (1.3.2 or later), available from the PunBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5487.title: Text Link Sales admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5487.body: Text Link Sales is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5488.title: Domain Shop admin.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5488.body: Domain Shop is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin.php script using the passfromform parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5489.title: ClipShare channel_detail.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5489.body: ClipShare is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the channel_detail.php script using the chid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5490.title: PHPStore Yahoo Answers index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5490.body: PHPStore Yahoo Answers is vulnerable to SQL injection. If "cmd" is set to "4", a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5491.title: SlimCMS edit.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5491.body: SlimCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the edit.php script using the pageID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5492.title: VeryDOC PDFVIEW.PdfviewCtrl.1 ActiveX control (pdfview.ocx) OpenPDF() method buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5492.body: The VeryDOC PDFVIEW.PdfviewCtrl.1 ActiveX control (pdfview.ocx) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly-long parameter to the OpenPDF() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5493.title: Wholesale track.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5493.body: Wholesale is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the track.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5494.title: Contact Information Module component for Joomla! catid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-5494.body: The Contact Information Module component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5496.title: Business Directory Script showcategory.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5496.body: PozScripts Business Directory Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the showcategory.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5497.title: BandSite CMS login_auth cookie security bypass
CVE-2008-5497.body: BandSite CMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the login_auth cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5498.title: PHP imageRotate() information disclosure
CVE-2008-5498.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an array index error in the imageRotate() function. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted value to the clrBack parameter to read the contents of arbitrary memory locations. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.2.9 or later), available from the PHP Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5499.title: Adobe Flash Player for Linux SWF file code execution
CVE-2008-5499.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error when processing SWF files. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted SWF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB08-24 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5502.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript engine code js_DeflateString code execution
CVE-2008-5502.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified memory corruption vulnerability related to the JavaScript engine js_DeflateString function. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and crash the browser or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system with the victim's privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-60 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5504.title: Mozilla Firefox feed preview feedWriter function code execution
CVE-2008-5504.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the feed preview feedWriter function. By persuading a victim to preview a specially-crafted feed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary JavaScript on the system with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-62 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5505.title: Mozilla Firefox XUL persist attribute weak security
CVE-2008-5505.body: Mozilla Firefox could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error when processing the "persist" XUL attribute. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the cookie settings on the victim's machine and track a user in subsequent browsing sessions.Refer to MFSA 2008-63 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5506.title: Multiple Mozilla products XMLHttpRequest 302 response information disclosure
CVE-2008-5506.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a weakness when a XMLHttpRequest is made to a same-origin resource. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that 302 redirects to a resource in a different domain, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain URL parameters and content in the XMLHttpRequest response body.Refer to MFSA 2008-64 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5507.title: Multiple Mozilla products JavaScript URL redirect information disclosure
CVE-2008-5507.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by an error when processing JavaScript URLs redirecting the browser to an off-domain target that returns non-JavaScript data. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions using the window.onerror DOM API to gain unauthorized access to other domains and obtain sensitive information from the system.Refer to MFSA 2008-65 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5508.title: Multiple Mozilla products URL parsing weak security
CVE-2008-5508.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error when parsing URLs. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL containing leading whitespace and control characters to cause the parser to present malformed hyperlinks.Refer to MFSA 2008-66 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5511.title: Multiple Mozilla products XBL binding security bypass
CVE-2008-5511.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the XBL binding attached to an unloaded document. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute JavaScript in the context of another site. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to MFSA 2008-68 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5512.title: Multiple Mozilla products XPCNativeWrappers code execution
CVE-2008-5512.body: Multiple Mozilla products, including Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to XPCNativeWrappers pollution. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary JavaScript with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2008-68 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5513.title: Mozilla Firefox session-restore feature security bypass
CVE-2008-5513.body: Mozilla Firefox could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the session-restore feature. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute JavaScript in the context of another site or with chrome privileges. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to MFSA 2008-69 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5514.title: UW-imapd rfc822_output_char() denial of service
CVE-2008-5514.body: UW-imapd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an off-by-one error in the rfc822_output_char() function within the c-client library. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer with one byte and cause a segmentation fault on the application using the library.Upgrade to the latest version of UW-imapd (2007e or later), available from the UW IMAP Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5518.title: Apache Geronimo Services/Repository directory traversal
CVE-2008-5518.body: Apache Geronimo could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Services/Repository, /console/portal/Embedded DB/DB Manager and the Security/Keystores scripts containing directory traversal sequences in the group, artifact, version, fileType, createDB or filename parameter which would allow the attacker to upload arbitrary files on the system. Note: This vulnerability affects multiple vendor HTTP server components that utilize Apache Geronimo. See References.Upgrade to the latest version of Geronimo (2.1.4 or later), available from the Apache Geronimo Web site. See References. For WebSphere Application Server Community Edition 2.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (2.1.1.2 or later). See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2008-5520.title: Multiple antivirus products MZ header code execution
CVE-2008-5520.body: Multiple antivirus products could allow a remote attacker to bypass antivirus protection, caused by an HTML parsing error. By persuading a victim using Internet Explorer 6 or 7 to open a specially-crafted HTML page with an MZ header and without an extension, a .txt extension, or a .jpg extension, an attacker exploit this vulnerability to arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.
