CVE-2008-5659.body: GNU Classpath could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the use of a predictable seed by the gnu.java.security.util.PRNG class to initialize the pseudorandom number generator (PRNG). A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to discover passwords, guess a password reset token and other cryptographic key material.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5661.title: Sun Solaris IPv4 forwarding denial of service
CVE-2008-5661.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in IPv4 forwarding. If the system is configured to use IPv4, has a network route with a gateway of 127.0.0.1 and the router does not have the blackhole flag set, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a system panic.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 241126 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5663.title: Kusaba load_receiver.php code execution
CVE-2008-5663.body: Kusaba could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to validate image content prior to uploading by the load_receiver.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (kusabav104_rcepatch), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2008-5663.title: Kusaba paint_save.php code execution
CVE-2008-5663.body: Kusaba could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to validate image content prior to uploading by the paint_save.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (kusabav104_rcepatch), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2008-5664.title: Realtek Media Player playlist buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5664.body: Realtek Media Player (RtlRack) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing playlist files. By persuading a victim to load an overly large playlist, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5665.title: xhresim module for XOOPS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5665.body: The xhresim module for XOOPS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the no parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5667.title: VBA32 Personal Antivirus RAR archive denial of service
CVE-2008-5667.body: VirusBlokAda VBA32 Personal Antivirus is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the scanning engine. By persuading a victim to open and scan a specially-crafted RAR archive, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5672.title: PHParanoid admin.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-5672.body: PHParanoid is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to cause the victim to perform arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of PHParanoid (0.4 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-5673.title: PHParanoid members area security bypass
CVE-2008-5673.body: PHParanoid could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper restricting of current users by the members area. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of PHParanoid (0.5 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-5677.title: Kwalbum ReplaceBadFilenameChars() function file upload
CVE-2008-5677.body: Kwalbum could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the ReplaceBadFilenameChars() function when PICS_PATH is in the Web root directory and an account with upload privileges exists. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload malicious files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Kwalbum (2.1 or later), available from the Kwalbum Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5678.title: OLIB7 WebView infile parameter file include
CVE-2008-5678.body: OLIB7 WebView could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the infile parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5684.title: Sun Solaris libICE denial of service
CVE-2008-5684.body: An unspecified vulnerability in the X Inter Client Exchange library (libICE) used by Sun Solaris could allow a local or remote attacker to cause applications that are dynamically linked to libICE to crash.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 243566 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5687.title: MediaWiki deleted images information disclosure
CVE-2008-5687.body: MediaWiki could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP GET request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view deleted images.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaWiki (1.13.3, 1.12.1 and 1.6.11 or later), available from the MediaWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5689.title: Sun Solaris tunnel parameter code execution
CVE-2008-5689.body: Sun Solaris could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in IP tunnel parameter processing. By sending a specially-crafted SIOCGTUNPARAM IOCTL request, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a system panic or execute arbitrary code on the system with super-user privileges.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 242266 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5693.title: Ipswitch WS_FTP Server WSFTPSVR information disclosure
CVE-2008-5693.body: Ipswitch WS_FTP Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP GET request appended with a dot, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read the contents of custom ASP files in the WSFTPSVR directory path.Upgrade to the latest version of WS_FTP Server, available from the Ipswitch Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5694.title: Sandbox lib/jpgraph/jpgraph_errhandler.inc.php file include
CVE-2008-5694.body: Sandbox could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the lib/jpgraph/jpgraph_errhandler.inc.php script using an unspecified parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5698.title: Konqueror load() denial of service
CVE-2008-5698.body: Konqueror is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of JavaScript "document.load()" calls. By sending specially-crafted JavaScript code, a remote attacker could allow the use of a deleted object within the "HTMLTokenizer::scriptHandler()" method and cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5700.title: Linux Kernel libata denial of service
CVE-2008-5700.body: The Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service. Libata does not set minimum timeouts for SG_IO requests. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple simultaneous invocations of an unspecified test program to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux Kernel (2.6.27.9 or later), available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2008-5701.title: Linux Kernel arch/mips/kernel/scall64-o32.S denial of service
CVE-2008-5701.body: Linux Kernel, when running on a 64-bit machine, is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an out of bounds array access in arch/mips/kernel/scall64-o32.S. By making a syscall with a number value less than 4000, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to crash.Refer to the Linux Kernel GIT Repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5702.title: Linux Kernel ibwdt_ioctl() buffer underflow
CVE-2008-5702.body: The Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a buffer underflow, caused by an off-by-one error in the ibwdt_ioctl function() in drivers/watchdog/ib700wdt.c. It may be possible for a local attacker to exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges using a /dev/watchdog WDIOC_SETTIMEOUT IOCTL call.Upgrade to the latest version of the Linux Kernel (2.6.28-rc1 or later), available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References. For other distributions: Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information.

CVE-2008-5705.title: Verlihub ctrigger command execution
CVE-2008-5705.body: Verlihub could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the cTrigger::DoIt function. When the allow_exec parameter is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted request to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5708.title: SlimCMS redirect.php security bypass
CVE-2008-5708.body: SlimCMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the redirect.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the newusername and newpassword parameters to add administrator accounts.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5709.title: Avaya Communication Manager Set Static Routes command execution
CVE-2008-5709.body: Avaya Communication Manager (CM) could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the Set Static Routes function within the Web administration interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Avaya Communication Manager (3.1.4 SP2, 4.0.3 SP1, 5.0 SP3 or 5.1 or later), available from the Avaya Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5709.title: Avaya Communication Manager Backup History command execution
CVE-2008-5709.body: Avaya Communication Manager (CM) could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the Backup History Web administration interface. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, an attacker could execute arbitrary commands with privileges of the logged in user.Upgrade to the latest version of Avaya Communication Manager (3.1.4 SP2, 4.0.3 SP1, 5.0 SP3 or 5.1 or later), available from the Avaya Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5714.title: QEMU monitor.c weak security
CVE-2008-5714.body: QEMU could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an off-by-one error in monitor.c. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to guess the VNC password.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the qemu CVS Repository. See References. For other distributions: Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information.

CVE-2008-5715.title: Mozilla Firefox location.hash denial of service
CVE-2008-5715.body: Mozilla Firefox running on Windows Vista is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that sends an overly long string containing the document.location.hash, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5716.title: Xen xend xenstore directory tree denial of service
CVE-2008-5716.body: Xen could allow a local attacker to cause a denial of service, caused by improper restrictions on a guest VM's access to the /local/domain xenstore directory tree by xend. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by writing to the console/tty, console/limit, or image/device-model-pid.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, as listed in the Xen-devel Mailing List posting dated Thu, 18 Dec 2008 15:53:07 +0000. See References.

CVE-2008-5720.title: Mayaa org.seasar.mayaa.impl.engine.PageNotFoundException error page cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5720.body: Mayaa is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the org.seasar.mayaa.impl.engine.PageNotFoundException error page in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Mayaa (1.1.23 or later), available from the Mayaa Web page. See References.

CVE-2008-5724.title: ESET Smart Security epfw.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2008-5724.body: ESET Smart Security could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper processing of user space parameters by the epfw.sys driver. By sending a specially-crafted IRP in a certain METHOD_NEITHER IOCTL request to \Device\Epfw, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite an address and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Smart Security (3.0.684 or later), available from the ESET Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5725.title: PowerStrip pstrip.sys privilege escalation
CVE-2008-5725.body: PowerStrip could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of received parameters by the pstrip.sys driver. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using IOCTL 0x800020A8 to overwrite an address and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel level privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5727.title: NetCat password_recovery.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5727.body: NetCat is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the password_recovery.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5728.title: NetCat INCLUDE_FOLDER file include
CVE-2008-5728.body: NetCat could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the post.php, auth.inc.php. banner.inc.php, blog.inc.php or forum.inc.php script using the system or INCLUDE_FOLDER parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5729.title: NetCat iframe.inc.php and neditor.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5729.body: NetCat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the iframe.inc.php and neditor.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the path or form parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5730.title: NetCat add.php CRLF injection
CVE-2008-5730.body: NetCat is vulnerable to CRLF injection, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the add.php file. A remote attacker could inject arbitrary commands using unspecified vectors related to a %0a sequence in a COOKIE variable, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5732.title: KafooeyBlog image_upload.php file upload
CVE-2008-5732.body: KafooeyBlog could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the image_upload.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5734.title: Merak Mail Server IMG HTML tags cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5734.body: Merak Mail Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted email containing script code embedded within IMG HTML tags to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Merak Mail Server (9.4.0 or later), available from the IceWarp Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5735.title: CoolPlayer PlaylistSkin buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5735.body: CoolPlayer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the PlaylistSkin value within a skin file. By persuading a victim to open a malicious skin file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5736.title: FreeBSD netgraph and bluetooth privilege escalation
CVE-2008-5736.body: FreeBSD could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper initialization of function pointers by the netgraph and bluetooth sockets. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-08:13.protosw for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-5737.title: MySQL Calendar index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5737.body: MySQL Calendar is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5739.title: Pligg check_url.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5739.body: Pligg is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the check_url.php script using the url parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5744.title: Zaptel dahdi/tor2.c driver privilege escalation
CVE-2008-5744.body: Zaptel (DAHDI) could allow a local attacker to overwrite kernel memory, caused by an array index error in the dahdi/tor2.c driver. An attacker in the dialout group could exploit this vulnerability using /dev/zap/ctl to overwrite an integer value and possibly gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Digium SVN Repository. See References. For other distributions: Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information.

CVE-2008-5745.title: Microsoft Windows Media Player WAV or SND file denial of service
CVE-2008-5745.body: Microsoft Windows Media Player is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer overflow when parsing WAV or SND files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted WAV or SND file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to Windows server 2003 SP2, available from the Microsoft Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5748.title: bloofoxCMS dialog.php file include
CVE-2008-5748.body: bloofoxCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the dialog.php script using the lang, theme, or module parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5752.title: Page Flip Image Gallery plugin for WordPress getConfig.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-5752.body: The Page Flip Image Gallery plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the getConfig.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the book_id parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5755.title: IntelliTamper MAP file buffer overflow
CVE-2008-5755.body: IntelliTamper is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted MAP file containing an overly long URL, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5758.title: PHParanoid unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-5758.body: PHParanoid is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request using unknown attack vectors related to private messages to cause the victim to perform arbitrary tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of PHParanoid (0.5 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-5759.title: Flatnux index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5759.body: Flatnux is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page via the 08_Files module, which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Flatnux (2009-02-03 or later), available from the Flatnux Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5760.title: Kerio MailServer error413.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5760.body: Kerio MailServer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the error413.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sent parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Kerio MailServer (6.6.2 or later), available from the Kerio Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5761.title: Flatnux multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5761.body: Flatnux is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the photo.php and index.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the mod, foto, or name parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Flatnux (2009-02-03 or later), available from the Flatnux Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5761.title: Flatnux index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5761.body: Flatnux is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page via the 08_Files module, which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Flatnux (2009-02-03 or later), available from the Flatnux Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5764.title: WorkSimple calendar.php file include
CVE-2008-5764.body: WorkSimple could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the calendar.php script using the lang parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of WorkSimple (1.2.2a or later), available from the WorkSimple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5765.body: WorkSimple could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the usr.txt file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by accessing the text file directly to obtain sensitive information such as usernames and passwords.Upgrade to the latest version of WorkSimple (1.2.2a or later), available from the WorkSimple Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5769.title: Kerio MailServer mailCompose.php and calendarEdit.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-5769.body: Kerio MailServer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the mailCompose.php and calendarEdit.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the folder or daytime parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Kerio MailServer (6.6.2 or later), available from the Kerio Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-5772.title: RealtyListing type.asp and detail.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-5772.body: RealtyListing is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the type.asp or detail.asp script using the iType or iPro parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5774.title: HomeBuilder type.asp, type2.asp and detail.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-5774.body: HomeBuilder is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the type.asp, type2.asp or detail.asp script using the iType or iPro parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5775.title: apertoblog categories.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5775.body: apertoblog is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the categories.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5777.title: CadeNix index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5777.body: CadeNix is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5778.title: Free Links Directory Script (FLDS) report.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5778.body: Free Links Directory Script (FLDS) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the report.php script using the linkid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5780.title: Forest Blog blog.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2008-5780.body: Forest Blog could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the blog.mdb stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could download the database file and obtain the password and other sensitive information, which could be used to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5781.title: CFAGCMS right.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5781.body: CFAGCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the right.php script using the title parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5782.title: ZEEMATRI adid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2008-5782.body: ZEEMATRI is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bannerclick.php script using the adid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5783.title: Live Support cookie authentication bypass
CVE-2008-5783.body: Live Support could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication restrictions, caused by the improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the admin and path cookie parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5784.title: Profiles/Dating Script cookie authentication bypass
CVE-2008-5784.body: Profiles/Dating Script could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication restrictions, caused by the improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the admin and path cookie parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5785.title: Profiles/Dating Script index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-5785.body: Profiles/Dating Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the admin_name or admin_pass parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5787.title: Arab Portal mod.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-5787.body: Arab Portal could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mod.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the file parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-5788.title: Domain Seller Pro index.php SQL injection

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of BLUEPAGE CMS (version 2.5.8 or later), available from the BLUEPAGE CMS Web site. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the config.dadamail.php script using the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6222.title: Pro Desk component for Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2008-6222.body: The Pro Desk component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If "option" is set to "com_pro_desk", a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the include_file parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Pro Desk, available from the Joomla Showroom Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6614.title: Implied By Design Micro CMS microcms-admin-login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6614.body: Implied By Design Micro CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to microcms-admin-login.php script using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6615.title: Zen Cart index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6615.body: Zen Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the keyword parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6616.title: Zen Cart index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6616.body: Zen Cart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the keyword parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6617.title: SiteXS CMS upload.php file upload
CVE-2008-6617.body: SiteXS CMS could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the upload.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6618.title: ClassSystem teacher_id SQL injection
CVE-2008-6618.body: ClassSystem is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the HomepageMain.php, HomepageTop.php or the MessageReply.php script using the teacher_id or the message_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6619.title: ClassSystem ApplyDB.php file upload
CVE-2008-6619.body: ClassSystem could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the ApplyDB.php script. By sending a specially-crafted POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary files, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6620.title: miniCWB connector.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6620.body: miniCWB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the connector.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6623.body: Webbdomain Post Card is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the getin.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6625.title: Webbdomain Polls getin.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6625.body: Webbdomain Polls is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-6630.body: The wt_gallery extension for TYPO3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when downloading images. See References.

CVE-2008-6631.title: BlogPHP user cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6631.body: BlogPHP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script when registering a new user or in a sendmessage action. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the user or username parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6632.title: MercuryBoard login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6632.body: MercuryBoard is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script via the User-Agent HTTP header ($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']), which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6634.body: RoomPHPlanning is vulnerable to SQL injection. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

A remote attacker could inject arbitrary shell commands via a URL request with the page parameter set to advert_top.htm or advert_login.htm, which would allow the attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system with the privileges of the Web server and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6828.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution server password information disclosure
CVE-2008-6828.body: The Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution server could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. The Application Identity Account password is stored in clear text in system memory. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the Application Identity Account password and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Refer to SYM08-020 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-6831.title: JIRA returnUrl parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6831.body: JIRA is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the secure/AddComment!default.jspa script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the returnUrl parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of JIRA (3.13.1 or later), available from the Atlassian Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6832.title: JIRA unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-6832.body: JIRA is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of JIRA (3.13.1 or later), available from the JIRA Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6833.title: fuzzylime (cms) commsrss.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-6833.body: fuzzylime (cms), formerly PHP-Update could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the commsrss.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the files[] parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of fuzzylime (cms) (3.01b or later), available from the fuzzylime (cms) Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6840.title: V-Webmail CONFIG[pear_dir] file include
CVE-2008-6840.body: V-Webmail could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to multiple scripts using the CONFIG[pear_dir] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6841.title: Database Query component for Joomla! common.class.php file include
CVE-2008-6841.body: The Database Query component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the common.class.php script using the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6842.title: Pluck CMS module_pages_site.php file include
CVE-2008-6842.body: Pluck CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the module_pages_site.php script using the post parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Pluck CMS (4.6.2 or later), available from the Pluck CMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6843.title: cPanel index.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-6843.body: cPanel could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the sup3r parameter and appended with a NULL byte character (%00) to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6846.title: avast! Linux Home Edition ISO and RPM buffer overflow
CVE-2008-6846.body: avast! Linux Home Edition is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking when handling malformed files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ISO or RPM file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Linux Home Edition (1.0.8-1 or later), available from the avast! Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6847.title: Pre ASP Job Board emp_login.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6847.body: Pre ASP Job Board is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the emp_login.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the msg or msg1 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.
