CVE-2008-6925.title: Zenphoto function.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6925.body: Zenphoto is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the function.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using request logging to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6926.title: cPanel autoinstall4imagesgalleryupgrade.php file include
CVE-2008-6926.body: cPanel could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the autoinstall4imagesgalleryupgrade.php script to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6927.title: cPanel autoinstall4imagesgalleryupgrade.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6927.body: cPanel is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the autoinstall4imagesgalleryupgrade.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple variables in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6929.title: PHPStore Auto Classifieds cars_images/ file upload
CVE-2008-6929.body: PHPStore Auto Classifieds could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions of uploaded logos. By sending a direct request to the file in cars_images/, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6930.title: PHPStore Real Estate re_images/ file upload
CVE-2008-6930.body: PHPStore Real Estate could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions of uploaded logos. By sending a direct request to the file in re_images/, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6931.title: PHPStore Job Search jobseeker_profile_images file upload
CVE-2008-6931.body: PHPStore Job Search could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions of uploaded logos. By sending a direct request to the file in obseeker_profile_images, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6932.title: SendIt Pro submit_file.php file upload
CVE-2008-6932.body: SendIt Pro could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the submit_file.php script. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6933.title: MiniGal index.php directory traversal
CVE-2008-6933.body: MG2 (formerly MiniGal) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the list parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6934.title: Simple PHP Guestbook Script act.php code execution
CVE-2008-6934.body: Simple PHP Guestbook Script could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user supplied input by the act.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the message parameter to execute arbitrary PHP code.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6935.title: Exodus im:// URI command execution
CVE-2008-6935.body: Exodus could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of arguments received using an im:// URI. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted im:// URI, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject command-line parameters and execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6936.title: Exodus pres:// URI command execution
CVE-2008-6936.body: Exodus could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of pres:// URI arguments. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted pres:// URI, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject command-line arguments and execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6937.title: Exodus xmpp:// URI command execution
CVE-2008-6937.body: Exodus could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of xmpp:// URI arguments. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted xmpp:// URI, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject command-line arguments and execute arbitrary commands on the vulnerable system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6938.title: Pi3Web ISAPI denial of service
CVE-2008-6938.body: Pi3Web HTTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of HTTP requests for files in the ISAPI directory. If Pi3Web is installed as a Desktop application, a remote attacker could send multiple HTTP requests for specific files to cause the server to hang, resulting in a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Pi3Web (2.0.3 PL2 or later), available from SourceForge.net: Files. See References.

CVE-2008-6939.title: Web Hosting Directory cookie security bypass
CVE-2008-6939.body: Web Hosting Directory could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the adm cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6940.title: Web Hosting Directory admin/backup/db information disclosure
CVE-2008-6940.body: Web Hosting Directory could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the admin/backup/db file stored inside the Web root. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download the database file and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6941.title: TurnkeyForms Web Hosting Directory login SQL injection
CVE-2008-6941.body: TurnkeyForms Web Hosting Directory is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login functionality using the password field, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6942.title: Realtor Classifieds System profile logo file upload
CVE-2008-6942.body: Realtor Classifieds System could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted profile logo file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6943.title: Recipes Listing Portal image file upload
CVE-2008-6943.body: Recipes Listing Portal could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted image file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6944.title: Auto Classifieds Software profile logo file upload
CVE-2008-6944.body: Auto Classifieds Software could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted profile logo file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6945.title: Interchange mv_order_item cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6945.body: Interchange is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the mv_order_item CGI variable in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Interchange (5.4.3 or 5.6.1 or later), available from the Interchange Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6945.title: Interchange country-select widget cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6945.body: Interchange is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the country-select widget. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Interchange (5.4.3 or 5.6.1 or later), available from the Interchange Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6946.title: Collabtive admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6946.body: Collabtive is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admin.php script. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Name field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6947.title: Collabtive admin.php authentication bypass
CVE-2008-6947.body: Collabtive could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication restrictions, caused by an error in the admin.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to bypass authentication and gain access administrative functions.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6948.title: Collabtive managefile.php file upload
CVE-2008-6948.body: Collabtive could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the managefile.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6951.title: MauryCMS fckeditor security bypass
CVE-2008-6951.body: MauryCMS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the Editors/fckeditor directory. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to upload arbitrary files and possibly launch further attacks on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6952.title: MauryCMS Rss.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6952.body: MauryCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Rss.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6953.title: ooVoo URI handler buffer overflow
CVE-2008-6953.body: ooVoo is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by oovoo.exe. By persuading a victim to click a specially-crafted oovoo: URI, an attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of ooVoo (1.7.1.59 or later), available from the ooVoo Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6954.title: Cobbler Web interface code execution
CVE-2008-6954.body: Cobbler could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. The Web interface fails to restrict users from editing kickstart templates which can be imported as Python modules. A remote attacker with access to the Cobbler Web interface could exploit this vulnerability using Cheetah to execute arbitrary Python code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Cobbler (1.2.9 or later), available from the Cobbler Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6955.title: mxCamArchive config.ini information disclosure
CVE-2008-6955.body: mxCamArchive could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the config.ini file. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could bypass security restrictions and login as an administrator to download the configuration file and obtain system passwords and other sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6956.title: mxCamArchive admin.php code execution
CVE-2008-6956.body: mxCamArchive could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of the admin.php script prior to being written to the database. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the description parameter to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6957.title: Discuz! member.php security bypass
CVE-2008-6957.body: Discuz! could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an unspecified design error. By sending an HTTP POST request to the member.php script using a specially-crafted Content-Length header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and reset the account password and gain unauthorized access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6958.title: Discuz! index.php code execution
CVE-2008-6958.body: Discuz! could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of user supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the creditsformula parameter to execute arbitrary PHP code.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6960.title: x10 Automatic MP3 Script download.php url parameter information disclosure
CVE-2008-6960.body: x10 Automatic MP3 Script could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user supplied input by the download.php script. By sending a hex-encoded URL to the url parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6962.title: Multiple Avira products IOCTL requests privilege escalation
CVE-2008-6962.body: Multiple Avira products could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified driver. By sending a specially-crafted IOCTL request, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite a kernel pointer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Avira AntiVir has issued a fix which is included in the regular automatic update, available to all Avira AntiVir users. See References.

CVE-2008-6965.title: AJ Auction admin authentication bypass
CVE-2008-6965.body: AJ Auction could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the admin/user.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to gain administrative access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6966.title: AJ Auction admin authentication bypass
CVE-2008-6966.body: AJ Auction could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the admin/user.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to gain administrative access to the application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6968.title: Pligg submit.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6968.body: Pligg is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the submit.php script using the category or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to Pligg Rev. 82 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-6969.title: Avactis Shopping Cart checkout.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6969.body: Avactis Shopping Cart is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the checkout.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the step_id or the CHECKOUT_CZ_BLOWFISH_KEY parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Avactis Shopping Cart Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6970.title: UBB.threads Forum[] array SQL injection
CVE-2008-6970.body: UBB.threads is vulnerable to SQL injection. If ubb is set to dosearch, a remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the dosearch.inc.php script using the Forum[] array, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the UBBThreads Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6972.title: Content Construction Kit (CCK) module for Drupal multiple fields cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6972.body: The Content Construction Kit (CCK) module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input in the fields settings forms. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the field label, help text, and allowed values settings to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-2008-048 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-6976.title: RouterOS SNMP security bypass
CVE-2008-6976.body: RouterOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of SNMP requests. By sending a specially-crafted UDP request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change Network Management System (NMS) settings.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6977.title: aspWebAlbum album.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6977.body: aspWebAlbum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input album.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the message parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6978.title: aspWebAlbum image file upload
CVE-2008-6978.body: aspWebAlbum could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary ASP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions of uploaded images. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious ASP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary ASP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6979.title: phpAdultSite CMS as_archives.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6979.body: phpAdultSite CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the as_archives.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the results_per_page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6980.title: phpAdultSite CMS as_archives.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6980.body: phpAdultSite CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the as_archives.php script using the results_per_page parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6981.title: phpAdultSite CMS as_archives.php path disclosure
CVE-2008-6981.body: phpAdultSite CMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the as_archives.php script using an invalid results_per_page parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6982.title: devalcms currentpath parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6982.body: devalcms is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the currentpath parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6983.title: devalcms url2header.php code execution
CVE-2008-6983.body: devalcms could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the url2header.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the HTTP Referer or User-Agent header via the gv_folder_data parameter to execute arbitrary code.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6984.title: Plesk SHORTNAMES security bypass
CVE-2008-6984.body: Plesk could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. If short mail login names (SHORTNAMES) are enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a message with a base64-encoded username that begins with a valid shortname, a username that matches a valid password and Courier IMAP and POP3 to bypass security restrictions and cause the application to be used as an open mail relay and possibly send spam or other malicious files.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6985.title: Zen Cart shoppingcart.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-6985.body: Zen Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to shoppingcart.php script using the products_id array, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to Zen Cart Forum, 31st August 2008, 02:47 PM for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-6988.title: Easy Photo Gallery gallery.php and show.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-6988.body: Easy Photo Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the gallery.php and show.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the galleryid or imageid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6994.title: Google Chrome filename denial of service
CVE-2008-6994.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper bounds checking by the filename attribute of attachment HTTP headers. By persuading a victim to save an attachment with an overly long filename, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6994.title: Google Chrome Save As buffer overflow
CVE-2008-6994.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Save As function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing an overly long HTML title element and then persuading the victim to save the page, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (0.2.149.30 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6995.title: Google Chrome undefined handlers denial of service
CVE-2008-6995.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of undefined handlers. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing an undefined handler appended by a special character, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (0.2.149.29 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6998.title: Google Chrome url_elider.cc buffer overflow
CVE-2008-6998.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the url_elider.cc source file. By creating a specially-crafted link and persuading the victim to mouseover, a remote attacker could overflow the url_path_number_of_elements buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version (0.2.149.30 or later), available from the Google Chrome Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-6998.title: Google Chrome href tag denial of service
CVE-2008-6998.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of href tags. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing a malformed href link with an overly large number of subdirectories in its path, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-6999.title: phpAuction phpinfo.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-6999.body: phpAuction could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. A remote attacker could send a direct request to the phpinfo.php script, which invokes the phpinfo() function to return sensitive information about the system. An attacker could then use this information to launch further attacks against the affected application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7000.title: phpAuction lan file include
CVE-2008-7000.body: phpAuction could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the lan parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7003.title: The Rat CMS login.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-7003.body: The Rat CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script using the user_id or user_password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7004.title: ELOG elog.c buffer overflow
CVE-2008-7004.body: Electronic Logbook (ELOG) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the elog.c file. By sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of ELOG (2.7.1 or later), available from the ELOG Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7006.title: Free PHP VX Guestbook backupdb.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-7006.body: Free PHP VX Guestbook could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions placed on the backupdb.php script. By sending a direct request using unspecified parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download a backup database and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Free PHP VX Guestbook (1.06 or later), available from the PHPVersion Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7007.title: Free PHP VX Guestbook admin_name and admin_pass security bypass
CVE-2008-7007.body: Free PHP VX Guestbook could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking of authentication credentials by an unspecified script, which creates an insecure cookie. By setting the admin_name and admin_pass cookies to "1", a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Free PHP VX Guestbook (1.07 or later), available from the PHPVersion Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7008.title: HyperStop Web Host Directory admin/backup/db information disclosure
CVE-2008-7008.body: HyperStop Web Host Directory could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions placed on the admin/backup/db script. By sending a direct request using unspecified parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download a backup database and possibly launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7009.title: ZoneAlarm directories buffer overflow
CVE-2008-7009.body: Check Point ZoneAlarm Security Suite is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when scanning nested directories. By persuading a victim to scan a directory containing an overly long name, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7010.title: SkaLinks register.php security bypass
CVE-2008-7010.body: SkaLinks could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation by the register.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and bypass security restrictions to create unauthorized user accounts on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7017.title: CAcert analyse.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-7017.body: CAcert is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the analyse.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using embedded script within an X.509 certificate to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to CAcert Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2008-7018.title: Easy PHP Calendar Add New Event cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-7018.body: Easy PHP Calendar is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Add New Event field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7019.title: Esqlanelapse cookie security bypass
CVE-2008-7019.body: Esqlanelapse could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication credentials. By modifying the enombre and euri cookie parameters, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7020.title: McAfee SafeBoot Device Encryption BIOS keyboard information disclosure
CVE-2008-7020.body: McAfee SafeBoot Device Encryption could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper flushing of the BIOS keyboard buffer while using pre-boot authentication. Once the operating system is completely booted, the password is displayed in plaintext which could allow a local attacker to obtain the password and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of McAfee SafeBoot Device Encryption (4 build 4760 or later), available from the McAfee Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7024.title: Gemini Portal admin.php security bypass
CVE-2008-7024.body: Gemini Portal could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication credentials by the admin.php script. By modifying the user cookie parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7026.title: eFront avatar file upload
CVE-2008-7026.body: eFront could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary PHP files, caused by improper validation of file extensions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the avatar upload functionality to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of eFront (3.51 build 2760 or later), available from the eFront Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7029.title: AliBOARD usercp.php file upload
CVE-2008-7029.body: AliBOARD could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper validation of file extensions by the usercp.php script. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7030.title: Real Estate Web Site agentlist.asp SQL injection
CVE-2008-7030.body: Real Estate Web Site is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the agentlist.asp script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7031.title: WAC Server SSH packets buffer overflow
CVE-2008-7031.body: Foxit Remote Access Server (WAC Server) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending an overly large SSH packet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7032.title: F5 BIG-IP Console feature cross-site request forgery
CVE-2008-7032.body: F5 BIG-IP is vulnerable to a cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Console feature. By persuading a victim with Resource Manager or administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP GET request to cause the victim to modify the BIG-IP appliance, create new admin accounts and possibly perform other arbitrary administrative tasks. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7033.title: simpleshop component for Mambo and Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2008-7033.body: The simpleshop component for Mambo and Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the section parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7034.title: PHPEcho CMS Smarty.class.php file include
CVE-2008-7034.body: PHPEcho CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Smarty.class.php script using an unknown parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7036.title: DevTracker module for bcoos and e-Xoops index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-7036.body: The DevTracker module for bcoos and e-Xoops is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the direction or order_by variable in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7037.title: ITN News Gadget short_title cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-7037.body: ITN News Gadget is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the short_title parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of ITN News Gadget (1.23 or later), available from the ITN Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7039.title: Gelato CMS comments.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2008-7039.body: Gelato CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the comments.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7040.body: Simple Forum plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-7044.body: Free Polling Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-7047.body: Natterchat is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2008-7048.body: Natterchat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the register.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the txtUsername or txtRoomName parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7049.title: Natterchat txtPassword SQL injection
CVE-2008-7049.body: Natterchat is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.asp script using the txtPassword parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7052.title: Pre Real Estate Listings profile.php file upload
CVE-2008-7052.body: Pre Real Estate Listings could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the profile.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7053.title: LogMeIn RACtrl.dll ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2008-7053.body: The LogMeIn RACtrl.dll ActiveX control is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string to the fgcolor, bgcolor, and fmcolor methods, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the user or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of LogMeIn ActiveX Plugin (version 1082 or later), available from the LogMeIn Web site. See References.

CVE-2008-7054.title: ezContents showdiary.php file include
CVE-2008-7054.body: ezContents could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the showdiary.php, showdiarydetail.php, submit_diary.php, news_summary.php and inlinenews.php scripts using various parameters to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7055.title: ezContents link file include
CVE-2008-7055.body: ezContents could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted GET request to the module.php script using the link parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7056.title: BandSite CMS phpmydump.php information disclosure
CVE-2008-7056.body: BandSite CMS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. By sending a direct request to the phpmydump.php script, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download the database and possibly launch further attacks against the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7057.body: BandSite CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the merchandise.php script. CVE-2008-7058.body: BandSite CMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the logout.php script. By persuading a logged in victim with administrative privileges to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed request to cause the victim to be logged out. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2008-7060.body: One-News is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. See References.

CVE-2008-7064.body: Quicksilver Forums could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. See References.

CVE-2008-7113.body: Kyocera Mita Scanner File Utility is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by multiple errors when handling network data. CVE-2008-7312.title: Websense Enterprise Filtering Service security bypass
CVE-2008-7312.body: Websense Enterprise could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to consider the IP address during URL categorization by the Filtering Service. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to bypass filtering restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to Websense Article Number: 000003018 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.
